tika-abh07t0:10_0: 3. Tattha cittaṃ tāva catubbidhaṃ hoti kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttarañceti.
tika-abh07t0:14_2: upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttamekanti imāni dvepi momūhacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:19_7: upekkhāsahagataṃ santīraṇacittañceti imāni sattapi akusalavipākacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:20_8: upekkhāsahagataṃ santīraṇacittañceti imāni aṭṭhapi kusalavipākāhetukacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:21_3: somanassasahagataṃ hasituppādacittañceti imāni tīṇipi ahetukakiriyacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:38_5: upekkhekaggatāsahitaṃ pañcamajjhānakusalacittañceti imāni pañcapi rūpāvacarakusalacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:39_5: upekkhekaggatāsahitaṃ pañcamajjhānavipākacittañceti imāni pañcapi rūpāvacaravipākacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:40_5: upekkhekaggatāsahitaṃ pañcamajjhānakiriyacittañceti imāni pañcapi rūpāvacarakiriyacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:65_6: upekkhekaggatāsahitaṃ pañcamajjhānasotāpattimaggacittañceti imāni pañcapi sotāpattimaggacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:67_0: 40. Tathā phalacittāni ceti samacattālīsa lokuttaracittāni bhavantīti.
tika-abh07t0:83_1: Phasso vedanā saññā cetanā ekaggatā jīvitindriyaṃ manasikāro ceti sattime cetasikā sabbacittasādhāraṇā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:84_0: 3. Vitakko vicāro adhimokkho vīriyaṃ pīti chando cāti cha ime cetasikā pakiṇṇakā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:87_1: Moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ uddhaccaṃ lobho diṭṭhi māno doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinaṃ middhaṃ vicikicchā ceti cuddasime cetasikā akusalā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:89_1: Saddhā sati hirī ottappaṃ alobho adoso tatramajjhattatā kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi kāyalahutā cittalahutā
tika-abh07t0:89_2: kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā cittakammaññatā kāyapāguññatā cittapāguññatā kāyujukatā cittujukatā
tika-abh07t0:90_0: 7. Sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo ceti tisso viratiyo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:91_1: Karuṇā muditā appamaññāyo nāmāti sabbathāpi paññindriyena saddhiṃ pañcavīsatime cetasikā sobhanāti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:101_0: 12. Kathaṃ? Sabbacittasādhāraṇā tāva sattime cetasikā sabbesupi ekūnanavuticittuppādesu labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:102_1: Pakiṇṇakesu pana vitakko tāva dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitakāmāvacaracittesu ceva ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu ceti pañcapaññāsacittesu uppajjati.
tika-abh07t0:103_0: 14. Vicāro pana tesu ceva ekādasasu dutiyajjhānacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu.
tika-abh07t0:114_1: Akusalesu pana moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ uddhaccañcāti cattārome cetasikā sabbākusalasādhāraṇā nāma,
tika-abh07t0:118_0: 24. Doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccañcāti dvīsu paṭighasampayuttacittesu.
tika-abh07t0:128_1: Sobhanesu pana sobhanasādhāraṇā tāva ekūnavīsatime cetasikā sabbesupi ekūnasaṭṭhisobhanacittesu saṃvijjanti.
tika-abh07t0:129_1: Viratiyo pana tissopi lokuttaracittesu sabbathāpi niyatā ekatova labbhanti,
tika-abh07t0:129_2: lokiyesu pana kāmāvacarakusalesveva kadāci sandissanti visuṃ visuṃ.
tika-abh07t0:130_1: Appamaññāyo pana dvādasasu pañcamajjhānavajjitamahaggatacittesu ceva kāmāvacarakusalesu ca sahetukakāmāvacarakiriyacittesu
tika-abh07t0:130_2: cāti aṭṭhavīsaticittesveva kadāci nānā hutvā jāyanti,
tika-abh07t0:130_3: upekkhāsahagatesu panettha karuṇāmuditā na santīti keci vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:131_1: Paññā pana dvādasasu ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacaracittesu ceva sabbesupi pañcatiṃsamahaggatalokuttaracittesu
tika-abh07t0:137_0: Nānā kadāci māno ca, thina middhaṃ tathā saha.
tika-abh07t0:146_1: Lokuttaresu tāva aṭṭhasu paṭhamajjhānikacittesu aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
tika-abh07t0:146_2: appamaññāvajjitā tevīsati sobhanacetasikā ceti chattiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh07t0:146_6: pañcamajjhānikacittesupi upekkhāsahagatā te eva saṅgayhantīti sabbathāpi aṭṭhasu lokuttaracittesu pañcakajjhānavasena pañcadhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
tika-abh07t0:150_1: Mahaggatesu pana tīsu paṭhamajjhānikacittesu tāva aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
tika-abh07t0:150_2: viratittayavajjitā dvāvīsati sobhanacetasikā ceti pañcatiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh07t0:150_7: pañcamajjhānikacittesu pana pannarasasu appamaññāyo na labbhantīti sabbathāpi sattavīsatimahaggatacittesu
tika-abh07t0:154_1: Kāmāvacarasobhanesu pana kusalesu tāva paṭhamadvaye aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
tika-abh07t0:154_2: pañcavīsati sobhanacetasikā ceti aṭṭhatiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh07t0:154_7: Kiriyacittesupi virativajjitā tatheva catūsupi dukesu catudhāva saṅgayhanti.
tika-abh07t0:154_8: Tathā vipākesu ca appamaññāvirativajjitā te eva saṅgayhantīti sabbathāpi catuvīsatikāmāvacarasobhanacittesu dukavasena dvādasadhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
tika-abh07t0:164_1: Akusalesu pana lobhamūlesu tāva paṭhame asaṅkhārike aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
tika-abh07t0:164_2: akusalasādhāraṇā cattāro cāti sattarasa lobhadiṭṭhīhi saddhiṃ ekūnavīsati dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:166_0: 45. Tatiye tatheva pītivajjitā lobhadiṭṭhīhi saha aṭṭhārasa.
tika-abh07t0:168_1: Pañcame pana paṭighasampayutte asaṅkhārike doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccañcāti catūhi saddhiṃ pītivajjitā te eva vīsati dhammā saṅgayhanti,
tika-abh07t0:170_2: akusalasādhāraṇā cattāro cāti pannarasa dhammā uddhaccasahagate sampayujjanti.
tika-abh07t0:171_1: Vicikicchāsahagatacitte ca adhimokkhavirahitā vicikicchāsahagatā tatheva pannarasa dhammā samupalabbhantīti
tika-abh07t0:171_2: sabbathāpi dvādasākusalacittuppādesu paccekaṃ yojiyamānāpi gaṇanavasena sattadhāva saṅgahitā bhavantīti.
tika-abh07t0:174_0: 52. Sādhāraṇā ca cattāro, samānā ca dasāpare.
tika-abh07t0:177_0: 53. Ahetukesu pana hasanacitte tāva chandavajjitā aññasamānā dvādasa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:181_1: Dvipañcaviññāṇe pakiṇṇakavajjitā teyeva saṅgayhantīti sabbathāpi aṭṭhārasasu ahetukesu gaṇanavasena catudhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
tika-abh07t0:196_1: Tattha vedanāsaṅgahe tāva tividhā vedanā sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ adukkhamasukhā ceti,
tika-abh07t0:196_2: sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ somanassaṃ domanassaṃ upekkhāti ca bhedena pana pañcadhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:197_0: 4. Tattha sukhasahagataṃ kusalavipākaṃ kāyaviññāṇamekameva, tathā dukkhasahagataṃ akusalavipākaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:198_3: sukhasantīraṇahasanāni ca dveti aṭṭhārasa kāmāvacarasomanassasahagatacittāni ceva paṭhamadutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānasaṅkhātāni
tika-abh07t0:206_0: 10. Hetusaṅgahe hetū nāma lobho doso moho alobho adoso amoho cāti chabbidhā bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:210_1: Sesāni dasa akusalacittāni ceva ñāṇavippayuttāni dvādasa kāmāvacarasobhanāni ceti dvāvīsati dvihetukacittāni.
tika-abh07t0:211_1: Dvādasa ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacarasobhanāni ceva pañcatiṃsa mahaggatalokuttaracittāni ceti sattacattālīsa tihetukacittānīti.
tika-abh07t0:221_1: Tattha dve upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇāni ceva aṭṭha mahāvipākāni ca nava rūpārūpavipākāni ceti ekūnavīsati cittāni paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutikiccāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:227_0: 26. Aṭṭha mahāvipākāni ceva santīraṇattayañceti ekādasa tadārammaṇakiccāni.
tika-abh07t0:228_1: Tesu pana dve upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇacittāni paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇasantīraṇavasena pañcakiccāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:236_0: 34. Aṭṭhasaṭṭhi tathā dve ca, navāṭṭha dve yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:239_1: Dvārasaṅgahe dvārāni nāma cakkhudvāraṃ sotadvāraṃ ghānadvāraṃ jivhādvāraṃ kāyadvāraṃ manodvārañceti chabbidhāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:243_3: tathā pañcadvārāvajjanasotaviññāṇādivasena sotadvārādīsupi chacattālīseva bhavantīti sabbathāpi pañcadvāre catupaññāsa cittāni kāmāvacarāneva.
tika-abh07t0:246_1: Tesu pana pañcaviññāṇāni ceva mahaggatalokuttarajavanāni ceti chattiṃsa yathārahamekadvārikacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:256_1: Ālambaṇasaṅgahe ārammaṇāni nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ saddārammaṇaṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ rasārammaṇaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ dhammārammaṇañceti chabbidhāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:257_0: 49. Tattha rūpameva rūpārammaṇaṃ, tathā saddādayo saddārammaṇādīni.
tika-abh07t0:260_1: Manodvārikacittānaṃ pana chabbidhampi paccuppannamatītaṃ anāgataṃ kālavimuttañca yathārahamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:261_1: Dvāravimuttānañca paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutisaṅkhātānaṃ chabbidhampi yathāsambhavaṃ yebhuyyena bhavantare
tika-abh07t0:261_2: chadvāraggahitaṃ paccuppannamatītaṃ paññattibhūtaṃ vā kammakammanimittagatinimittasammataṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:274_0: Pañca sabbattha chacceti, sattadhā tattha saṅgaho.
tika-abh07t0:276_0: 64. Vatthusaṅgahe vatthūni nāma cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyahadayavatthu ceti chabbidhāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:280_0: 68. Tattha pañcaviññāṇadhātuyo yathākkamaṃ ekantena pañca pasādavatthūni nissāyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:281_0: 69. Pañcadvārāvajjanasampaṭicchanasaṅkhātā pana manodhātu ca hadayaṃ nissitāyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:282_1: Avasesā pana manoviññāṇadhātusaṅkhātā ca santīraṇamahāvipākapaṭighadvayapaṭhamamaggahasanarūpāvacaravasena hadayaṃ nissāyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:283_0: 71. Avasesā kusalākusalakiriyānuttaravasena pana nissāya vā anissāya vā.
tika-abh07t0:285_0: 73. Chavatthuṃ nissitā kāme, satta rūpe catubbidhā.
tika-abh07t0:296_0: 2.. Vīthimuttānaṃ pana kammakammanimittagatinimittavasena tividhā hoti visayappavatti.
tika-abh07t0:299_1: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇañceti cha viññāṇāni.
tika-abh07t0:301_1: Cha vīthiyo pana cakkhudvāravīthi sotadvāravīthi ghānadvāravīthi jivhādvāravīthi kāyadvāravīthi manodvāravīthi ceti dvāravasena vā,
tika-abh07t0:301_2: cakkhuviññāṇavīthi sotaviññāṇavīthi ghānaviññāṇavīthi jivhāviññāṇavīthi kāyaviññāṇavīthi manoviññāṇavīthi
tika-abh07t0:301_3: ceti viññāṇavasena vā dvārappavattā cittappavattiyo yojetabbā.
tika-abh07t0:303_1: Atimahantaṃ mahantaṃ parittaṃ atiparittañceti pañcadvāre manodvāre pana vibhūtamavibhūtañceti chadhā visayappavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:307_1: Ekacittakkhaṇātītāni vā bahucittakkhaṇātītāni vā ṭhitippattāneva pañcārammaṇāni pañcadvāre āpāthamāgacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:307_2: Tasmā yadi ekacittakkhaṇātītakaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthamāgacchati,
tika-abh07t0:307_3: tato dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge calite bhavaṅgasotaṃ vocchinditvā tameva rūpārammaṇaṃ āvajjantaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanacittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
tika-abh07t0:307_4: tato tassānantaraṃ tameva rūpaṃ passantaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:307_8: tato paraṃ ekūnatiṃsa kāmāvacarajavanesu yaṃkiñci laddhapaccayaṃ yebhuyyena sattakkhattuṃ javati,
tika-abh07t0:307_9: javanānubandhāni ca dve tadārammaṇapākāni yathārahaṃ pavattanti,
tika-abh07t0:309_1: Yāva tadārammaṇuppādā pana appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ mahantaṃ nāma,
tika-abh07t0:310_1: Yāva javanuppādāpi appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ parittaṃ nāma,
tika-abh07t0:310_2: tattha javanampi anuppajjitvā dvattikkhattuṃ voṭṭhabbanameva pavattati,
tika-abh07t0:311_1: Yāva voṭṭhabbanuppādā ca pana appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ nirodhāsannamārammaṇaṃ atiparittaṃ nāma,
tika-abh07t0:312_2: tathā sotadvārādīsu ceti sabbathāpi pañcadvāre tadārammaṇajavanavoṭṭhabbanamoghavārasaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:312_3: vārānaṃ yathākkamaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā visayappavatti catudhā veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:318_0: 18. Avibhūte panārammaṇe javanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hoti, natthi tadārammaṇuppādoti.
tika-abh07t0:323_0: 20. Appanājavanavāre pana vibhūtāvibhūtabhedo natthi, tathā tadārammaṇuppādo ca.
tika-abh07t0:324_2: catukkhattuṃ tikkhattumeva vā yathākkamaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhānantarameva yathārahaṃ catutthaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:324_3: pañcamaṃ vā chabbīsatimahaggatalokuttarajavanesu yathābhinīhāravasena yaṃ kiñci javanaṃ appanāvīthimotarati,
tika-abh07t0:335_1: Domanassasahagatajavanāvasāne ca pana tadārammaṇāniceva bhavaṅgāni ca upekkhāsahagatāneva bhavanti,
tika-abh07t0:335_2: tasmā yadi somanassapaṭisandhikassa domanassasahagatajavanāvasāne tadārammaṇasambhavo natthi,
tika-abh07t0:335_3: tadā yaṃ kiñci paricitapubbaṃ parittārammaṇamārabbha upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh07t0:336_1: Tathā kāmāvacarajavanāvasāne kāmāvacarasattānaṃ kāmāvacaradhammesveva ārammaṇabhūtesu tadārammaṇaṃ icchantīti.
tika-abh07t0:341_0: 31. Javanesu ca parittajavanavīthiyaṃ kāmāvacarajavanāni sattakkhattuṃ chakkhattumeva vā javanti.
tika-abh07t0:343_1: Bhagavato pana yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu lahukappavattiyaṃ cattāripañca vā paccavekkhaṇacittāni bhavantītipi vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:344_1: Ādikammikassa pana paṭhamakappanāyaṃ mahaggatajavanāniabhiññājavanāni ca sabbadāpi ekavārameva javanti,
tika-abh07t0:345_2: tato paraṃ dve tīṇi phalacittāni yathārahaṃ uppajjanti,
tika-abh07t0:346_0: 36. Nirodhasamāpattikāle dvikkhattuṃ catutthāruppajavanaṃ javati, tato paraṃ nirodhaṃ phusati.
tika-abh07t0:347_1: Vuṭṭhānakāle ca anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaphalaṃ vā yathārahamekavāraṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe bhavaṅgapātova hoti.
tika-abh07t0:348_0: 38. Sabbatthāpi samāpattivīthiyaṃ bhavaṅgasoto viya vīthiniyamo natthīti katvā bahūnipi labbhantīti.
tika-abh07t0:353_0: 40. Duhetukānamahetukānañca panettha kiriyajavanāni ceva appanājavanāni ca labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:355_0: 42. Duggatiyaṃ pana ñāṇavippayuttāni ca mahāvipākāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:356_0: 43. Tihetukesu ca khīṇāsavānaṃ kusalākusalajavanāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:359_0: 46. Anāgāmipuggalānaṃ pana paṭighajavanāni ca na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:368_0: 52. Sabbatthāpi ca taṃtaṃpasādarahitānaṃ taṃtaṃdvārikavīthicittāni na labbhanteva.
tika-abh07t0:373_0: 55. Iccevaṃ chadvārikacittappavatti yathāsambhavaṃ bhavaṅgantaritā yāvatāyukamabbocchinnā pavattati.
tika-abh07t0:379_4: catudhā maraṇuppatti ceti vīthimuttasaṅgahe cattāri catukkāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t0:381_0: 3. Tattha apāyabhūmi kāmasugatibhūmi rūpāvacarabhūmi arūpāvacarabhūmi ceti catasso bhūmiyo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:382_0: 4. Tāsu nirayo tiracchānayoni pettivisayo asurakāyo ceti apāyabhūmi catubbidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:383_1: Manussā cātumahārājikā tāvatiṃsā yāmā tusitā nimmānarati paranimmitavasavattī ceti kāmasugatibhūmi sattavidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:388_0: 10. Vehapphalā asaññasattā suddhāvāsā ceti catutthajjhānabhūmīti rūpāvacarabhūmi soḷasavidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:389_0: 11. Avihā atappā sudassā sudassī akaniṭṭhā ceti suddhāvāsabhūmi pañcavidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:390_1: Ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi viññāṇañcāyatanabhūmi ākiñcaññāyatanabhūmi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhūmi ceti arūpabhūmi catubbidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:397_1: Apāyapaṭisandhi kāmasugatipaṭisandhi rūpāvacarapaṭisandhi arūpāvacarapaṭisandhi ceti catubbidhā paṭisandhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:398_1: Tattha akusalavipākopekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ apāyabhūmiyaṃ okkantikkhaṇe paṭisandhi hutvā tato paraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ pariyosāne cavanaṃ hutvā vocchijjati,
tika-abh07t0:399_1: Kusalavipākopekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ pana kāmasugatiyaṃ manussānañceva jaccandhādīnaṃ bhummassitānañca
tika-abh07t0:400_0: 18. Mahāvipākāni pana aṭṭha sabbatthāpi kāmasugatiyaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:402_0: 20. Sā panāyaṃ dasavidhāpi kāmāvacarapaṭisandhicceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t0:403_0: 21. Tesu catunnaṃ apāyānaṃ manussānaṃ vinipātikāsurānañca āyuppamāṇagaṇanāya niyamo natthi.
tika-abh07t0:404_1: Cātumahārājikānaṃ pana devānaṃ dibbāni pañcavassasatāni āyuppamāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:411_2: Tathā tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ cavanakāle ca rūpameva pavattitvā nirujjhati,
tika-abh07t0:412_0: 29. Tesu brahmapārisajjānaṃ devānaṃ kappassa tatiyo bhāgo āyuppamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:428_0: 45. Tesu pana ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ vīsatikappasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:438_1: Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ ahosikammañceti pākakālavasena cattāri kammāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:439_0: 53. Tathā akusalaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ arūpāvacarakusalañceti pākaṭhānavasena.
tika-abh07t0:440_0: 54. Tattha akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammañceti kammadvāravasena tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:441_1: Pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro ceti kāyaviññattisaṅkhāte kāyadvāre bāhullavuttito kāyakammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:442_1: Musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo ceti vacīviññattisaṅkhāte vacīdvāre bāhullavuttito vacīkammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:443_1: Abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhi ceti aññatrāpi viññattiyā manasmiṃyeva bāhullavuttito manokammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:444_0: 58. Tesu pāṇātipāto pharusavācā byāpādo ca dosamūlena jāyanti.
tika-abh07t0:447_0: 61. Cittuppādavasena panetaṃ akusalaṃ sabbathāpi dvādasavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:448_3: manodvāre pavattaṃ manokammañceti kammadvāravasena tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:452_0: 66. Taṃ panetaṃ vīsatividhampi kāmāvacarakammamicceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t0:455_2: pavattiyaṃ pana sabbampi dvādasavidhaṃ sattākusalapākāni sabbatthāpi kāmaloke rūpaloke ca yathārahaṃ vipaccati.
tika-abh07t0:456_3: ahetukavipākāni pana aṭṭhapi sabbatthāpi kāmaloke rūpaloke ca yathārahaṃ vipaccati.
tika-abh07t0:457_1: Tatthāpi tihetukamukkaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ tihetukaṃ paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte soḷasa vipākāni vipaccati.
tika-abh07t0:458_1: Tihetukamomakaṃ dvihetukamukkaṭṭhañca kusalaṃ dvihetukaṃ paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte tihetukarahitāni dvādasa vipākāni vipaccati.
tika-abh07t0:459_1: Dvihetukamomakaṃ pana kusalaṃ ahetukameva paṭisandhiṃ deti,
tika-abh07t0:462_0: Tesaṃ dvādasa pākāni, dasāṭṭha ca yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh07t0:464_0: 75. Rūpāvacarakusalaṃ pana paṭhamajjhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā brahmapārisajjesu uppajjati.
tika-abh07t0:467_0: 78. Tathā dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānañca parittaṃ bhāvetvā parittābhesu.
tika-abh07t0:481_0: 89. Āyukkhayena kammakkhayena ubhayakkhayena upacchedakakammunā ceti catudhā maraṇuppatti nāma.
tika-abh07t0:482_1: Tathā ca marantānaṃ pana maraṇakāle yathārahaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ bhavantare paṭisandhijanakaṃ kammaṃ vā,
tika-abh07t0:482_3: anantaramuppajjamānabhave upalabhitabbamupabhogabhūtañca gatinimittaṃ vā kammabalena channaṃ dvārānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ paccupaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh07t0:482_4: tato paraṃ tameva tathopaṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ parisuddhaṃ upakkiliṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh07t0:482_5: vā upalabhitabbabhavānurūpaṃ tatthoṇataṃva cittasantānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pavattati bāhullena,
tika-abh07t0:482_6: tameva vā pana janakabhūtaṃ kammaṃ abhinavakaraṇavasena dvārappattaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:483_1: Paccāsannamaraṇassa tassa vīthicittāvasāne bhavaṅgakkhaye vā cavanavasena paccuppannabhavapariyosānabhūtaṃ cuticittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
tika-abh07t0:483_2: tasmiṃ niruddhāvasāne tassānantarameva tathāgahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha savatthukaṃ avatthukameva vā yathārahaṃ
tika-abh07t0:483_3: avijjānusayaparikkhittena taṇhānusayamūlakena saṅkhārena janiyamānaṃ sampayuttehi pariggayhamānaṃ sahajātānamadhiṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:483_4: pubbaṅgamabhūtaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasena paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ mānasaṃ uppajjamānameva patiṭṭhāti
tika-abh07t0:484_1: Maraṇāsannavīthiyaṃ panettha mandappavattāni pañceva javanāni pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni,
tika-abh07t0:484_2: tasmā yadi paccuppannārammaṇesu āpāthagatesu dharantesveva maraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t0:484_3: tadā paṭisandhibhavaṅgānampi paccuppannārammaṇatā labbhatīti katvā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhiyā chadvāraggahitaṃ
tika-abh07t0:486_1: Tathā arūpapaṭisandhiyā ca mahaggatabhūtaṃ paññattibhūtañca kammanimittameva yathārahamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:495_1: Iccevaṃ gahitapaṭisandhikānaṃ pana paṭisandhinirodhānantarato pabhuti tamevārammaṇamārabbha tadeva cittaṃ
tika-abh07t0:495_2: yāva cuticittuppādā asati vīthicittuppāde bhavassa aṅgabhāvena bhavaṅgasantatisaṅkhātaṃ mānasaṃ abbocchinnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:496_0: 100. Pariyosāne ca cavanavasena cuticittaṃ hutvā nirujjhati.
tika-abh07t0:497_0: 101. Tato parañca paṭisandhādayo rathacakkamiva yathākkamaṃ eva parivattantā pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:510_2: catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpanti duvidhampetaṃ rūpaṃ ekādasavidhena saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t0:511_0: 4. Kathaṃ? Pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu bhūtarūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:512_0: 5. Cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo pasādarūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:513_0: 6. Rūpaṃ saddo gandho raso āpodhātuvivajjitaṃ bhūtattayasaṅkhātaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ gocararūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:518_1: Iti ca aṭṭhārasavidhampetaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvarūpaṃ salakkhaṇarūpaṃ nipphannarūpaṃ rūparūpaṃ sammasanarūpanti ca saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t0:521_0: 14. Rūpassa lahutā mudutā kammaññatā viññattidvayaṃ vikārarūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:522_0: 15. Rūpassa upacayo santati jaratā aniccatā lakkhaṇarūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:523_1: Jātirūpameva panettha upacayasantatināmena pavuccatīti ekādasavidhampetaṃ rūpaṃ aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ hoti sarūpavasena.
tika-abh07t0:527_0: Paricchedo ca viññatti, vikāro lakkhaṇanti ca;
tika-abh07t0:531_1: Sabbañca panetaṃ rūpaṃ ahetukaṃ sappaccayaṃ sāsavaṃ saṅkhataṃ lokiyaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ anārammaṇaṃ appahātabbamevāti
tika-abh07t0:532_0: 19. Kathaṃ? Pasādasaṅkhātaṃ pañcavidhampi ajjhattikarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ bāhirarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:533_0: 20. Pasādahadayasaṅkhātaṃ chabbidhampi vatthurūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ avatthurūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:534_0: 21. Pasādaviññattisaṅkhātaṃ sattavidhampi dvārarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ advārarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:535_0: 22. Pasādabhāvajīvitasaṅkhātaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi indriyarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ anindriyarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:540_0: 27. Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā bhūtacatukkañceti aṭṭhavidhampi avinibbhogarūpaṃ, itaraṃ vinibbhogarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:545_0: 29. Kammaṃ cittaṃ utu āhāro ceti cattāri rūpasamuṭṭhānāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:546_1: Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacarañceti pañcavīsatividhampi kusalākusalakammamabhisaṅkhataṃ ajjhattikasantāne
tika-abh07t0:547_1: Arūpavipākadvipañcaviññāṇavajjitaṃ pañcasattatividhampi cittaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgamupādāya jāyantameva samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh07t0:551_1: Sītuṇhotusamaññātā tejodhātu ṭhitippattāva utusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca yathārahaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh07t0:552_0: 36. Ojāsaṅkhāto āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ ajjhoharaṇakāle ṭhānappattova samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh07t0:557_0: 41. Avinibbhogarūpāni ceva ākāsadhātu ca. Catūhi sambhūtāni.
tika-abh07t0:565_0: 45. Ekuppādā ekanirodhā ekanissayā sahavuttino ekavīsati rūpakalāpā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:566_1: Tattha jīvitaṃ avinibbhogarūpañca cakkhunā saha cakkhudasakanti pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:566_2: Tathā sotādīhi saddhiṃ sotadasakaṃ ghānadasakaṃ jivhādasakaṃ kāyadasakaṃ itthibhāvadasakaṃ pumbhāvadasakaṃ vatthudasakañceti yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:568_1: Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ saddanavakaṃ lahutādekādasakaṃ saddalahutādidvādasakañceti cattāro utusamuṭṭhānakalāpā.
tika-abh07t0:570_1: Tattha suddhaṭṭhakaṃ saddanavakañceti dve utusamuṭṭhānakalāpā bahiddhāpi labbhanti,
tika-abh07t0:572_0: Nava cha caturo dveti, kalāpā ekavīsati.
tika-abh07t0:577_0: 52. Sabbānipi panetāni rūpāni kāmaloke yathārahaṃ anūnāni pavattiyaṃ upalabbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:578_1: Paṭisandhiyaṃ pana saṃsedajānañceva opapātikānañca cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyabhāvavatthudasakasaṅkhātāni satta dasakāni pātubhavanti ukkaṭṭhavasena,
tika-abh07t0:578_2: omakavasena pana cakkhusotaghānabhāvadasakāni kadācipi na labbhanti,
tika-abh07t0:579_1: Gabbhaseyyakasattānaṃ pana kāyabhāvavatthudasakasaṅkhātāni tīṇi dasakāni pātubhavanti,
tika-abh07t0:579_3: tato paraṃ pavattikāle kamena cakkhudasakādīni ca pātubhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:580_4: ojāpharaṇamupādāya āhārasamuṭṭhānā ceti catusamuṭṭhānarūpakalāpasantati kāmaloke dīpajālā viya,
tika-abh07t0:581_1: Maraṇakāle pana cuticittoparisattarasamacittassa ṭhitikālamupādāya kammajarūpāni na uppajjanti,
tika-abh07t0:581_2: puretaramuppannāni ca kammajarūpāni cuticittasamakālameva pavattitvā nirujjhanti,
tika-abh07t0:581_4: tato paraṃ utusamuṭṭhānarūpaparamparā yāva matakaḷevarasaṅkhātā pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:584_1: Rūpaloke pana ghānajivhākāyabhāvadasakāni ca āhārajakalāpāni ca na labbhanti,
tika-abh07t0:584_2: tasmā tesaṃ paṭisandhikāle cakkhusotavatthuvasena tīṇi dasakāni jīvitanavakañceti cattāro kammasamuṭṭhānakalāpā,
tika-abh07t0:586_1: Iccevaṃ kāmarūpāsaññīsaṅkhātesu tīsu ṭhānesu paṭisandhipavattivasena duvidhā rūpappavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:590_0: Na labbhanti pavatte tu, na kiñcipi na labbhati.
tika-abh07t0:593_1: Nibbānaṃ pana lokuttarasaṅkhātaṃ catumaggañāṇena sacchikātabbaṃ maggaphalānamārammaṇabhūtaṃ vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhantattā nibbānanti pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:594_1: Tadetaṃ sabhāvato ekavidhampi saupādisesanibbānadhātu anupādisesanibbānadhātu ceti duvidhaṃ hoti kāraṇapariyāyena.
tika-abh07t0:595_0: 64. Tathā suññataṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitañceti tividhaṃ hoti ākārabhedena.
tika-abh07t0:605_1: Akusalasaṅgaho missakasaṅgaho bodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho sabbasaṅgaho ceti samuccayasaṅgaho catubbidho veditabbo.
tika-abh07t0:607_0: 3. Kathaṃ? Akusalasaṅgahe tāva cattāro āsavā – kāmāsavo bhavāsavo diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo.
tika-abh07t0:608_0: 4. Cattāro oghā – kāmogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjogho.
tika-abh07t0:609_0: 5. Cattāro yogā – kāmayogo bhavayogo diṭṭhiyogo avijjāyogo.
tika-abh07t0:611_0: 7. Cattāro upādānā – kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:612_2: kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:613_2: kāmarāgānusayo bhavarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo avijjānusayo.
tika-abh07t0:614_2: kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ rūparāgasaṃyojanaṃ arūparāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ mānasaṃyojanaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ
tika-abh07t0:615_2: kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ mānasaṃyojanaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaṃ
tika-abh07t0:616_0: 12. Dasa kilesā – lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:617_1: Āsavādīsu panettha kāmabhavanāmena tabbatthukā taṇhā adhippetā,
tika-abh07t0:617_2: sīlabbataparāmāso idaṃsaccābhiniveso attavādupādo ca tathāpavattaṃ diṭṭhigatameva pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:625_0: 15. Missakasaṅgahe cha hetū – lobho doso moho alobho adoso amoho.
tika-abh07t0:626_0: 16. Satta jhānaṅgāni – vitakko vicāro pīti ekaggatā somanassaṃ domanassaṃ upekkhā.
tika-abh07t0:627_2: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi micchādiṭṭhi
tika-abh07t0:628_2: cakkhundriyaṃ sotindriyaṃ ghānindriyaṃ jivhindriyaṃ kāyindriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:628_3: manindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ domanassindriyaṃ upekkhindriyaṃ saddhindriyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:628_4: vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:629_2: saddhābalaṃ vīriyabalaṃ satibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ paññābalaṃ hiribalaṃ ottappabalaṃ ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:630_0: 20. Cattāro adhipatī – chandādhipati vīriyādhipati cittādhipati vīmaṃsādhipati.
tika-abh07t0:631_0: 21. Cattāro āhārā – kabaḷīkāro āhāro, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṃ catutthaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:636_0: 26. Pañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgāni, avīriyesu balāni, ahetukesu maggaṅgāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:637_0: 27. Tathā vicikicchācitte ekaggatā maggindriyabalabhāvaṃ na gacchati.
tika-abh07t0:639_0: 29. Cha hetū pañca jhānaṅgā, maggaṅgā nava vatthuto.
tika-abh07t0:644_1: Bodhipakkhiyasaṅgahe cattāro satipaṭṭhānā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:645_1: Cattāro sammappadhānā uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ pahānāya vāyāmo,
tika-abh07t0:646_0: 32. Cattāro iddhipādā – chandiddhipādo vīriyiddhipādo cittiddhipādo vīmaṃsiddhipādo.
tika-abh07t0:647_0: 33. Pañcindriyāni – saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:648_0: 34. Pañca balāni – saddhābalaṃ vīriyabalaṃ satibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ paññābalaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:649_2: satisambojjhaṅgo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo pītisambojjhaṅgo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo samādhisambojjhaṅgo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
tika-abh07t0:650_2: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
tika-abh07t0:651_0: 37. Ettha pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti sammāsati ekāva pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:663_0: 41. Sabbe lokuttare honti, na vā saṅkappapītiyo.
tika-abh07t0:668_2: cakkhāyatanaṃ sotāyatanaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ manāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ
tika-abh07t0:669_2: cakkhudhātu sotadhātu ghānadhātu jivhādhātu kāyadhātu rūpadhātu saddadhātu gandhadhātu rasadhātu phoṭṭhabbadhātu
tika-abh07t0:669_3: cakkhuviññāṇadhātu sotaviññāṇadhātu ghānaviññāṇadhātu jivhāviññāṇadhātu kāyaviññāṇadhātu manodhātu dhammadhātu
tika-abh07t0:671_1: Ettha pana cetasikasukhumarūpanibbānavasena ekūnasattati dhammā dhammāyatanadhammadhātūti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:679_0: 52. Dukkhaṃ tebhūmakaṃ vaṭṭaṃ, taṇhā samudayo bhave.
tika-abh07t0:680_0: Nirodho nāma nibbānaṃ, maggo lokuttaro mato.
tika-abh07t0:686_0: 1. Yesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ, ye dhammā paccayā yathā.
tika-abh07t0:688_0: 2. Paṭiccasamuppādanayo paṭṭhānanayo ceti paccayasaṅgaho duvidho veditabbo.
tika-abh07t0:691_12: Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti ayamettha paṭiccasamuppādanayo.
tika-abh07t0:692_1: Tattha tayo addhā dvādasaṅgāni vīsatākārā tisandhi catusaṅkhepā tīṇi vaṭṭāni dve mūlāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t0:693_3: majjhe aṭṭha paccuppanno addhāti tayo addhā.
tika-abh07t0:694_1: Avijjā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ nāmarūpaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ phasso vedanā taṇhā upādānaṃ bhavo jāti jarāmaraṇanti dvādasaṅgāni.
tika-abh07t0:700_3: upapattibhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadeso avasesā ca vipākavaṭṭanti tīṇi vaṭṭāni.
tika-abh07t0:708_1: Hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccayo adhipatipaccayo anantarapaccayo samanantarapaccayo sahajātapaccayo aññamaññapaccayo
tika-abh07t0:708_2: nissayapaccayo upanissayapaccayo purejātapaccayo pacchājātapaccayo āsevanapaccayo kammapaccayo vipākapaccayo
tika-abh07t0:708_3: āhārapaccayo indriyapaccayo jhānapaccayo maggapaccayo sampayuttapaccayo vippayuttapaccayo atthipaccayo
tika-abh07t0:709_0: 15. Chadhā nāmaṃ tu nāmassa, pañcadhā nāmarūpinaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:710_0: Ekadhā puna rūpassa, rūpaṃ nāmassa cekadhā.
tika-abh07t0:712_0: Dvayassa navadhā ceti, chabbidhā paccayā kathaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:713_1: Anantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarasamanantaranatthivigatavasena,
tika-abh07t0:713_3: sahajātā cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ sampayuttavaseneti ca chadhā nāmaṃ nāmassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t0:714_4: vipākakkhandhā aññamaññaṃ sahajātānaṃ rūpānaṃ vipākavaseneti ca pañcadhā nāmaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t0:715_1: Pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātavaseneti ekadhāva nāmaṃ rūpassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t0:716_1: Cha vatthūni pavattiyaṃ sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ pañcārammaṇāni ca pañcaviññāṇavīthiyā purejātavaseneti ekadhāva rūpaṃ nāmassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t0:717_0: 20. Ārammaṇavasena upanissayavaseneti ca duvidhā paññattināmarūpāni nāmasseva paccayā honti.
tika-abh07t0:719_0: 22. Upanissayo pana tividho hoti – ārammaṇūpanissayo anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayo ceti.
tika-abh07t0:722_1: Rāgādayo pana dhammā saddhādayo ca sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ puggalo bhojanaṃ utusenāsanañca yathārahaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca kusalādidhammānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:722_2: kammaṃ vipākānanti ca bahudhā hoti pakatūpanissayo.
tika-abh07t0:723_1: Adhipatisahajātaaññamaññanissayaāhāraindriyavippayuttaatthiavigatavaseneti yathārahaṃ navadhā nāmarūpāni nāmarūpānaṃ paccayā bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:724_2: sahajātādhipati catubbidhopi sahajātavasena sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca duvidho hoti adhipatipaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:725_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamaññanti ca tividho hoti sahajātapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:726_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamaññanti ca tividho hoti aññamaññapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:727_3: cha vatthūni sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnanti ca tividho hoti nissayapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:728_2: arūpino āhārā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca duvidho hoti āhārapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:729_3: arūpino indriyā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca tividho hoti indriyapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:730_3: pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātavasena cha vatthūni pavattiyaṃ sattannaṃ
tika-abh07t0:730_4: viññāṇadhātūnaṃ purejātavaseneti ca tividho hoti vippayuttapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:734_0: 35. Ārammaṇūpanissayakammatthipaccayesu ca sabbepi paccayā samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:735_2: paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpānañca vasena duvidhaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:736_0: 37. Iti tekālikā dhammā, kālamuttā ca sambhavā.
tika-abh07t0:740_3: nibbānañceti pañcavidhampi arūpanti ca nāmanti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:742_0: 39. Tato avasesā paññatti pana paññāpiyattā paññatti, paññāpanato paññattīti ca duvidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:743_6: taṃtaṃbhūtanimittaṃ bhāvanāvisesañca upādāya kasiṇanimittādikā ceti evamādippabhedā pana paramatthato
tika-abh07t0:743_7: avijjamānāpi atthacchāyākārena cittuppādānamārammaṇabhūtā taṃ taṃ upādāya upanidhāya kāraṇaṃ katvā tathā
tika-abh07t0:743_8: tathā parikappiyamānā saṅkhāyati samaññāyati voharīyati paññāpīyatīti paññattīti pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:745_1: Tattha yadā pana paramatthato vijjamānaṃ rūpavedanādiṃ etāya paññāpenti,
tika-abh07t0:745_3: Yadā pana paramatthato avijjamānaṃ bhūmipabbatādiṃ etāya paññāpenti,
tika-abh07t0:745_5: Ubhinnaṃ pana vomissakavasena sesā yathākkamaṃ chaḷabhiñño,
tika-abh07t0:758_1: Rāgacaritā dosacaritā mohacaritā saddhācaritā buddhicaritā vitakkacaritā ceti chabbidhena caritasaṅgaho.
tika-abh07t0:760_0: 4. Parikammabhāvanā upacārabhāvanā appanābhāvanā ceti tisso bhāvanā.
tika-abh07t0:762_0: 5. Parikammanimittaṃ uggahanimittaṃ paṭibhāganimittañceti tīṇi nimittāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t0:763_1: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ āpokasiṇaṃ tejokasiṇaṃ vāyokasiṇaṃ nīlakasiṇaṃ pītakasiṇaṃ lohitakasiṇaṃ odātakasiṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:763_2: ākāsakasiṇaṃ ālokakasiṇañceti imāni dasa kasiṇāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:764_1: Uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakaṃ vicchiddakaṃ vikkhāyitakaṃ vikkhittakaṃ hatavikkhittakaṃ lohitakaṃ puḷavakaṃ aṭṭhikañceti ime dasa asubhā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:765_1: Buddhānussati dhammānussati saṃghānussati sīlānussati cāgānussati devatānussati upasamānussati maraṇānussati
tika-abh07t0:765_2: kāyagatāsati ānāpānassati ceti imā dasa anussatiyo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:766_0: 9. Mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhā ceti imā catasso appamaññāyo nāma, brahmavihāroti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:769_1: Ākāsānañcāyatanādayo cattāro āruppā nāmāti sabbathāpi samathaniddese cattālīsa kammaṭṭhānāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:771_0: 13. Caritāsu pana dasa asubhā kāyagatāsatisaṅkhātā koṭṭhāsabhāvanā ca rāgacaritassa sappāyā.
tika-abh07t0:772_0: 14. Catasso appamaññāyo nīlādīni ca cattāri kasiṇāni dosacaritassa.
tika-abh07t0:776_1: Sesāni pana sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni sabbesampi sappāyāni,
tika-abh07t0:779_2: buddhānussatiādīsu aṭṭhasu saññāvavatthānesu cāti dasasukammaṭṭhānesu upacārabhāvanāva sampajjati,
tika-abh07t0:788_0: 26. Nimittesu pana parikammanimittaṃ uggahanimittañca sabbatthāpi yathārahaṃ pariyāyena labbhanteva.
tika-abh07t0:789_2: tattha hi paṭibhāganimittamārabbha upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhi ca pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:790_1: Ādikammikassa hi pathavīmaṇḍalādīsu nimittaṃ uggaṇhantassa tamārammaṇaṃ parikammanimittanti pavuccati,
tika-abh07t0:791_1: Yadā pana taṃ nimittaṃ cittena samuggahitaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t0:792_1: Tathā samāhitassa panetassa tato paraṃ tasmiṃ uggahanimitte parikammasamādhinā bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa
tika-abh07t0:792_2: yadā tappaṭibhāgaṃ vatthudhammavimuccitaṃ paññattisaṅkhātaṃ bhāvanāmayamārammaṇaṃ citte sannisannaṃ samappitaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t0:793_0: 31. Tato paṭṭhāya paripanthavippahīnā kāmāvacarasamādhisaṅkhātā upacārabhāvanā nipphannā nāma hoti.
tika-abh07t0:794_1: Tato paraṃ tameva paribhāganimittaṃ upacārasamādhinā samāsevantassa rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānamappeti.
tika-abh07t0:795_1: Tato paraṃ tameva paṭhamajjhānaṃ āvajjanaṃ samāpajjanaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā ceti imāhi
tika-abh07t0:795_2: pañcahi vasitāhi vasībhūtaṃ katvā vitakkādikamoḷārikaṅgaṃ pahānāya vicārādisukhumaṅgupattiyā padahato
tika-abh07t0:798_1: Ākāsavajjitakasiṇesu pana yaṃ kiñci kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā laddhamākāsaṃ anantavasena parikammaṃ karontassa paṭhamāruppamappeti.
tika-abh07t0:799_0: 37. Tameva paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ anantavasena parikammaṃ karontassa dutiyāruppamappeti.
tika-abh07t0:800_0: 38. Tameva paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvaṃ pana “natthi kiñcī”ti parikammaṃ karontassa tatiyāruppamappeti.
tika-abh07t0:802_1: Avasesesu ca dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu buddhaguṇādikamārammaṇamārabbha parikammaṃ katvā tasmiṃ nimitte sādhukamuggahite tattheva parikammañca samādhiyati,
tika-abh07t0:803_1: Abhiññāvasena pavattamānaṃ pana rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānaṃ abhiññāpādakapañcamajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā adhiṭṭheyyādikamāvajjetvā
tika-abh07t0:811_1: Vipassanākammaṭṭhāne pana sīlavisuddhi cittavisuddhi diṭṭhivisuddhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi
tika-abh07t0:813_0: 45. Aniccānupassanā dukkhānupassanā anattānupassanā ceti tisso anupassanā.
tika-abh07t0:814_1: Sammasanañāṇaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ bhaṅgañāṇaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ ādīnavañāṇaṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:815_0: 47. Suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho ceti tayo vimokkhā.
tika-abh07t0:816_0: 48. Suññatānupassanā animittānupassanā appaṇihitānupassānā ceti tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t0:817_1: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ paccayasannissitasīlañceti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ sīlavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:818_0: 50. Upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhi ceti duvidhopi samādhi cittavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:820_0: 52. Tesameva ca nāmarūpānaṃ paccayapariggaho kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:821_1: Tato paraṃ pana tathāpariggahitesu sappaccayesu tebhūmakasaṅkhāresu atītādibhedabhinnesu khandhādinayamārabbha
tika-abh07t0:821_4: anattā asārakaṭṭhenā”ti addhānavasena santativasena khaṇavasena vā sammasanañāṇena lakkhaṇattayaṃ sammasantassa
tika-abh07t0:821_5: tesveva paccayavasena khaṇavasena ca udayabbayañāṇena udayabbayaṃ samanupassantassa ca –
tika-abh07t0:825_1: Tathā paripanthavimuttassa pana tassa udayabbayañāṇato paṭṭhāya yā vānulomā tilakkhaṇaṃ vipassanāparamparāya
tika-abh07t0:826_1: Tassevaṃ paṭipajjantassa pana vipassanāparipākamāgamma “idāni appanā uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgaṃ vocchijjitvā
tika-abh07t0:826_2: uppannamanodvārāvajjanānantaraṃ dve tīṇi vipassanācittāni yaṃ kiñci aniccādilakkhaṇamārabbha parikammopacārānulomanāmena
tika-abh07t0:827_0: 56. Yā sikhāppattā, sā sānulomā saṅkhārupekkhā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:829_1: Tassānantarameva maggo dukkhasaccaṃ parijānanto samudayasaccaṃ pajahanto,
tika-abh07t0:830_1: Tato paraṃ dve tīṇi phalacittāni pavattitvā bhavaṅgapātova hoti,
tika-abh07t0:832_0: Hīne kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vāna vā.
tika-abh07t0:837_0: 61. Tattha anattānupassanā attābhinivesaṃ muñcantī suññatānupassanā nāma vimokkhamukhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:840_0: 64. Tasmā yadi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā anattato vipassati, suññato vimokkho nāma hoti maggo.
tika-abh07t0:841_0: 65. Yadi aniccato vipassati, animitto vimokkho nāma.
tika-abh07t0:842_2: appaṇihito vimokkho nāmāti ca maggo vipassanāgamanavasena tīṇi nāmāni labhati,
tika-abh07t0:843_1: Phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pana yathāvuttanayena vipassantānaṃ yathāsakaphalamuppajjamānampi vipassanāgamanavaseneva suññatādivimokkhoti ca pavuccati,
tika-abh07t0:843_2: ārammaṇavasena pana sarasavasena ca nāmattayaṃ sabbattha sabbesampi samameva ca.
tika-abh07t0:846_1: Ettha pana sotāpattimaggaṃ bhāvetvā diṭṭhivicikicchāpahānena pahīnāpāyagamano sattakkhattuparamo sotāpanno nāma hoti.
tika-abh07t0:847_1: Sakadāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetvā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanukarattā sakadāgāmī nāma hoti sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā.
tika-abh07t0:848_1: Anāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetvā kāmarāgabyāpādānamanavasesappahānena anāgāmī nāma hoti anāgantvā itthattaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:849_1: Arahattamaggaṃ bhāvetvā anavasesakilesappahānena arahā nāma hoti khīṇāsavo loke aggadakkhiṇeyyoti.
tika-abh07t0:853_2: tattha yathākkamaṃ paṭhamajjhānādimahaggatasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha gate saṅkhāradhamme
tika-abh07t0:853_3: tattha tattheva vipassanto yāva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ gantvā tato paraṃ adhiṭṭheyyādikaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā
tika-abh07t0:853_5: tassa dvinnaṃ appanājavanānaṃ parato vocchijjati cittasantati,
tika-abh07t0:854_2: arahato arahattaphalacittaṃ ekavārameva pavattitvā bhavaṅgapāto hoti,
tika-abh07t0:882_0: (Gha) porāṇehi anekāpi, katā yā pana vaṇṇanā;
tika-abh07t0:883_0: Na tāhi sakkā sabbattha, attho viññātave idha.
tika-abh07t0:888_2: abhidhammatthasaṅgaha”nti etena abhidheyyakaraṇappakārapakaraṇābhidhānāni abhidhammatthānaṃ idha saṅgahetabbabhāvadassanena
tika-abh07t0:888_6: Payojanaṃ pana saṅgahapadena sāmatthiyato dassitameva abhidhammatthānaṃ ekattha saṅgahe sati taduggahaparipucchādivasena tesaṃ sarūpāvabodhassa,
tika-abh07t0:889_0: Tattha ratanattayapaṇāmappayojanaṃ tāva bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā,
tika-abh07t0:889_4: sā ca vandaneyyavandakānaṃ khettajjhāsayasampadāhi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa
tika-abh07t0:889_7: Tasmā pakaraṇārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ yathāraddhapakaraṇassa anantarāyena parisamāpanatthañceva
tika-abh07t0:889_9: Abhidheyyakathanaṃ pana viditābhidheyyasseva ganthassa viññūhi uggahaṇādivasena paṭipajjitabbabhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:889_13: sasaddhammagaṇuttamaṃ atulaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ abhivādiya abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṃ bhāsissanti sambandho.
tika-abh07t0:890_0: Tattha sammā sāmañca sabbadhamme abhisambuddhoti sammā sambuddho, bhagavā.
tika-abh07t0:890_1: So hi saṅkhatāsaṅkhatabhedaṃ sakalampi dhammajātaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasena sammā sayaṃ vicitopacitapāramitāsambhūtena
tika-abh07t0:890_4: atha vā budhadhātussa jāgaraṇavikasanatthesupi pavattanato sammā sāmañca paṭibuddho anaññapaṭibodhito
tika-abh07t0:890_8: Yathāvuttavacanatthayogepi sammāsambuddhasaddassa bhagavati samaññāvasena pavattattā “atula”nti iminā viseseti.
tika-abh07t0:890_11: Atha vā sammitatthe akārapaccayavasena tulāya sammito tulo,
tika-abh07t0:890_14: natthi etassa vā tulo sadisoti atulo sadevake loke aggapuggalabhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:890_17: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā…pe…
tika-abh07t0:891_0: Ettāvatā ca hetuphalasattūpakārasampadāvasena tīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā katā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:891_7: Sakalalokanayanābhisekabhūtā pana lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitā attabhāvasampatti rūpakāyasampadā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:891_11: Tadaññasattānaṃ pana lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa yānattayamukhena sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanā payogo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:892_0: Tattha purimā dve phalasampadā “sammāsambuddha”nti iminā dassitā,
tika-abh07t0:892_3: tadupāyabhūtā pana hetusampadā dvīhipi sāmatthiyato dassitā tathāvidhahetubyatirekena tadubhayasampattīnamasambhavato,
tika-abh07t0:893_0: Tadevaṃ tividhāvatthāsaṅgahitathomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ buddharatanaṃ vanditvā idāni sesaratanānampi paṇāmamārabhanto āha “sasaddhammagaṇuttama”nti.
tika-abh07t0:893_1: Guṇībhūtānampi hi dhammasaṃghānaṃ abhivādetabbabhāvo sahayogena viññāyati yathā “saputtadāro āgatoti puttadārassāpi āgamana”nti.
tika-abh07t0:894_1: vaṭṭadukkhesu ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo,
tika-abh07t0:894_6: nibbānassa ca ārammaṇabhāvena tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāya nippariyāyato labbhati,
tika-abh07t0:894_8: pariyattiyā ca tadadhigamahetutāyāti ubhinnampi pariyāyatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:894_10: santo vā saṃvijjamāno na titthiyaparikappito attā viya paramatthato avijjamāno santo vā pasattho svākkhātatādiguṇayogato
tika-abh07t0:894_11: na bāhirakadhammo viya ekantanindito dhammoti saddhammo,
tika-abh07t0:894_12: gaṇo ca so aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ samūhabhāvato uttamo ca suppaṭipannatādiguṇavisesayogato, gaṇānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:894_13: gaṇesu vā devamanussādi samūhesu uttamo yathāvuttaguṇavasenāti gaṇuttamo,
tika-abh07t0:895_3: Nibbattitaparamatthabhāvena abhi visiṭṭhā dhammā etthātiādinā abhidhammo,
tika-abh07t0:897_1: Evaṃ tāva yathādhippetappayojananimittaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmādikaṃ vidhāya idāni yesaṃ abhidhammatthānaṃ saṅgahaṇavasena idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ paṭṭhapīyati,
tika-abh07t0:897_2: te tāva saṅkhepato uddisanto āha “tattha vuttā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:897_4: khandhādivasena ca vuttā abhidhammatthā paramatthato sammutiṃ ṭhapetvā nibbattitaparamatthavasena cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandho,
tika-abh07t0:897_7: nibbānaṃ maggaphalānamārammaṇabhūto asaṅkhatadhammoti evaṃ catudhā catūhākārehi ṭhitāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:897_9: paramassa vā uttamassa ñāṇassa attho gocaroti paramattho.
tika-abh07t0:898_3: Satipi hi nissayasamanantarādipaccayena vinā ārammaṇena cittamuppajjatīti tassa taṃlakkhaṇatā vuttā,
tika-abh07t0:898_5: Cintenti vā etena karaṇabhūtena sampayuttadhammāti cittaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:898_7: Yathāpaccayaṃ hi pavattimattameva yadidaṃ sabhāvadhammo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:898_8: Evañca katvā sabbesampi paramatthadhammānaṃ bhāvasādhanameva nippariyāyato labbhati,
tika-abh07t0:898_10: Sakasakakiccesu hi dhammānaṃ attappadhānatāsamāropanena kattubhāvo ca,
tika-abh07t0:898_11: tadanukūlabhāvena sahajātadhammasamūhe kattubhāvasamāropanena paṭipādetabbadhammassa karaṇattañca pariyāyatova labbhati,
tika-abh07t0:898_12: tathānidassanaṃ pana dhammasabhāvavinimuttassa kattādino abhāvaparidīpanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:900_0: Citaṃ kammakilesehi, citaṃ tāyati vā tathā;
tika-abh07t0:902_1: Na hi taṃ cittena vinā ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthaṃ asati citte sabbena sabbaṃ anuppajjanato,
tika-abh07t0:902_2: cittaṃ pana kenaci cetasikena vināpi ārammaṇe pavattatīti taṃ cetasikameva cittāyattavuttikaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:902_4: etena sukhādīnaṃ acetanattaniccattādayo vippaṭipattiyopi paṭikkhittā honti.
tika-abh07t0:903_8: Itarathā hi “ruppatī”ti avisesavacaneneva pariyattanti kiṃ sītādiggahaṇena,
tika-abh07t0:903_9: taṃ pana sītādinā phuṭṭhassa ruppanaṃ vibhūtataraṃ,
tika-abh07t0:903_12: na hi tattha upaghātakā sītādayo atthīti?
tika-abh07t0:903_16: atha vā taṃsabhāvānativattanato tattha rūpavohāroti alamatippapañcena.
tika-abh07t0:904_0: Bhavābhavaṃ vinanato saṃsibbanato vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhantaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:907_1: Idāni yasmā vibhāgavantānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgena vinā na hoti,
tika-abh07t0:907_2: tasmā yathāuddiṭṭhānaṃ abhidhammatthānaṃ uddesakkamena vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ cittaṃ tāva bhūmijātisampayogādivasena
tika-abh07t0:907_3: vibhajitvā niddisitumārabhanto āha “tattha cittaṃ tāvā”tyādi. Tāva-
tika-abh07t0:907_5: Yathāuddiṭṭhesu catūsu abhidhammatthesu paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ niddisīyatīti ayañhetthattho.
tika-abh07t0:907_15: Yebhuyyena caraṇassa hi adhippetattā rūpārūpabhavesu pavattassāpi imassa kāmāvacarabhāvo upapanno hoti.
tika-abh07t0:907_16: Kāmabhavoyeva vā kāmo ettha avacaratīti kāmāvacaro,
tika-abh07t0:907_17: tattha pavattampi cittaṃ nissite nissayavohārena kāmāvacaraṃ “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”tyādīsu viyāti alamativisāraṇiyā kathāya.
tika-abh07t0:910_4: Ubhayampi vā saha nibbānena lokato uttaraṃ adhikaṃ yathāvuttaguṇavasenevāti lokuttaraṃ.
tika-abh07t0:913_1: Imesu pana catūsu cittesu kāmāvacaracittassa kusalākusalavipākakiriyabhedena catubbidhabhāvepi pāpāhetukavajjānaṃ ekūnasaṭṭhiyā,
tika-abh07t0:913_2: ekanavutiyā vā cittānaṃ sobhananāmena vohārakaraṇatthaṃ “pāpāhetukamuttāni ‘sobhanānī’ti vuccare”ti evaṃ
tika-abh07t0:913_4: tesu ca bhavesu gahitapaṭisandhikassa sattassa ādito vīthicittavasena lobhasahagatacittuppādānameva sambhavato
tika-abh07t0:913_5: teyeva paṭhamaṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ dvihetukabhāvasāmaññena domanassasahagate,
tika-abh07t0:913_6: tadanantaraṃ ekahetuke ca dassetuṃ “somanassasahagata”ntyādinā lobhamūlaṃ tāva vedanādiṭṭhisaṅkhārabhedena aṭṭhadhā vibhajitvā dasseti.
tika-abh07t0:914_1: taṃ vā etassa atthīti sumano, cittaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:914_3: tassa bhāvo tasmiṃ abhidhānabuddhīnaṃ pavattihetutāyāti somanassaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:914_6: tena saha ekuppādādibhāvaṃ gatanti vā somanassasahagataṃ.
tika-abh07t0:914_8: Sāmaññavacanassapi hi atthappakaraṇādinā visesavisayatā hotīti idha micchādassanameva “diṭṭhī”ti vuccati.
tika-abh07t0:914_12: diṭṭhiyā vā gamanamattaṃ na ettha gantabbo attādiko koci atthīti diṭṭhigataṃ,
tika-abh07t0:914_14: tena samaṃ ekuppādādīhi pakārehi yuttanti diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:914_16: saṅkharīyati vā taṃ etena yathāvuttanayena sajjīyatīti saṅkhāro,
tika-abh07t0:914_17: tattha tattha kicce saṃsīdamānassa cittassa anubalappadānavasena attano vā paresaṃ vā pavattapubbappayogo,
tika-abh07t0:914_18: so pana attano pubbabhāgappavatte cittasantāne ceva parasantāne ca pavattatīti tannibbattito cittassa tikkhabhāvasaṅkhāto visesovidha saṅkhāro,
tika-abh07t0:917_0: Atha vā “sasaṅkhārikaṃ asaṅkhārika”nti cetaṃ kevalaṃ saṅkhārassa bhāvābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:917_1: na tassa sahappavattisabbhāvābhāvatoti bhinnasantānappavattinopi saṅkhārassa idamatthitāya taṃvasena
tika-abh07t0:917_2: nibbattaṃ cittaṃ saṅkhāro assa atthīti sasaṅkhārikaṃ “salomako sapakkhako”tyādīsu viya saha-
tika-abh07t0:917_6: Upapattito yuttito ikkhati anubhavati vedayamānāpi majjhattākārasaṇṭhitiyāti upekkhā.
tika-abh07t0:917_7: Sukhadukkhānaṃ vā upetā yuttā aviruddhā ikkhā anubhavananti upekkhā.
tika-abh07t0:918_0: Kasmā panettha aññesupi phassādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vijjamānesu somanassasahagatādibhāvova vuttoti?
tika-abh07t0:918_4: mohādayo ca sabbākusalasādhāraṇāti na tehi sakkā cittaṃ visesetuṃ,
tika-abh07t0:918_6: katthaci na hontīti pākaṭova taṃvasena cittassa viseso.
tika-abh07t0:918_21: Tasmā attano anurūpakāraṇavasena nesaṃ uppajjanato katthaci citteyeva sambhavoti sakkā etehi cittassa viseso paññāpetunti.
tika-abh07t0:918_22: Evañca katvā nesaṃ satipi mohahetukabhāve lobhasahagatabhāvova nigamane vutto.
tika-abh07t0:919_1: Yadā hi “natthi kāmesu ādīnavo”tyādinā nayena micchādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho kāme vā paribhuñjati,
tika-abh07t0:919_2: diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni vā sārato pacceti sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena,
tika-abh07t0:919_6: Yadā pana micchādiṭṭhiṃ apurakkhatvā kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṃ vā sevati,
tika-abh07t0:919_8: parabhaṇḍaṃ vā harati sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena,
tika-abh07t0:919_12: Yadā pana kāmānaṃ vā asampattiṃ āgamma,
tika-abh07t0:919_13: aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvena catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti,
tika-abh07t0:919_17: tena vakkhamānanayena akusalakammapathesu nesaṃ labbhamānakammapathānurūpato pavattibhedaṃ kāladesasantānārammaṇādibhedena anekavidhatampi saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh07t0:920_7: Caṇḍikkasabhāvatāya hesa ārammaṇaṃ paṭihananto viya pavattati.
tika-abh07t0:920_8: Domanassasahagatassa vedanāvasena abhedepi asādhāraṇadhammavasena cittassa upalakkhaṇatthaṃ domanassaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:920_9: paṭighasampayuttabhāvo pana ubhinnaṃ ekantasahacāritā dassanatthaṃ vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:920_11: paṭigho caṇḍikkasabhāvo saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno eko dhammoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh07t0:920_15: Dvinnaṃ pana nesaṃ cittānaṃ pāṇātipātādīsu tikkhamandappavattikāle uppatti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:921_1: Sabhāvaṃ vicinanto tāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā.
tika-abh07t0:921_2: Atha vā cikicchituṃ dukkaratāya vigatā cikicchā ñāṇappaṭikāro imissāti vicikicchā,
tika-abh07t0:921_5: Uddhaccassa sabbākusalasādhāraṇabhāvepi idha sampayuttadhammesu padhānaṃ hutvā pavattatīti idameva tena visesetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:921_6: Evañca katvā dhammuddesapāḷiyaṃ sesākusalesu uddhaccaṃ yevāpanakavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:925_0: Vatvā sesesu ettheva, taṃ sarūpena desita”nti.
tika-abh07t0:926_0: Imāni pana dve cittāni mūlantaravirahato atisammūḷhatāya,
tika-abh07t0:926_1: saṃsappanavikkhipanavasena pavattavicikicchuddhaccasamāyogena cañcalatāya ca sabbatthāpi rajjanadussanarahitāni upekkhāsahagatāneva pavattanti,
tika-abh07t0:926_2: tatoyeva ca sabhāvatikkhatāya ussāhetabbatāya abhāvato saṅkhārabhedopi nesaṃ natthi.
tika-abh07t0:928_0: Sopekkhaṃ sabbadā no ca, bhinnaṃ saṅkhārabhedato.
tika-abh07t0:931_0: Mohena muyhanti atisayena muyhanti mūlantaravirahatoti momūhāni.
tika-abh07t0:932_6: Iccevaṃ yathāvuttanayena sabbathāpi somanassupekkhādiṭṭhisampayogādinā paṭighasampayogādinā vicikicchuddhaccayogenāti
tika-abh07t0:932_7: sabbenāpi sampayogādiākārena dvādasa akusalacittāni samattāni pariniṭṭhitāni,
tika-abh07t0:932_10: Tattha kusalapaṭipakkhāni akusalāni mittappaṭipakkho amitto viya,
tika-abh07t0:932_11: paṭipakkhabhāvo ca kusalākusalānaṃ yathākkamaṃ pahāyakapahātabbabhāvena veditabbo.
tika-abh07t0:933_2: Lobho ca so suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanena mūlasadisattā mūlañca,
tika-abh07t0:933_3: kaṃ etesanti lobhamūlāni cittāni vedanādibhedato aṭṭhadhā siyuṃ.
tika-abh07t0:933_5: Mohamūlāni suddho mohoyeva mūlametesanti mohamūlasaṅkhātāni sampayogabhedato dve cāti akusalā dvādasa siyuntyattho.
tika-abh07t0:936_1: Evaṃ mūlabhedato tividhampi akusalaṃ sampayogādibhedato dvādasadhā vibhajitvā idāni ahetukacittāni niddisanto
tika-abh07t0:936_4: Tattha cakkhati viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ hutvā samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya hotīti cakkhu.
tika-abh07t0:936_5: Atha vā cakkhati rūpaṃ assādentaṃ viya hotīti cakkhu.
tika-abh07t0:936_14: saddārāmaṃ saddarataṃ saddasammudita”ntyādivacanato sotādīnampi saddādiassādanaṃ atthīti tesampi cakkhusaddābhidheyyatā āpajjeyyāti?
tika-abh07t0:936_18: cakkhunā sahavuttiyā pana bhamukaṭṭhiparicchinno maṃsapiṇḍopi “cakkhū”ti vuccati.
tika-abh07t0:936_20: saddassa vibhāvanatthatāpi sambhavatīti “cakkhati rūpaṃ vibhāvetīti cakkhū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:937_5: taṃ avhāyati tasmiṃ ninnatāyāti jivhā niruttinayena.
tika-abh07t0:937_8: tammūlakānañca pāpadhammānaṃ visesakāraṇanti tesaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ viya gayhati.
tika-abh07t0:937_9: Sasambhārakāyo vā kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ āyoti kāyo.
tika-abh07t0:937_15: Sammā tīreti yathāsampaṭicchitaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ vīmaṃsatīti santīraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:937_18: Evañca katvā kusalākusalakammasamuṭṭhānānampi kaṭattārūpānaṃ natthi vipākavohāro.
tika-abh07t0:938_5: Kasmā pana yathā akusalavipākasantīraṇaṃ ekameva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:938_8: Yadi evaṃ tatthāpi aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇavasena vedanābhedena bhavitabbanti?
tika-abh07t0:938_9: Nayidamevaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇe uppajjitabbassapi domanassassa paṭighena vinā anuppajjanato,
tika-abh07t0:938_11: Na hi bhinnajātiko dhammo bhinnajātikesu upalabbhati,
tika-abh07t0:938_12: tasmā attanā samānayogakkhamassa asambhavato akusalavipākesu domanassaṃ na sambhavatīti tassa taṃsahagatatā na vuttā.
tika-abh07t0:938_13: Atha vā yathā koci balavatā pothiyamāno dubbalapuriso tassa paṭippaharituṃ asakkonto tasmiṃ upekkhakova hoti,
tika-abh07t0:938_14: evameva akusalavipākānaṃ paridubbalabhāvato aniṭṭhārammaṇepi domanassuppādo natthīti santīraṇaṃ upekkhāsahagatameva.
tika-abh07t0:939_0: Cakkhuviññāṇādīni pana cattāri ubhayavipākānipi vatthārammaṇaghaṭṭanāya dubbalabhāvato aniṭṭhe iṭṭhepi ca ārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatāneva.
tika-abh07t0:939_3: upādārūpakena ca upādārūpakassa saṅghaṭṭanaṃ atidubbalaṃ picupiṇḍakena picupiṇḍakassa phusanaṃ viya,
tika-abh07t0:939_5: Kāyaviññāṇassa pana phoṭṭhabbasaṅkhātabhūtattayameva ārammaṇanti taṃ kāyappasāde saṅghaṭṭitampi taṃ atikkamitvā tannissayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati.
tika-abh07t0:939_6: Bhūtarūpehi ca bhūtarūpānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ balavataraṃ adhikaraṇimatthake picupiṇḍakaṃ ṭhapetvā kūṭena
tika-abh07t0:939_7: pahaṭakāle kūṭassa picupiṇḍakaṃ atikkamitvā adhikaraṇiggahaṇaṃ viya,
tika-abh07t0:939_8: tasmā vatthārammaṇaghaṭṭanāya balavabhāvato kāyaviññāṇaṃ aniṭṭhe dukkhasahagataṃ,
tika-abh07t0:939_10: Sampaṭicchanayugaḷhaṃ pana attanā asamānanissayānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnamanantaraṃ uppajjatīti samānanissayato
tika-abh07t0:939_11: aladdhānantarapaccayatāya sabhāgūpatthambharahito viya puriso nātibalavaṃ sabbathāpi visayarasamanubhavituṃ
tika-abh07t0:939_14: Yadi evaṃ āvajjanadvayassa upekkhāsampayogaṃ kasmā vakkhati,
tika-abh07t0:939_16: tattha pana purimaṃ pubbe kenaci aggahiteyeva ārammaṇe ekavārameva pavattati,
tika-abh07t0:939_17: pacchimampi visadisacittasantānaparāvattanavasena byāpārantarasāpekkhanti na sabbathāpi visayarasamanubhavituṃ sakkoti,
tika-abh07t0:946_2: Nibbattakahetuvasena nipphannānipi hetāni sampayuttahetuvaseneva ahetukavohāraṃ labhanti,
tika-abh07t0:946_4: Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ yathā idhevaṃ akusalavipākanigamane ahetukaggahaṇaṃ na katanti?
tika-abh07t0:946_10: sayaṃ abyākataniravajjasabhāvānaṃ lobhādiakusaladhammasampayogavirodhato ca natthi kadācipi sahetukatāya
tika-abh07t0:946_11: sambhavoti ahetukabhāvābyabhicārato na tāni ahetukasaddena visesitabbāni.
tika-abh07t0:947_1: Idāni ahetukādhikāre ahetukakiriyacittānipi kiccabhedena tidhā dassetuṃ “upekkhāsahagata”ntyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:947_2: Cakkhādipañcadvāre ghaṭṭitamārammaṇaṃ āvajjeti tattha ābhogaṃ karoti,
tika-abh07t0:947_3: cittasantānaṃ vā bhavaṅgavasena pavattituṃ adatvā vīthicittabhāvāya pariṇāmetīti pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:947_5: Āvajjanassa anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ manodvāraṃ vīthicittānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:947_9: Idameva ca pañcadvāre yathāsantīritaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vavatthapetīti voṭṭhabbananti ca vuccati.
tika-abh07t0:951_1: Evaṃ dvādasākusalaahetukāṭṭhārasavasena samatiṃsa cittāni dassetvā idāni tabbinimuttānaṃ sobhanavohāraṃ ṭhapetuṃ “pāpāhetukamuttānī”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:951_4: atha vā aṭṭha lokuttarāni jhānaṅgayogabhedena paccekaṃ pañcadhā katvā ekanavutipi cittāni sobhanaguṇāvahanato,
tika-abh07t0:953_1: Idāni sobhanesu kāmāvacarānameva paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhattā tesupi abyākatānaṃ kusalapubbakattā paṭhamaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:953_3: tadanantaraṃ tadekabhūmipariyāpannaṃ kiriyacittañca paccekaṃ vedanāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedena aṭṭhadhā dassetuṃ “somanassasahagata”ntyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:953_6: Ettha ca balavasaddhāya dassanasampattiyā paccayapaṭiggāhakādisampattiyāti evamādīhi kāraṇehi somanassasahagatatā,
tika-abh07t0:954_1: aññaṃ vā somanassahetuṃ āgamma haṭṭhapahaṭṭho “atthi dinna”ntyādinayappavattaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā
tika-abh07t0:954_2: muttacāgatādivasena asaṃsīdanto anussāhito parehi dānādīni puññāni karoti,
tika-abh07t0:954_3: tadāssa cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:954_4: Yadā pana vuttanayeneva haṭṭhatuṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvāpi amuttacāgatādivasena saṃsīdamāno parehi vā ussāhito karoti,
tika-abh07t0:954_6: Yadā pana ñātijanassa paṭipattidassanena jātaparicayā bāladārakā bhikkhū disvā somanassajātā sahasā kiñcideva hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti vā,
tika-abh07t0:954_12: aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti,
tika-abh07t0:957_0: Imāni hi aṭṭha cittāni dasapuññakiriyavatthuvasena pavattanato paccekaṃ dasa dasāti katvā asīti cittāni honti,
tika-abh07t0:957_1: tāni ca chasu ārammaṇesu pavattanato paccekaṃ chagguṇitāni sāsītikāni cattāri satāni honti,
tika-abh07t0:957_3: tāni tiṇṇaṃ adhipatīnaṃ vasena tiguṇitāni vīsādhikāni sattasatāni,
tika-abh07t0:957_4: tathā ñāṇasampayuttāni ca catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ vasena catugguṇitāni sasaṭṭhikāni nava satānīti evaṃ adhipativasena
tika-abh07t0:957_5: sahassaṃ sāsītikāni ca cha satāni honti,
tika-abh07t0:957_6: tāni kāyavacīmanokammasaṅkhātakammattikavasena tiguṇitāni cattālīsādhikāni pañca sahassāni honti,
tika-abh07t0:957_7: tāni ca hīnamajjhimapaṇītabhedato tiguṇitāni vīsasatādhikapannarasasahassāni honti.
tika-abh07t0:960_0: Taṃ adhipativasena gaṇanaparihāniṃ anādiyitvā sotapatitavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:961_0: Kucchite pāpadhamme salayanti kampenti viddhaṃsenti apagamentīti vā kusalāni.
tika-abh07t0:961_1: Atha vā kucchitākārena santāne sayanato pavattanato kusasaṅkhāte pāpadhamme lunanti chindantīti kusalāni.
tika-abh07t0:961_2: Atha vā kucchite pāpadhamme sānato tanukaraṇato osānakaraṇato vā kusasaṅkhātena ñāṇena,
tika-abh07t0:961_3: saddhādidhammajātena vā lātabbāni sahajātaupanissayabhāvena yathārahaṃ pavattetabbānīti kusalāni,
tika-abh07t0:961_4: tāneva yathāvuttatthena kāmāvacarāni kusalacittāni cāti kāmāvacarakusalacittāni.
tika-abh07t0:962_9: tasmā taṃvasena parihāpetvā yathārahaṃ gaṇanabhedo yojetabbo.
tika-abh07t0:962_15: Yathāpayogaṃ vinā sappayogañca yathāupaṭṭhitehi kammādipaccayehi utubhojanādisappāyāsappāyavasena asaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikāni.
tika-abh07t0:963_0: 17. Kiriyacittānampi kusale vuttanayena yathārahaṃ somanassasahagatāditā veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:964_1: Sahetukakāmāvacarakusalavipākakiriyacittānīti ettha sahetukaggahaṇaṃ vipākakiriyāpekkhaṃ visesanaṃ kusalassa ekantasahetukattā.
tika-abh07t0:964_3: “sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampī”tyādīsu viya sakkharakathalassa caraṇāyogato macchagumbāpekkhāya caraṇakiriyā yojīyatīti.
tika-abh07t0:965_3: saṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhavidhattā ca sampiṇḍetvā catuvīsati matāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:965_4: Nanu ca vedanābhedo tāva yutto tāsaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā.
tika-abh07t0:965_6: Ñāṇasaṅkhārānaṃ bhāvābhāvakatopi bhedo ñāṇasaṅkhārakatova yathā vassakato subhikkho dubbhikkhoti,
tika-abh07t0:965_7: tasmā ñāṇasaṅkhārakato bhedo ñāṇasaṅkhārabhedoti na ettha koci virodhoti.
tika-abh07t0:966_1: Idāni sabbānipi kāmāvacaracittāni sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “kāme tevīsā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:966_3: sahetukāhetukāni soḷasa kusalavipākānīti evaṃ tevīsati vipākāni dvādasa akusalāni,
tika-abh07t0:966_4: aṭṭha kusalānīti puññāpuññāni vīsati ahetukā tisso sahetukā aṭṭhāti ekādasa kiriyā cāti sabbathāpi kusalākusalavipākakiriyānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:969_1: Idāni tadanantaruddiṭṭhassa rūpāvacarassa niddesakkamo anuppattoti tassa jhānaṅgayogabhedena pañcadhā vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “vitakka…pe…
tika-abh07t0:969_3: Vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca ekaggatā cāti imehi sahitaṃ vitakkavicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:969_4: Tattha ārammaṇaṃ vitakketi sampayuttadhamme abhiniropetīti vitakko,
tika-abh07t0:969_6: yathā hi koci gāmavāsī puriso rājavallabhaṃ sambandhinaṃ mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ anupavisati,
tika-abh07t0:969_7: evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
tika-abh07t0:969_8: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti?
tika-abh07t0:969_10: Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko rājagehaṃ pavisati,
tika-abh07t0:969_11: evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ abhinirohati.
tika-abh07t0:969_12: Paricayoti cettha savitakkacittassa santāne abhiṇhappavattivasena nibbattā cittabhāvanā.
tika-abh07t0:970_4: tasseva pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca paṭhamaghaṇṭābhighāto viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko,
tika-abh07t0:970_11: padumassa uparibhāge paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa.
tika-abh07t0:971_6: Tattha ārammaṇappaṭilābhe pītiyā viseso pākaṭo kantārakhinnassa vanantodakadassane viya,
tika-abh07t0:971_7: yathāladdhassa anubhavane sukhassa viseso pākaṭo yathādiṭṭhaudakassa pānādīsu viyāti.
tika-abh07t0:971_8: Nānārammaṇavikkhepābhāvena ekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ aggaṃ imassāti ekaggaṃ, cittaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:971_11: Tassa hi vasena sasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ avikkhittaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:972_0: Paṭhamañca desanākkamato ceva uppattikkamato ca ādibhūtattā taṃ jhānañca ārammaṇūpanijjhānato,
tika-abh07t0:972_3: Jhānaṅgasamudāye yeva hi jhānavohāro nemiādiaṅgasamudāye rathavohāro viya,
tika-abh07t0:972_4: tathā hi vuttaṃ vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:973_0: Kasmā pana aññesu phassādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vijjamānesu imeyeva pañca jhānaṅgavasena vuttāti? Vuccate –
tika-abh07t0:973_7: atha naṃ sasampayuttadhammaṃ etehi abhiniropanānuppabandhanapīnanaupabrūhanehi anuggahitā ekaggatā samādhānakiccena
tika-abh07t0:973_10: Indriyasamatāvasena samaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrībhāvena līnuddhaccābhāvena sammā ca ṭhapetīti evamete sameva upanijjhānakiccaṃ āveṇikaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:973_11: Kāmacchandādipaṭipakkhabhāve pana samādhi kāmacchandassa paṭipakkho rāgappaṇidhiyā ujupaccanīkabhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:973_12: Kāmacchandavasena hi nānārammaṇehi palobhitassa paribbhamantassa cittassa samādhānaṃ ekaggatāya hoti.
tika-abh07t0:973_14: Vitakko thinamiddhassa yoniso saṅkappanavasena savipphārappavattito sukhaṃ avūpasamānutāpasabhāvassa uddhaccakukkuccassa vūpasantasītalasabhāvattā.
tika-abh07t0:973_17: kāmacchandādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhabhāvato ca imeyeva pañca jhānaṅgabhāvena vavatthitāti. Yathāhu –
tika-abh07t0:976_0: Upekkhā panetta santavuttisabhāvattā sukheva antogadhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāhu –
tika-abh07t0:978_0: Pahānaṅgādivasena panassa viseso upari āvi bhavissati,
tika-abh07t0:978_2: Athettha kāmāvacarakusalesu viya saṅkhārabhedo kasmā na gahito.
tika-abh07t0:978_3: Idampi hi kevalaṃ samathānuyogavasena paṭiladdhaṃ sasaṅkhārikaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:978_5: Nayidamevaṃ maggādhigamavasenasattito paṭiladdhassāpi aparabhāge parikammavaseneva uppajjanato,
tika-abh07t0:978_6: tasmā sabbassapi jhānassa parikammasaṅkhātapubbābhisaṅkhārena vinā kevalaṃ adhikāravasena anuppajjanato “asaṅkhārika”ntipi,
tika-abh07t0:978_7: adhikārena ca vinā kevalaṃ parikammābhisaṅkhāreneva anuppajjanato “sasaṅkhārika”ntipi na sakkā vattunti.
tika-abh07t0:978_8: Atha vā pubbābhisaṅkhāravaseneva uppajjamānassa na kadāci asaṅkhārikabhāvo sambhavatīti “asaṅkhārika”nti
tika-abh07t0:979_7: appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇanti ārammaṇacatukkena yojitattā cattāro navakā,
tika-abh07t0:979_9: dukkhappaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ parittaṃ appamāṇārammaṇa”ntyādinā ārammaṇappaṭipadāmissakanayavasena soḷasa
tika-abh07t0:980_1: Jhānavisesena nibbattitavipāko ekantato taṃtaṃjhānasadisovāti vipākaṃ jhānasadisameva vibhattaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:980_2: Imameva hi atthaṃ dīpetuṃ bhagavatā vipākaniddesepi kusalaṃ uddisitvāva tadanantaraṃ mahaggatalokuttaravipākā vibhattā.
tika-abh07t0:981_1: Rūpāvacaramānasaṃ jhānabhedena pañcahi catūhi tīhi dvīhi puna dvīhi jhānaṅgehi sampayogabhedena pañcadhā
tika-abh07t0:981_2: pañcaṅgikaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ puna duvaṅgikanti pañcavidhaṃ hoti avisesena,
tika-abh07t0:981_3: puna taṃ puññapākakiriyānaṃ paccekaṃ pañcannaṃ pañcannaṃ bhedā pañcadasadhā bhavetyattho.
tika-abh07t0:984_1: Idāni arūpāvacaraṃ ārammaṇabhedena catudhā vibhajitvā dassento āha “ākāsānañcāyatanā”tiādi.
tika-abh07t0:984_5: “Anantākāsa”nti ca vattabbe “agyāhito”tyādīsu viya visesanassa paranipātavasena “ākāsānanta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:984_7: Ākāsānañcameva āyatanaṃ sasampayuttadhammassa jhānassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena devānaṃ devāyatanaṃ viyāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:984_8: Tasmiṃ appanāppattaṃ paṭhamāruppajjhānampi idha “ākāsānañcāyatana”nti vuttaṃ yathā pathavīkasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ “pathavīkasiṇa”nti.
tika-abh07t0:984_9: Atha vā ākāsānañcaṃ āyatanaṃ assāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, jhānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:985_2: Tañhi uppādādiantavantampi anantākāse pavattanato attānaṃ ārabbha pavattāya bhāvanāya uppādādiantaṃ aggahetvā
tika-abh07t0:986_0: Nāssa paṭhamāruppassa kiñcanaṃ appamattakaṃ antamaso bhaṅgamattampi avasiṭṭhaṃ atthīti akiñcanaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:987_1: sukhumāya ca saññāya atthitāya nevassa sasampayuttadhammassa saññā atthi,
tika-abh07t0:987_6: Atha vā saññāva vipassanāya gocarabhāvaṃ gantvā nibbedajananasaṅkhātassa paṭusaññākiccassa abhāvato nevasaññā
tika-abh07t0:987_7: ca uṇhodake tejodhātu viya saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena vijjamānattā na asaññāti nevasaññānāsaññā,
tika-abh07t0:987_8: sā eva āyatanaṃ imassa sasampayuttadhammassa jhānassa nissayādibhāvatoti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:988_2: kasiṇākāsaviññāṇatadabhāvasaṅkhātānaṃ ālambitabbānañca ākāsādicatunnaṃ gocarānaṃ pabhedena āruppamānasaṃ catubbidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:988_3: Tañhi yathākkamaṃ pañcamajjhānārammaṇaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ atikkamma tadugghāṭena laddhaṃ ākāsamālambitvā
tika-abh07t0:988_4: tampi atikkamma tattha pavattaṃ viññāṇamālambitvā tampi atikkamma tadabhāvabhūtaṃ akiñcanabhāvamālambitvā
tika-abh07t0:988_5: tampi atikkamma tattha pavattaṃ tatiyāruppaviññāṇamālambitvā pavattati,
tika-abh07t0:988_6: na pana rūpāvacarakusalaṃ viya purimapurimaaṅgātikkamavasena purimapurimassāpi ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā.
tika-abh07t0:994_2: phalañca tadanurūpappavattiyā catudhā vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “sotāpattimaggacitta”ntyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:994_4: nibbānamahāsamuddaninnatāya sotasadisattā vā “soto”ti vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
tika-abh07t0:994_5: tassa āpatti ādito pajjanaṃ pāpuṇanaṃ paṭhamasamannāgamo sotāpatti ā-
tika-abh07t0:994_12: Atha vā ariyamaggasotassa ādito pajjanaṃ etassāti sotāpatti, puggalo,
tika-abh07t0:995_0: Sakiṃ ekavāraṃ paṭisandhivasena imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī,
tika-abh07t0:995_5: idha patvā tattha nibbattitvā idha parinibbāyīti pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu pañcamako idhādhippeto.
tika-abh07t0:995_6: So hi ito gantvā puna sakiṃ idha āgacchatīti.
tika-abh07t0:995_8: Kiñcāpi maggasamaṅgino tathāgamanāsambhavato phalaṭṭhoyeva sakadāgāmī nāma,
tika-abh07t0:995_9: tassa pana kāraṇabhūto purimuppanno maggo maggantarāvacchedanatthaṃ phalaṭṭhena visesetvā vuccati “sakadāgāmimaggo”ti.
tika-abh07t0:996_0: Paṭisandhivasena imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ na āgacchatīti anāgāmī,
tika-abh07t0:996_5: saṃsāracakkassa vā arā kilesā hatā anenāti arahā,
tika-abh07t0:997_1: saddena ekekassa maggassa nayasahassavasena catunnaṃ catusahassabhedaṃ saccavibhaṅge āgataṃ saṭṭhisahassabhedaṃ
tika-abh07t0:997_4: Sotāpattimaggo tāva jhānanāmena paṭipadābhedaṃ anāmasitvā kevalaṃ suññato appaṇihitoti dvidhā vibhatto,
tika-abh07t0:997_5: puna paṭipadācatukkena yojetvā paccekaṃ catudhā vibhattoti evaṃ jhānanāmena dasadhā vibhatto.
tika-abh07t0:997_7: paccekaṃ dasadasākārehi vibhatto tathā tathā bujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena.
tika-abh07t0:997_8: Tasmā jhānavasena dasamaggādīnaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā vasena dasa dasāti vīsatiyā ṭhānesu dve nayasatāni honti.
tika-abh07t0:997_9: Puna tāni catūhi adhipatīhi yojetvā paccekaṃ catudhā vibhattānīti evaṃ adhipatīhi amissetvā dve satāni,
tika-abh07t0:997_10: missetvā aṭṭha satānīti sotāpattimagge nayasahassaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t0:998_2: sotāpattissa vā phalacittaṃ vipākabhūtaṃ cittaṃ sotāpattiphalacittaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:999_2: niravasesappahānaṃ kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvāpādanaṃ tesameva niravasesappahānaṃ rūpārūparāgamānuddhaccāvijjānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:999_3: anavasesappahānanti evaṃ saṃyojanappahānavasena catubbidhānaṃ sotāpattimaggādīnaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:999_5: vipākaṃ pana tasseva kusalassa phalattā tadanurūpato tathā catudhāti evaṃ anuttaraṃ attano uttaritarābhāvena
tika-abh07t0:999_6: anuttarasaṅkhātaṃ lokuttaraṃ cittaṃ aṭṭhadhā matanti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1000_0: Kiriyānuttarassa pana asambhavato dvādasavidhatā na vuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1000_5: Taṃ pana kilesasamucchedakavaseneva upalabhitabbato ekavārappavatteneva ca tena asanisampātena viya taruādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1000_6: samūlaviddhaṃsanassa taṃtaṃkilesānaṃ accantaṃ appavattiyā sādhitattā puna uppajjamānepi kātabbābhāvato
tika-abh07t0:1000_7: diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthañca phalasamāpattiyā eva nibbānārammaṇavasena pavattanato na kadāci sekkhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1004_1: Evaṃ jātivasena saṅgahaṃ dassetvā puna bhūmivasena dassetuṃ “catupaññāsadhā kāme”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1004_5: anuttare pana navavidhe dhammasamudāye cittāni aṭṭhadhā īraye,
tika-abh07t0:1004_7: Ettha ca kāmataṇhādivisayabhāvena kāmabhavādipariyāpannāni cittāni sakasakabhūmito aññattha pavattamānānipi kāmabhavādīsu cittānīti vuttāni,
tika-abh07t0:1004_8: yathā manussitthiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattopi tiracchānagato tiracchānayonipariyāpannattā tiracchānesveva saṅgayhati.
tika-abh07t0:1004_9: Katthaci apariyāpannāni navavidhalokuttaradhammasamūhekadesabhūtāni “rukkhe sākhā”tyādīsu viya anuttare cittānīti vuttāni.
tika-abh07t0:1004_13: Natthi etesaṃ uttaraṃ cittanti anuttarānīti upayogabahuvacanavasena kāme kāmāvacarāni cittāni catupaññāsadhā īraye,
tika-abh07t0:1004_16: Anuttare lokuttarāni cittāni aṭṭhadhā īrayeti evamettha sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t0:1005_1: Itthaṃ yathāvuttena jātibhedabhinnacatubhūmikacittabhedavasena ekūnanavutippabhedaṃ katvā mānasaṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1005_3: Atha vā ekavīsasataṃ ekuttaravīsādhikaṃ sataṃ vibhajanti.
tika-abh07t0:1008_1: Jhānaṅgavasena paṭhamajjhānasadisattā paṭhamajjhānañca taṃ sotāpattimaggacittañceti paṭhamajjhānasotāpattimaggacittaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1008_3: hi aññataravasena taṃtaṃjhānasadisattā vitakkādiaṅgapātubhāvena cattāropi maggā paṭhamajjhānādivohāraṃ labhantā paccekaṃ pañcadhā vibhajanti.
tika-abh07t0:1008_5: tattha paṭhamajjhānādīsu yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasantassa vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā pavattā,
tika-abh07t0:1008_7: Yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ sammasantassa sā pavattā,
tika-abh07t0:1008_10: dutiyajjhānādīsu vā aññatarasadiso caturaṅgādibhedo maggo bhaveyyā”ti evaṃ yogāvacarassa uppannajjhāsayo puggalajjhāsayo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1009_0: Tattha yena paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1009_1: tassa so maggo paṭhamajjhānādīsu taṃtaṃpādakajjhānasadiso hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1009_2: Sace pana vipassanāpādakaṃ kiñci jhānaṃ natthi,
tika-abh07t0:1009_3: kevalaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṃ jhānaṃ sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1009_5: Yadā pana yaṃ kiñci jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya aññataraṃ sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1009_7: Sace pana puggalassa tathāvidho ajjhāsayo natthi,
tika-abh07t0:1009_8: heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato vuṭṭhāya uparūparijhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo pādakajjhānaṃ anapekkhitvā sammasitajjhānasadiso hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1009_9: Uparūparijhānato pana vuṭṭhāya heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo sammasitajjhānaṃ anapekkhitvā pādakajjhānasadiso hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1009_13: Tassa hi pādakajjhānādīnaṃ abhāvena tesaṃ vasena niyamābhāvato vipassanāniyamena pañcaṅgikova maggo hotīti.
tika-abh07t0:1009_14: Apica samāpattilābhinopi jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvā pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā uppāditamaggopi vipassanāniyameneva
tika-abh07t0:1009_15: pañcaṅgikova hotīti ayamettha aṭṭhakathādito uddhaṭo vinicchayasāro.
tika-abh07t0:1009_16: Theravādadassanādivasappavatto pana papañco aṭṭhakathādīsu vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-abh07t0:1009_18: evaṃ sabbatthāpi vitthāranayo tattha tattha vuttanayena gahetabbo.
tika-abh07t0:1010_1: Yathā rūpāvacaraṃ cittaṃ paṭhamādipañcavidhajhānabhedena gayhati “paṭhamajjhāna”ntyādinā vuccati,
tika-abh07t0:1010_5: Atha vā rūpāvacaraṃ cittaṃ anuttarañca paṭhamādijhānabhede “paṭhamajjhānakusalacittaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1010_7: tathā āruppañcāpi pañcame jhāne gayhatīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1010_8: Ācariyassāpi hi ayameva yojanā adhippetāti dissati nāmarūpaparicchede ujukameva tathā vuttattā.
tika-abh07t0:1013_0: Tasmāti yasmā rūpāvacaraṃ viya anuttarampi paṭhamādijhānabhede gayhati,
tika-abh07t0:1013_2: yasmā vā jhānaṅgayogabhedena ekekaṃ pañcadhā katvā anuttaraṃ cittaṃ cattālīsavidhanti vuccati,
tika-abh07t0:1014_1: Pādakajjhānādivasena gaṇanavuḍḍhi kusalavipākesveva sambhavatīti tesameva gaṇanaṃ ekavīsasatagaṇanāya aṅgabhāvena dassento āha “sattatiṃsā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1019_1: Evaṃ tāva cittaṃ bhūmijātisampayogasaṅkhārajhānārammaṇamaggabhedena yathārahaṃ vibhajitvā idāni cetasikavibhāgassa
tika-abh07t0:1019_3: tadanantaraṃ aññasamānaakusalasobhanavasena tīhi rāsīhi cetasikadhamme uddisitvā,
tika-abh07t0:1019_6: Cittena saha ekato uppādo ca nirodho ca yesaṃ te ekuppādanirodhā.
tika-abh07t0:1019_7: Ekaṃ ālambaṇañca vatthu ca yesaṃ te ekālambaṇavatthukā.
tika-abh07t0:1019_8: Evaṃ catūhi lakkhaṇehi cetoyuttā cittena sampayuttā dvipaññāsa lakkhaṇā dhāraṇato dhammā niyatayogino,
tika-abh07t0:1020_1: tadā cittena saha uppajjamānānaṃ rūpadhammānampi cetoyuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekanirodhaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1020_2: Evampi cittānuparivattino viññattidvayassa pasaṅgo nasakkā nivāretuṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1020_3: tathā “ekato uppādo vā nirodho vā etesanti ekuppādanirodhā”ti parikappentassa puretaramuppajjitvā cittassa
tika-abh07t0:1023_4: Ayañhi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattati,
tika-abh07t0:1023_5: sā cassa phusanākārappavatti ambilakhādakādīnaṃ passantassa parassa kheḷuppādādi viya daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh07t0:1023_8: Ārammaṇarasānubhavanañhi patvā sesasampayuttadhammā ekadesamatteneva rasaṃ anubhavanti,
tika-abh07t0:1023_12: Nīlādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sañjānāti saññaṃ katvā jānātīti saññā,
tika-abh07t0:1023_14: Sā hi uppajjamānā dāruādīsu vaḍḍhakiādīnaṃ saññāṇakaraṇaṃ viya pacchā sañjānanassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā uppajjati.
tika-abh07t0:1023_17: Sāpi puna aparāya saññāya sañjānanassa nimittaṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā uppajjatīti na ettha koci asambhavo.
tika-abh07t0:1024_2: Tathā hi ayameva abhisaṅkharaṇe padhānattā vibhaṅge suttantabhājaniye saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ vibhajantena
tika-abh07t0:1025_6: Vitakko hi sahajātadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe abhiniropanasabhāvattā te tattha pakkhipanto viya hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1025_7: cetanā attanā ārammaṇaggahaṇena yathāruḷhe dhammepi tattha tattha niyojentī balanāyako viya hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1025_8: manasikāro te ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ payojanato ājānīyānaṃ payojanakasārathi viyāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh07t0:1025_9: Dhammānañhi taṃ taṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvato paṭivijjhitvā bhagavatā te te dhammā vibhattāti
tika-abh07t0:1025_10: bhagavati saddhāya “evaṃ visesā ime dhammā”ti okappetvā uggahaṇaparipucchādivasena tesaṃ sabhāvasamadhigamāya
tika-abh07t0:1025_12: na pana tattha tattha vippaṭipajjantehi sammoho āpajjitabboti ayamettha ācariyānaṃ anusāsanī.
tika-abh07t0:1025_13: Sabbesampi ekūnanavuticittānaṃ sādhāraṇā niyamato tesu uppajjanatoti sabbacittasādhāraṇā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1026_5: vidhinā īrayitabbaṃ pavattetabbanti vā vīriyaṃ, ussāho,
tika-abh07t0:1026_7: Vīriyavasena hi tesaṃ olīnavuttitā na hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1026_8: Evañca katvā imassa vitakkādīhi viseso supākaṭo hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1026_12: Tathā hesa “ārammaṇaggahaṇe cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viyā”ti vuccati.
tika-abh07t0:1026_13: Dānavatthuvissajjanavasena pavattakālepi cesa vissajjitabbena tena atthikova khipitabbausūnaṃ gahaṇe atthiko issāso viya.
tika-abh07t0:1026_14: Sobhanesu taditaresu ca pakārena kiṇṇā vippakiṇṇāti pakiṇṇakā.
tika-abh07t0:1027_3: tesaṃ samānā na uddhaccasaddhādayo viya akusalādisabhāvāyevāti aññasamānā.
tika-abh07t0:1030_2: pakiṇṇakavasena ca sobhanetarasabhāve terasa dhamme uddisitvā idāni heṭṭhā cittavibhāge niddiṭṭhānukkamena akusaladhammapariyāpanne paṭhamaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1030_4: Ahetukā pana āveṇikadhammā natthīti na te visuṃ vuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1030_8: Na hirīyati na lajjatīti ahiriko, puggalo,
tika-abh07t0:1030_13: Tattha gūthato gāmasūkaro viya kāyaduccaritādito ajigucchanalakkhaṇaṃ ahirikaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1030_14: aggito salabho viya tato anuttāsalakkhaṇaṃ anottappaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1032_0: Na bhāyati anottappī, salabho viya pāvakā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1033_9: diṭṭhi yathāsabhāvaṃ vijahitvā ayāthāvato gaṇhātīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh07t0:1033_23: Akatampi hi kukata”nti voharanti “yaṃ mayā akataṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1033_25: Idha pana katākataṃ ārabbha uppanno vippaṭisāracittuppādo kukataṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1033_38: Yā kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā”tyādinā imesaṃ niddeso pavatto.
tika-abh07t0:1033_39: Nanu ca “kāyassā”ti vacanato rūpakāyassapi akammaññatā middhanti tassa rūpabhāvopi āpajjatīti?
tika-abh07t0:1033_42: Tathā hi middhavādimatappaṭikkhepanatthaṃ tesaṃ vādanikkhepapubbakaṃ aṭṭhakathādīsu bahudhā vitthārenti ācariyā.
tika-abh07t0:1043_0: Iti ce natthi taṃ tattha, avisesena pāṭhato.
tika-abh07t0:1044_0: “Sakkā hi anumātuṃ yaṃ, middhaṃ rūpanti cintitaṃ;
tika-abh07t0:1052_10: Attagāravavasena pāpato jigucchanato kulavadhū viya hirī,
tika-abh07t0:1052_11: paragāravavasena pāpato uttāsanato vesiyā viya ottappaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1052_13: so ārammaṇe cittassa alaggatālakkhaṇo muttabhikkhu viya.
tika-abh07t0:1052_17: sā cittacetasikānaṃ ajjhupekkhanalakkhaṇā samappavattānaṃ assānaṃ ajjhupekkhako sārathi viya.
tika-abh07t0:1053_24: Yasmā cete dve dve dhammāva ekato hutvā yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhadhamme hananti,
tika-abh07t0:1053_28: kāyappassaddhiādīhi pana rūpakāyassapi taṃsamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpapharaṇavasenāti tadatthasandassanatthañcettha duvidhatā vuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1053_29: Sobhanānaṃ sabbesampi sādhāraṇā niyamena tesu uppajjanatoti sobhanasādhāraṇā.
tika-abh07t0:1054_17: Tividhāpi panetā paccekaṃ sampattasamādānasamucchedavirativasena tividhā viratiyo nāma yathāvuttaduccaritehi viramaṇato.
tika-abh07t0:1055_1: Karoti paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakhedaṃ janeti,
tika-abh07t0:1055_6: Tāya hi paradukkhaṃ apanīyatu vā, mā vā,
tika-abh07t0:1055_15: Adosoyeva hi sattesu hitajjhāsayavasappavatto mettā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1057_0: Upekkhā gahitā yasmā, tasmā na gahitā ubho”ti. ;
tika-abh07t0:1058_1: sā eva yathāsabhāvāvabodhane ādhipaccayogato indriyanti paññindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1058_6: ussakkitvā pana maggaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-abh07t0:1058_9: Ñāṇavippayuttasaññāya cettha ākāraggahaṇavasena uppajjanakāle viññāṇaṃ abbohārikaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1062_5: Aññattha pana sasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ cittuppādoti vuccati “uppajjati cittaṃ etenāti uppādo,
tika-abh07t0:1062_7: cittañca taṃ uppādo cāti cittuppādo”ti katvā.
tika-abh07t0:1062_8: Samāhāradvandepi hi pulliṅgaṃ katthaci saddavidū icchanti.
tika-abh07t0:1062_9: Tesaṃ cittāviyuttānaṃ cittuppādesu paccekaṃ sampayogo ito paraṃ yathāyogaṃ pavuccatīti sambandho.
tika-abh07t0:1064_4: Tesu ceva ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu ca vitakko jāyati sesānaṃ bhāvanābalena avitakkattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh07t0:1065_2: ekādasasu dutiyajjhānacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu vicāro jāyati.
tika-abh07t0:1066_2: vicikicchāsahagatena cāti ekādasahi vajjitesu aṭṭhasattaticittesu adhimokkho jāyati.
tika-abh07t0:1067_4: santīraṇattayena cāti soḷasahi vajjitesu tesattatiyā cittesu vīriyaṃ jāyati.
