tika-abh07t0:1068_4: ekādasahi catutthajjhānehi cāti sattaticittehi vajjitesu ekapaññāsacittesu pīti jāyati.
tika-abh07t0:1069_2: momūhehi dvīhi cāti vīsatiyā cittehi vajjitesu ekūnasattaticittesu chando jāyati.
tika-abh07t0:1073_3: so sabbopi mohena tattha anādīnavadassāvī ahirikena tato ajigucchanto,
tika-abh07t0:1074_3: Sakkāyādīsu hi abhinivisantassa tattha mamāyanasambhavato diṭṭhi lobhasahagatacittesveva labbhati.
tika-abh07t0:1074_4: Mānopi ahaṃmānavasena pavattanato diṭṭhisadisova pavattatīti diṭṭhiyā saha ekacittuppādena pavattati
tika-abh07t0:1074_5: kesarasīho viya aparena tathāvidhena saha ekaguhāyaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1074_6: na cāpi dosamūlādīsu uppajjati attasinehasannissayabhāvena ekantalobhapadaṭṭhānattāti so diṭṭhivippayuttesveva labbhati.
tika-abh07t0:1075_3: katākataduccaritasucarite anusocantassa ca tattha tattha paṭihananavaseneva pavattanato issāmacchariyakukkuccāni paṭighacittesveva.
tika-abh07t0:1076_1: Akammaññatāpakatikassa tathā sabhāvatikkhesu asaṅkhārikesu pavattanāyogato thinamiddhaṃ sasaṅkhārikesveva labbhati.
tika-abh07t0:1080_2: na pana viratīnaṃ abhāvo maggassa kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ samucchedavasena,
tika-abh07t0:1080_3: phalassa ca tadanukūlavasena pavattanatoti vuttaṃ “viratiyo panā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1080_5: Na hi etāsaṃ lokiyesu viya lokuttaresupi musāvādādīnaṃ visuṃ visuṃ pahānavasena pavatti hoti sabbesameva
tika-abh07t0:1080_6: duccaritadurājīvānaṃ tena tena maggena kesañci sabbaso,
tika-abh07t0:1080_8: Nanu cāyamattho “ekatovā”ti imināva siddhoti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh07t0:1080_10: Keci pana imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvāva “‘sabbathāpī’ti idaṃ atiritta”nti vadanti,
tika-abh07t0:1080_12: “Niyatā”ti imināpi lokiyesu viya kadāci sambhavaṃ nivāreti.
tika-abh07t0:1080_15: Kāmāvacarakusalesvevāti avadhāraṇena kāmāvacaravipākakiriyesu mahaggatesu ca sambhavaṃ nivāreti.
tika-abh07t0:1080_18: Kadāci uppajjantāpi na ekato uppajjanti vītikkamitabbavatthusaṅkhātānaṃ attano ārammaṇānaṃ sambhavāpekkhattāti vuttaṃ “visuṃ visu”nti.
tika-abh07t0:1081_1: Appanāppattānaṃ appamaññānaṃ na kadāci somanassarahitā pavatti atthīti “pañcama…pe…
tika-abh07t0:1081_4: mahantehi vā jhāyīhi gatāni pattānīti mahaggatāni.
tika-abh07t0:1081_5: Nānā hutvāti bhinnārammaṇattā attano ārammaṇabhūtānaṃ dukkhitasukhitasattānaṃ āpāthagamanāpekkhatāya visuṃ visuṃ hutvā.
tika-abh07t0:1081_7: karuṇāmuditābhāvanākāle appanāvīthito pubbe paricayavasena upekkhāsahagatacittehipi parikammaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1081_8: yathā taṃ paguṇaganthaṃ sajjhāyantassa kadāci aññavihitassapi sajjhāyanaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1081_9: yathā ca paguṇavipassanāya saṅkhāre sammasantassa kadāci paricayabalena ñāṇavippayuttacittehipi sammasananti
tika-abh07t0:1081_11: Appanāvīthiyaṃ pana tāsaṃ ekantato somanassasahagatesveva sambhavo daṭṭhabbo bhinnajātikassa viya bhinnavedanassapi āsevanapaccayābhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:1082_1: Tayo soḷasacittesūti sammāvācādayo tayo dhammā aṭṭhalokuttarakāmāvacarakusalavasena soḷasacittesu jāyanti.
tika-abh07t0:1083_1: Evaṃ niyatāniyatasampayogavasena vuttesu aniyatadhamme ekato dassetvā sesānaṃ niyatabhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ “issāmaccherā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1083_4: Thinamiddhaṃ tathā kadāci akammaññatāvasappavattiyaṃ saha aññamaññaṃ avippayogivasena jāyatīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1083_5: Atha vā māno cāti ettha ca-
tika-abh07t0:1083_6: saddaṃ “sahā”ti etthāpi yojetvā thinamiddhaṃ tathā kadāci saha ca sasaṅkhārikapaṭighe,
tika-abh07t0:1083_10: taṃsampayogakālepi vā nānā ca jāyatīti yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh07t0:1083_11: Apare pana ācariyā “māno ca thinamiddhañca tathā kadāci nānā kadāci saha ca jāyatī”ti ettakameva yojesuṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1084_1: Sesāti yathāvuttehi ekādasahi aniyatehi itare ekacattālīsa.
tika-abh07t0:1084_2: Keci pana “yathāvuttehi aniyatayevāpanakehi sesā niyatayevāpanakā”ti vaṇṇenti,
tika-abh07t0:1084_5: Kevalañhettha niyatāniyatavasena cittuppādesu yathārahaṃ labbhamānacetasikamattasandassanaṃ ācariyena kataṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1085_0: Evaṃ tāva “phassādīsu ayaṃ dhammo ettakesu cittesu upalabbhatī”ti cittaparicchedavasena sampayogaṃ dassetvā
tika-abh07t0:1085_1: idāni “imasmiṃ cittuppāde ettakā cetasikā”ti cetasikarāsiparicchedavasena saṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅgahañcā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1090_6: appamaññāvajjitā sobhanacetasikā ca saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti ākaḍḍhati.
tika-abh07t0:1090_8: Pañcakajjhānavasenāti vitakkavicāre visuṃ visuṃ atikkamitvā bhāventassa nātitikkhañāṇassa vasena desitassa jhānapañcakassa vasena.
tika-abh07t0:1090_9: Te pana ekato atikkamitvā bhāventassa tikkhañāṇassa vasena desitacatukkajjhānavasena dutiyajjhānikesu
tika-abh07t0:1090_10: vitakkavicāravajjitānaṃ sambhavato catudhā eva saṅgaho hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh07t0:1093_1: Tīsūti kusalavipākakiriyavasena tividhesu sīlavisuddhivasena suvisodhitakāyavacīpayogassa kevalaṃ cittasamādhānamattena mahaggatajjhānāni pavattanti,
tika-abh07t0:1093_7: Appamaññāyo na labbhantīti ettha kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
tika-abh07t0:1096_3: viratīnañca vītakkamitabbavatthuvisayattā natthi tāsaṃ ekacittuppāde sambhavoti lokiyaviratīnaṃ ekantakusalasabhāvattā
tika-abh07t0:1096_9: duccaritadurājīvānaṃ paṭippassambhanato ca na lokuttaraviratīnaṃ ekantakusalatā yuttāti tāsaṃ tattha aggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1097_0: Nanu ca paññattādiārammaṇampi kāmāvacarakusalaṃ hotīti tassa vipākenapi kusalasadisārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ yathā taṃ mahaggatalokuttaravipākehīti?
tika-abh07t0:1097_3: Yathā hi dāsiyā putto mātarā icchitaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto sāmikeneva icchiticchitaṃ karoti,
tika-abh07t0:1097_4: evaṃ kāmataṇhāyattatāya dāsisadisassa kāmāvacarakammassa vipākabhūtaṃ cittaṃ tena gahitārammaṇaṃ aggahetvā kāmataṇhārammaṇameva gaṇhātīti.
tika-abh07t0:1097_5: Dvādasadhāti kusalavipākakiriyabhedesu paccekaṃ cattāro cattāro dukāti katvā tīsu dvādasadhā.
tika-abh07t0:1098_1: Idāni imesu paṭhamajjhānikādīhi dutiyajjhānikādīnaṃ bhedakaradhamme dassetuṃ “anuttare jhānadhammā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1098_2: Anuttare citte vitakkavicārapītisukhavasena jhānadhammā visesakā bhedakā.
tika-abh07t0:1098_9: ñāṇapītī pana tīsu paṭhamayugaḷādīhi dutiyayugaḷādīnanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1101_1: Dutiye asaṅkhāriketi diṭṭhivippayutte asaṅkhārike lobhamānena tatheva aññasamānā,
tika-abh07t0:1104_0: 47. Issāmacchariyakukkuccāni panettha paccekameva yojetabbāni bhinnārammaṇattāyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh07t0:1105_1: Adhimokkhassa nicchayākārappavattito dveḷhakasabhāve vicikicchācitte sambhavo natthīti “adhimokkhavirahitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1106_7: pannarasa momūhadvayeti evaṃ akusale sattadhā ṭhitāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1107_1: Sādhāraṇāti akusalānaṃ sabbesameva sādhāraṇabhūtā cattāro samānā ca chandapītiadhimokkhavajjitā aññasamānā
tika-abh07t0:1107_2: apare dasāti ete cuddasa dhammā sabbākusalayoginoti pavuccantīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1111_1: Manoviññāṇadhātuyā viya visiṭṭhamananakiccāyogato mananamattā dhātūti manodhātu.
tika-abh07t0:1112_4: satta dvipañcaviññāṇesūti aṭṭhārasāhetukesu cittuppādesu saṅgaho catubbidho hotīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1114_1: Itthaṃ yathāvuttanayena cittāviyuttānaṃ cetasikānaṃ cittaparicchedavasena vuttaṃ sampayogañca cetasikarāsiparicchedavasena
tika-abh07t0:1114_2: vuttaṃ saṅgahañca ñatvā yathāyogaṃ cittena samaṃ bhedaṃ uddise “sabbacittasādhāraṇā tāva satta ekūnanavuticittesu
tika-abh07t0:1114_4: pakiṇṇakesu vitakko pañcapaññāsacittesu uppajjanato pañcapaññāsavidho”tyādinā katheyyāti attho.
tika-abh07t0:1119_3: Yathāyogaṃ sampayuttā cittacetasikā dhammā sabhāvato attano attano sabhāvavasena ekūnanavutividhampi
tika-abh07t0:1119_5: sabbacittasādhāraṇo phasso phusanasabhāvena ekavidhotyādinā tepaññāsa honti.
tika-abh07t0:1120_2: vatthuto saṅgaho nāma vedanāsaṅgahādināmako pakiṇṇakasaṅgaho cittuppādavaseneva taṃtaṃvedanādibhedabhinnacittuppādānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1120_3: vaseneva na katthaci taṃvirahena nīyate upanīyate,
tika-abh07t0:1122_8: vedanā sukhā dukkhā”ti vacanato dve eva vedanāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1122_11: Yampi katthaci sutte “yaṃ kiñci vedayitamidamettha dukkhassā”ti vacanaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1122_12: taṃ saṅkhāradukkhatāya sabbavedanānaṃ dukkhasabhāvattā vuttaṃ. Yathāha –
tika-abh07t0:1122_14: mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ saṅkhāravipariṇāmatañca yaṃ kiñcivedayitamidamettha dukkhassā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1122_20: Evaṃ tividhāpi panetā indriyadesanāyaṃ “sukhindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ domanassindriyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1122_21: upekkhindriya”nti pañcadhā desitāti taṃvasenapettha vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “sukhaṃ dukkha”ntyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1122_22: Kāyikamānasikasātāsātabhedato hi sukhaṃ dukkhañca paccekaṃ dvidhā vibhajitvā “sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ domanassindriya”nti desitā,
tika-abh07t0:1122_24: Yathā hi sukhadukkhāni aññathā kāyassa anuggahamupaghātañca karonti,
tika-abh07t0:1130_4: Hetubhāvo pana nesaṃ sampayuttānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanasaṅkhāto mūlabhāvo.
tika-abh07t0:1130_5: Laddhahetupaccayā hi dhammā viruḷhamūlā viya pādapā thirā honti,
tika-abh07t0:1130_7: Evañca katvā ete mūlasadisatāya “mūlānī”ti ca vuccanti.
tika-abh07t0:1130_9: evaṃ sati hetūnaṃ attano kusalādibhāvasādhano añño hetu maggitabbo siyā.
tika-abh07t0:1130_11: evampi momūhacittasampayuttassa hetuno akusalabhāvo appaṭibaddho siyā.
tika-abh07t0:1130_13: evaṃ sati sesahetūnampi sabhāvatova kusalādibhāvoti tesaṃ viya sampayuttadhammānampi so hetupaṭibaddho na siyā.
tika-abh07t0:1130_15: tadā ahetukānaṃ abyākatabhāvo na siyāti alamatinippīḷanena.
tika-abh07t0:1130_18: manasikaroto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
tika-abh07t0:1130_20: abyākatānaṃ pana abyākatabhāvo niranusayasantānappaṭibaddho kammappaṭibaddho avipākabhāvappaṭibaddho cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1131_0: 16. Idāni hetūnaṃ jātibhedaṃ dassetuṃ “lobho doso cā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1134_7: ekakkhattuṃ vā javamānassa viya pavatti javanakiccaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1135_1: Imāni pana kiccāni ṭhānavasena pākaṭāni hontīti taṃ dāni pabhedato dassetuṃ “paṭisandhī”tyādi vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1135_4: sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pana “silāputtakassa sarīra”ntyādīsu viya abhedepi bhedaparikappanāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1135_6: Dassanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ ṭhānaṃ pañcaviññāṇaṭhānaṃ. Ādi-
tika-abh07t0:1137_2: Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne “upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati na hetupaccayā”ti
tika-abh07t0:1137_3: evamāgatassa upekkhāsahagatapadassa vibhaṅge “ahetukaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā,
tika-abh07t0:1137_5: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā,
tika-abh07t0:1137_6: dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho”ti evaṃ pavattipaṭisandhivasena paṭiccanayo uddhaṭo,
tika-abh07t0:1137_7: pītisahagatasukhasahagatapadavibhaṅge pana “ahetukaṃ pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭiccatayo khandhā…pe…
tika-abh07t0:1137_9: Ahetukaṃ sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā …pe…
tika-abh07t0:1137_12: tasmā yathādhammasāsane avacanampi abhāvameva dīpetīti na tassa paṭisandhivasena pavatti atthi.
tika-abh07t0:1138_1: Manodvārāvajjanassa parittārammaṇe dvattikkhattuṃ pavattamānassapi natthi javanakiccaṃ tassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanābhāvatoti
tika-abh07t0:1138_9: Ekacittakkhaṇikampi hi lokuttaramaggādikaṃ taṃsabhāvavantatāya javanakiccaṃ nāma,
tika-abh07t0:1138_10: yathā ekekagocaravisayampi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sakalavisayāvabodhanasāmatthiyayogato na kadāci taṃnāmaṃ vijahatīti.
tika-abh07t0:1139_1: Evaṃ kiccabhedena vuttāneva yathāsakaṃ labbhamānakiccagaṇanavasena sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “tesu panā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1140_3: atha vā paṭisandhādayo nāma tannāmakā cittuppādā paṭisandhādīnaṃ kiccānaṃ bhedena cuddasa,
tika-abh07t0:1140_4: ṭhānabhedena paṭisandhādīnaṃyeva ṭhānānaṃ bhedena dasadhā pakāsitāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1140_6: tathā dve ca nava ca aṭṭha ca dve cāti niddiseti sambandho.
tika-abh07t0:1143_2: Āvajjanādīnaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato dvārāni viyāti dvārāni.
tika-abh07t0:1147_1: Tatthāti tesu cakkhādidvāresu cakkhudvāre chacattālīsa cittāni yathārahamuppajjantīti sambandho.
tika-abh07t0:1147_8: Sabbathāpīti āvajjanāditadārammaṇapariyosānena sabbenapi pakārena kāmāvacarānevāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1147_10: Sabbathāpi taṃtaṃdvārikavasena ṭhitāni aggahitaggahaṇena cakkhudvārikesu chacattālīsacittesu sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1148_2: manodvārasaṅkhātabhavaṅgato ārammaṇantaraggahaṇavasena appavattito ca paṭisandhādivasena pavattāni ekūnavīsati dvāravimuttāni.
tika-abh07t0:1149_2: chabbīsati mahaggatalokuttarajavanāni manodvāreyeva uppajjanato chattiṃsa cittāni yathārahaṃ sakasakadvārānurūpaṃ ekadvārikacittāni.
tika-abh07t0:1150_2: manodvāre ca tadārammaṇavasena pavattanato chadvārikāni ceva paṭisandhādivasappavattiyā dvāravimuttāni ca.
tika-abh07t0:1151_2: Chadvārikāni ca tāni kadāci dvāravimuttāni cāti chadvārikavimuttāni.
tika-abh07t0:1151_3: Atha vā chadvārikāni ca chadvārikavimuttāni cāti chadvārikavimuttānīti ekadesasarūpekaseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t0:1154_4: Vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ rūpayati hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti rūpaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1154_5: tadeva dubbalapurisena daṇḍādi viya cittacetasikehi ālambīyati,
tika-abh07t0:1154_6: tāni vā āgantvā ettha ramantīti ārammaṇanti rūpārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1154_9: Gandhayati attano vatthuṃ sūceti “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti gandho,
tika-abh07t0:1158_9: Dibbacakkhādivasappavattassa pana abhiññājavanassa yathārahaṃ chabbidhampi tikālikaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1159_2: taṃ pana nesaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na āvajjanassa viya kenaci aggahitameva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati,
tika-abh07t0:1159_6: nāpi maraṇāsannato purimabhāgajavanānaṃ viya kammakammanimittādivasena āgamasiddhivohāravinimuttanti āha “yathāsambhavaṃ…pe…
tika-abh07t0:1159_9: Kāmāvacarānañhi paṭisandhibhavaṅgānaṃ tāva rūpādipañcārammaṇaṃ chadvāraggahitaṃ yathārahaṃ paccuppannamatītañca kammanimittasammatamārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1159_11: Dhammārammaṇaṃ pana tesaṃ tiṇṇannampi manodvāraggahitameva atītaṃ kammakammanimittasammataṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1159_12: tathā rūpārammaṇaṃ ekameva manodvāraggahitaṃ ekantapaccuppannaṃ gatinimittasammatanti evaṃ kāmāvacarapaṭisandhādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1160_2: tathā dutiyacatutthāruppānaṃ atītamevāti evaṃ mahaggatapaṭisandhibhavaṅgacutīnaṃ manodvāraggahitaṃ paññattibhūtaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1161_0: Yebhuyyena bhavantare chadvāraggahitanti bāhullena atītānantarabhave maraṇāsannappavattachadvārikajavanehi gahitaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1161_1: Asaññībhavato cutānañhi paṭisandhivisayassa anantarātītabhave na kenaci dvārena gahaṇaṃ atthīti tadevettha yebhuyyaggahaṇena byabhicāritaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1161_2: Kevalañhi kammabaleneva tesaṃ paṭisandhiyā kammanimittādikamārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
tika-abh07t0:1161_3: Tathā hi saccasaṅkhepe asaññībhavato cutassa paṭisandhinimittaṃ pucchitvā –
tika-abh07t0:1164_1: Itarathā hi javanaggahitassapi ārammaṇassa kammabaleneva upaṭṭhāpiyamānattā “tenevā”ti sāvadhāraṇavacanassa adhippāyasuññatā āpajjeyyāti.
tika-abh07t0:1164_2: Nanu ca tesampi paṭisandhigocaro kammabhave kenaci dvārena javanaggahito sambhavatīti?
tika-abh07t0:1164_4: gatinimittasammato pana sabbesampi maraṇakāleyeva upaṭṭhātīti kuto tassa kammabhave gahaṇasambhavo.
tika-abh07t0:1164_6: evañca katvā ācariyena imasmiṃyeva adhikāre paramatthavinicchaye vuttaṃ –
tika-abh07t0:1167_1: Na hi taṃ atītakammakammanimittāni viya anubhūtaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1170_4: Ettha hi vipākāni tāva santīraṇādivasena rūpādipañcārammaṇe,
tika-abh07t0:1171_1: bhaṇḍabhājanaṭṭhāne mahāsaddaṃ sutvā “evarūpā loluppataṇhā me pahīnā”ti tussantassa saddārammaṇe,
tika-abh07t0:1171_3: rasasampannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ sabrahmacārīhi bhājetvā paribhuñjanakāle tussantassa rasārammaṇe,
tika-abh07t0:1171_5: pubbenivāsañāṇādīhi gahitakāmāvacaradhammaṃ ārabbha tussantassa dhammārammaṇeti evaṃ parittadhammapariyāpannesveva chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati.
tika-abh07t0:1172_1: Dvādasākusalaaṭṭhañāṇavippayuttajavanavasena vīsati cittāni attano jaḷabhāvato lokuttaradhamme ārabbha
tika-abh07t0:1172_2: pavattituṃ na sakkontīti navavidhalokuttaradhamme vajjetvā tebhūmakāni,
tika-abh07t0:1172_4: Imesu hi akusalato cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayuttacittuppādā parittadhamme ārabbha parāmasanaassādanābhinandanakāle kāmāvacarārammaṇā,
tika-abh07t0:1172_5: tenevākārena sattavīsati mahaggatadhamme ārabbha pavattiyaṃ mahaggatārammaṇā,
tika-abh07t0:1172_7: Diṭṭhivippayuttacittuppādāpi teyeva dhamme ārabbha kevalaṃ assādanābhinandanavasena pavattiyaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1173_2: Sekkhāpi hi ṭhapetvā lokiyacittaṃ arahato maggaphalasaṅkhātaṃ pāṭipuggalikacittaṃ jānituṃ na sakkonti anadhigatattā,
tika-abh07t0:1173_4: sekkhānaṃ pana attano attano maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇesu parasantānagatamaggaphalārammaṇāya abhiññāya parikammakāle,
tika-abh07t0:1173_5: abhiññācitteneva maggaphalānaṃ paricchindanakāle ca attano attano samānānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1173_6: heṭṭhimānañca maggaphaladhamme ārabbha kusalajavanānaṃ pavatti atthīti arahattamaggaphalasseva paṭikkhepo kato.
tika-abh07t0:1173_10: dibbacakkhādīhi rūpavijānanādikāle ca kusalajavanānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:1174_4: voṭṭhabbanassa ca taṃtaṃpurecārikavasappavattiyaṃ na ca kiñci agocaraṃ nāma atthi.
tika-abh07t0:1176_3: paṭhamatatiyāruppāni cāti ekavīsati kasiṇādipaññattīsu pavattanato paññattārammaṇāni.
tika-abh07t0:1177_1: Tevīsatikāmāvacaravipākapañcadvārāvajjanahasanavasena pañcavīsati cittāni paritthamhi kāmāvacarārammaṇe yeva bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:1177_2: Kāmāvacarañhi mahaggatādayo upādāya mandānubhāvatāya parisamantato attaṃ khaṇḍitaṃ viyāti parittaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1181_1: Tāni kāmaloke sabbānipi labbhanti paripuṇṇindriyassa tattheva upalabbhanato. Pi-
tika-abh07t0:1181_2: saddena pana andhabadhirādivasena kesañci asambhavaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh07t0:1182_1: Ghānādittayaṃ natthi brahmānaṃ kāmavirāgabhāvanāvasena gandharasaphoṭṭhabbesu virattatāya tabbisayappasādesupi virāgasabhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:1182_2: Buddhadassanadhammassavanādiatthaṃ pana cakkhusotesu avirattabhāvato cakkhādidvayaṃ tattha upalabbhati.
tika-abh07t0:1183_1: Arūpaloke sabbānipi cha vatthūni na saṃvijjanti arūpīnaṃ rūpavirāgabhāvanābalena tattha sabbena sabbaṃ rūpappavattiyā abhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:1186_1: Manoyeva visiṭṭhavijānanakiccayogato viññāṇaṃ nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena dhātu cāti manoviññāṇadhātu.
tika-abh07t0:1186_3: Sā hi manatoyeva anantarapaccayato sambhūyamanasoyeva anantarapaccayabhūtāti manaso sambandhinī hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1186_9: pannarasarūpāvacarānañca vasena pavattā yathāvuttamanodhātupañcaviññāṇadhātūhi avasesā manoviññāṇadhātu
tika-abh07t0:1186_10: saṅkhātā ca tiṃsa dhammā na kevalaṃ manodhātuyeva,
tika-abh07t0:1187_2: Paṭighassa anīvaraṇāvatthassa abhāvato taṃsahagataṃ cittadvayaṃ rūpalokepi natthi,
tika-abh07t0:1187_7: rūpāvacarāni arūpīnaṃ rūpavirāgabhāvanāvasena tadārammaṇesu jhānesupi virattabhāvato arūpabhave na uppajjantīti
tika-abh07t0:1187_8: sabbānipi etāni tettiṃsa cittāni hadayaṃ nissāyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:1188_4: paṭhamamaggato avasesāni satta anuttarāni cāti imesaṃ vasena dvecattālīsavidhā manoviññāṇadhātusaṅkhātā
tika-abh07t0:1189_1: Kāme bhave chavatthuṃ nissitā satta viññāṇadhātuyo,
tika-abh07t0:1189_2: rūpe bhave tivatthuṃ nissitā ghānaviññāṇādittayavajjitā catubbidhā viññāṇadhātuyo,
tika-abh07t0:1189_3: āruppe bhave anissitā ekā manoviññāṇadhātu matāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1190_4: tatoyeva avasesā āruppavipākavajjitā dvecattālīsa nissāya ca anissāya ca jāyare,
tika-abh07t0:1195_1: Iccevaṃ yathāvuttanayena cittuppādānaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ uttaraṃ vedanāsaṅgahādivibhāgato uttamaṃ pabhedasaṅgahaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1195_4: imassa anantaraṃ ettakāni cittānī”ti evaṃ pubbāparacittehi niyāmitaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu cittuppādānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1195_5: pavattisaṅgahaṃ nāma tannāmakaṃ saṅgahaṃ yathāsambhavato samāsena pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1196_1: Vatthudvārārammaṇasaṅgahā heṭṭhā kathitāpi paripuṇṇaṃ katvā pavattisaṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ puna nikkhittā.
tika-abh07t0:1197_0: 3. Visayānaṃ dvāresu, visayesu ca cittānaṃ pavatti visayappavatti.
tika-abh07t0:1200_2: “cakkhuviññāṇasambandhinī vīthi tena saha ekārammaṇaekadvārikatāya sahacaraṇabhāvato cakkhuviññāṇavīthī”tyādinā
tika-abh07t0:1200_3: viññāṇavasena vā vīthīnaṃ nāma yojanā kātabbāti dassetuṃ “cakkhudvāravīthī”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1203_1: “Atimahanta”ntyādīsu ekacittakkhaṇātītaṃ hutvā āpāthāgataṃ soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ atimahantaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1203_3: Catucittakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva navacittakkhaṇātītaṃ hutvā terasacittakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhacittakkhaṇāyutaṃ parittaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1203_4: Dasacittakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva pannarasacittakkhaṇātītaṃ hutvā sattacittakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dvicittakkhaṇāyukaṃ atiparittaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1206_1: Kathanti kena pakārena atimahantādivasena visayavavatthānanti pucchitvā cittakkhaṇavasena taṃ pakāsetuṃ “uppādaṭhitī”tyādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1206_17: ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatīti suttantapāṭhato ṭhitikkhaṇo atthī”ti,
tika-abh07t0:1206_21: na ca abhidhamme labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-abh07t0:1206_23: Tattha vuccate yatheva hi ekadhammādhārabhāvepi uppādabhaṅgānaṃ añño uppādakkhaṇo,
tika-abh07t0:1206_24: añño bhaṅgakkhaṇoti uppādāvatthāya bhinnā bhaṅgāvatthā icchitā.
tika-abh07t0:1206_29: Pāḷiyaṃ pana veneyyajjhāsayānurodhato nayadassanavasena sā na vuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1206_31: yathā rūpassa uppādo upacayo santatīti dvidhā bhinditvā desito,
tika-abh07t0:1206_38: ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti evaṃ saṅkhatadhammasseva lakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ uppādādīnaṃ vuttattā
tika-abh07t0:1206_39: na sakkā pabandhassa paññattisabhāvassa asaṅkhatassa ṭhiti tattha vuttāti viññātuṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1206_40: Upasaggassa ca dhātvattheyeva pavattanato “paññāyatī”ti etassa viññāyatīti attho.
tika-abh07t0:1206_41: Tasmā na ettāvatā cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇo paṭibāhituṃ yuttoti suvuttametaṃ “uppādaṭhitibhaṅgavasenā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1206_42: Evañca katvā vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyampi “ekekassa uppādaṭhitibhaṅgavasena tayo tayo khaṇā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1207_2: rūpaṃ garupariṇāmaṃ gāhakagāhetabbabhāvassa taṃtaṃkhaṇavasena uppajjanatoti āha “tānī”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1207_4: Sattarasannaṃ cittānaṃ khaṇāni viya khaṇāni sattarasacittakkhaṇāni,
tika-abh07t0:1207_6: Visuṃ visuṃ pana ekapaññāsa cittakkhaṇāni honti.
tika-abh07t0:1207_10: Lakkhaṇarūpesu ca jāti ceva aniccatā ca cittassa uppādabhaṅgakkhaṇehi samānāyukā,
tika-abh07t0:1209_0: Keci pana “paṭiccasamuppādaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘ettāvatā ekādasa cittakkhaṇā atītā honti,
tika-abh07t0:1209_2: Uppajjamānameva hi rūpaṃ bhavaṅgacalanassa paccayo hotī”ti vadanti,
tika-abh07t0:1209_3: tayidamasāraṃ “paṭisandhicittena sahuppannaṃ kammajarūpaṃ tato paṭṭhāya sattarasamena saddhiṃ nirujjhati,
tika-abh07t0:1209_4: paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe uppannaṃ aṭṭhārasamassa uppādakkhaṇe nirujjhatī”tyādinā aṭṭhakathāyameva sattarasacittakkhaṇassa āgatattā.
tika-abh07t0:1209_7: Heṭṭhimakoṭiyā hi ekacittakkhaṇampi atikkantasseva rūpassa āpāthāgamanasāmatthiyanti alamativitthārena.
tika-abh07t0:1210_4: Āpāthamāgacchantīti rūpasaddārammaṇāni sakasakaṭṭhāne ṭhatvāva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchantīti ābhogānurūpaṃ anekakalāpagatāni āpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
tika-abh07t0:1210_5: sesāni pana ghānādinissayesu allīnāneva viññāṇuppattikāraṇānīti ekekakalāpagatānipi.
tika-abh07t0:1210_6: Ekekakalāpagatāpi hi pasādā viññāṇassa ādhārabhāvaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh07t0:1210_7: te pana bhavaṅgacalanassa anantarapaccayabhūtena bhavaṅgena saddhiṃ uppannā.
tika-abh07t0:1211_0: Dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge caliteti visadisaviññāṇuppattihetubhāvasaṅkhātabhavaṅgacalanavasena purimaggahitārammaṇasmiṃyeva dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge pavatte.
tika-abh07t0:1211_1: Pañcasu hi pasādesu yogyadesāvatthānavasena ārammaṇe ghaṭṭite pasādaghaṭṭanānubhāvena bhavaṅgasantati
tika-abh07t0:1211_2: vocchijjamānā sahasā anocchijjitvā yathā vegena dhāvanto ṭhātukāmopi puriso ekadvipadavāre atikkamitvāva tiṭṭhati,
tika-abh07t0:1211_4: Tattha paṭhamacittaṃ bhavaṅgasantatiṃ cālentaṃ viya uppajjatīti bhavaṅgacalanaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1211_5: dutiyaṃ tassa occhijjanākārena uppajjanato bhavaṅgupacchedoti voharanti.
tika-abh07t0:1211_6: Idha pana avisesena vuttaṃ “dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge calite”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1212_0: Nanu ca rūpādinā pasāde ghaṭṭite tannissitasseva calanaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1212_3: Yathā hi bheriyā ekasmiṃ tale ṭhitasakkharāya makkhikāya nisinnāya aparasmiṃ tale daṇḍādinā pahaṭe anukkamena
tika-abh07t0:1212_4: bhericammavarattādīnaṃ calanena sakkharāya calitāya makkhikāya uppatitvā gamanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1212_5: evameva rūpādinā pasāde ghaṭṭite tannissayesu mahābhūtesu calitesu anukkamena taṃsambandhānaṃ sesarūpānampi
tika-abh07t0:1212_6: calanena hadayavatthumhi calite tannissitassa bhavaṅgassa calanākārena pavatti hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1215_1: Āvajjantanti “kiṃ nāmeta”nti vadantaṃ viya ābhogaṃ kurumānaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1215_3: Nanu ca “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti vacanato cakkhundriyameva dassanakiccaṃ sādeti,
tika-abh07t0:1215_9: Yadi evaṃ viññāṇassa taṃ kiccaṃ sādheti,
tika-abh07t0:1215_14: Tattha paccayābhāvato viññāṇaṃ nuppajjatīti na tassa cakkhuviññāṇena gahaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1215_16: Atha vā nissitakiriyā nissayappaṭibaddhā vuttā yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1216_2: Vavatthapentanti tameva rūpaṃ suṭṭhu sallakkhentaṃ viya.
tika-abh07t0:1216_5: Mucchāmaraṇāsannakālesu ca chappañcapi javanāni pavattantīti āha “yebhuyyenā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1216_6: Javanānubandhānīti paṭisotagāmināvaṃ nadīsoto viya kiñci kālaṃ javanaṃ anugatāni.
tika-abh07t0:1216_7: Tassa javanassa ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇametesanti tadārammaṇāni “brahmassaro”tyādīsu viya majjhepadalopavasena,
tika-abh07t0:1216_8: tadārammaṇāni ca tāni pākāni cāti tadārammaṇapākāni.
tika-abh07t0:1216_11: bhavaṅgapātoti vīthicittavasena appavattitvā cittassa bhavaṅgapāto viya,
tika-abh07t0:1216_13: Ettha ca vīthicittappavattiyā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ ambopamādikaṃ āharanti,
tika-abh07t0:1216_15: eko kira puriso phalitambarukkhamūle sasīsaṃ pārupitvā niddāyanto āsanne patitassa ekassa ambaphalassa
tika-abh07t0:1216_16: saddena pabujjhitvā sīsato vatthaṃ apanetvā cakkhuṃ ummīletvā disvā ca taṃ gahetvā madditvā upasiṅghitvā
tika-abh07t0:1216_17: pakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā paribhuñjitvā mukhagataṃ saha semhena ajjhoharitvā puna tattheva niddāyati.
tika-abh07t0:1216_26: mukhagataṃ saha semhena ajjhoharaṇakālo viya tadārammaṇakālo,
tika-abh07t0:1217_0: Imāya ca upamāya kiṃ dīpitaṃ hoti?
tika-abh07t0:1217_6: tadārammaṇassa ca tena anubhūtasseva anubhavananti evaṃ kiccavasena dhammānaṃ aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇatā dīpitā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1217_7: Evaṃ pavattamānaṃ pana cittaṃ “āvajjanaṃ nāma hutvā bhavaṅgānantaraṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1217_8: tvaṃ dassanādīsu aññataraṃ hutvā āvajjanānantara”ntyādinā niyuñjake kārake asatipi utubījaniyāmādi viya cittaniyāmavaseneva pavattatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1219_2: Natthi tadārammaṇuppādoti cuddasacittakkhaṇāyuke tāva ārammaṇassa niruddhattāva tadārammaṇaṃ nuppajjati.
tika-abh07t0:1219_3: Na hi ekavīthiyaṃ kesuci paccuppannārammaṇesu kānici atītārammaṇāni honti.
tika-abh07t0:1219_4: Pannarasacittakkhaṇāyukesupi javanuppattito paraṃ ekameva cittakkhaṇaṃ avasiṭṭhanti dvikkhattuṃ tadārammaṇuppattiyā
tika-abh07t0:1219_5: appahonakabhāvato natthi dutiyatadārammaṇassa uppattīti paṭhamampi nuppajjati.
tika-abh07t0:1219_6: Dvikkhattumeva hi tadārammaṇuppatti pāḷiyaṃ niyamitā cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ sabbavāresu “tadārammaṇāni dve”ti dvinnameva cittavārānaṃ āgatattā.
tika-abh07t0:1220_3: Yasmā pana majjhimabhāṇakānaṃ vādo heṭṭhā vuttapāḷiyā asaṃsandanato sammohavinodanīyaṃ paṭikkhittova,
tika-abh07t0:1220_4: tasmā ācariyenapi attanā anadhippetattāyeva idha ceva nāmarūpaparicchede ca sakiṃ tadārammaṇuppatti na vuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1221_1: Voṭṭhabbanuppādato paraṃ chacittakkhaṇāvasiṭṭhāyukampi ārammaṇaṃ appāyukabhāvena paridubbalattā javanuppattiyā paccayo na hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1221_2: Javanañhi uppajjamānaṃ niyamena sattacittakkhaṇāyukeyeva uppajjatīti adhippāyenāha “javanampi anuppajjitvā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1221_5: Itarathā hi aparakālakiriyāya samānakattukatā na labbhatīti.
tika-abh07t0:1221_9: Na hi “dvikkhattuṃ voṭṭhabbanameva parivattatī”ti vuttepi vacanassa asiliṭṭhabhāvo atthi,
tika-abh07t0:1221_10: na ca tikkhattuṃ pavattiyā bādhakaṃ kiñci vacanaṃ aṭṭhakathādīsu atthi.
tika-abh07t0:1221_11: Evañca katvā tattha tattha sīhaḷasaṃvaṇṇanākārāpi “dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhattuṃ vā”icceva vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh07t0:1221_13: Taṃ pana appatvā antarā cakkhuviññāṇādīsu ṭhatvā cittappavattiyā nivattanaṃ natthi.
tika-abh07t0:1222_0: Ānandācariyo panettha “āvajjanā kusalākusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti āvajjanāya kusalākusalānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1222_1: anantarapaccayabhāvassa vuttattā voṭṭhabbanāvajjanānañca atthantarābhāvato sati uppattiyaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1222_3: no aññathāti mucchākālādīsu mandībhūtavegatāya javanapāripūriyā parittārammaṇaṃ niyamitabbaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1222_7: Khīṇāsavānaṃ cutivasena pavattāni na kassaci anantarapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchantīti tāni viya voṭṭhabbanampi
tika-abh07t0:1222_8: paccayavekallato kusalākusalādīnaṃ anantarapaccayo na hotīti na na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1223_1: Natthi vīthicittuppādo uparimakoṭiyā sattacittakkhaṇāyukassapi dvattikkhattuṃ voṭṭhabbanuppattiyā appahonakabhāvato vīthicittānaṃ uppādo natthi,
tika-abh07t0:1223_7: Bhavaṅgupacchedanāmena pana heṭṭhāpi visuṃ avuttattā idha avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1224_2: aññattha pana dutiyatatiyavārāpi tadārammaṇajavanehi suññattā “moghavārā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1224_5: Paccayopi hi “ārammaṇa”nti vuccati “na lacchati māro otāraṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1224_9: Itarathā hi bhavaṅgacalanassa sakasakagocareyeva pavattanato pacchimavārassa atiparittārammaṇe pavatti
tika-abh07t0:1224_10: natthīti “catunnaṃ vārānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā”ti vacanaṃ durupapādanaṃ siyāti.
tika-abh07t0:1225_5: Cittuppādā cittānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ uppattivasena uppajjamānacittāniyeva vā catuddasa āvajjanādipañcakasattajavanatadārammaṇadvayavasena.
tika-abh07t0:1225_6: Vitthārā pana catupaññāsa sabbesameva kāmāvacarānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ tattha uppajjanato,
tika-abh07t0:1230_1: Manodvārikacittānaṃ atītānāgatampi ārammaṇaṃ hotīti tesaṃ atimahantādivasena visayavavatthānaṃ kātuṃ
tika-abh07t0:1230_2: na sakkāti vibhūtāvibhūtavasenevetaṃ niyametuṃ “yadi vibhūtamārammaṇa”ntyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1231_2: Ekacattālīsa pañcadvārāveṇikānaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇamanodhātuttayavasena terasacittānaṃ tattha appavattanato.
tika-abh07t0:1235_1: Tattha hi chabbīsatimahaggatalokuttarajavanesu yaṃ kiñci javanaṃ appanāvīthimotaratīti sambandho.
tika-abh07t0:1235_5: Nāccāsannopi hi nātidūrappavatti samīpacārī nāma hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1235_13: imāni cattāri nāmāni catukkhattuṃ pavattiyaṃ anavasesato labbhanti,
tika-abh07t0:1236_1: Khippābhiññassa hi tikkhattuṃ pavattakāmāvacarajavanānantaraṃ catutthaṃ appanācittamuppajjati.
tika-abh07t0:1236_2: Dandhābhiññassa catukkhattuṃ pavattajavanānantaraṃ pañcamaṃ appanā uppajjati,
tika-abh07t0:1236_3: yasmā pana aladdhāsevanaṃ anulomaṃ gotrabhuṃ uppādetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh07t0:1236_4: laddhāsevanampi ca chaṭṭhaṃ sattamaṃ bhavaṅgassa āsannabhāvena papātāsannapuriso viya appanāvasena patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh07t0:1236_6: pañcamato paraṃ vā appanā na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1236_9: “Tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapātova hotī”ti ettakeyeva vutte catutthaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1236_10: pañcamaṃ vā otiṇṇaappanāto paraṃ bhavaṅgapātova hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1236_12: samāpattivīthiyañca jhānaphalacittāni punappunanti gaṇheyyunti puna “appanāvasāne”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1236_13: Nikāyantariyā kira lokiyappanāsu paṭhamakappanāto paraṃ sattamajavanapūraṇatthaṃ dvattikkhattuṃ kāmāvacarajavanānampi
tika-abh07t0:1236_14: pavattiṃ vaṇṇentīti tesaṃ matinisedhanatthaṃ “bhavaṅgapātovā”ti sāvadhāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1237_7: na pana upekkhāsahagatā bhinnavedanānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvassa anuddhaṭattā.
tika-abh07t0:1238_2: upekkhakā tihetukakusaladvayato paraṃ tatheva pañcamajjhānāni dvādasa,
tika-abh07t0:1238_6: aggaphalassa ca vasena cha appanā sambhonti.
tika-abh07t0:1245_4: Iṭṭhamajjhatte santīraṇatadārammaṇāni upekkhāsahagatānevāti āha “atiiṭṭhe pana somanassasahagatānevā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1245_5: Vipākassa hi kammānubhāvato pavattamānassa ādāse mukhanimittaṃ viya nibbikappatāya pakappetvā gahaṇābhāvato yathārammaṇameva vedanāyogo hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1245_6: kusalākusalānaṃ pana appahīnavipallāsesu santānesu pavattiyā atiiṭṭhepi iṭṭhamajjhattaaniṭṭhākārato,
tika-abh07t0:1245_8: Tathā hi assaddhādīnaṃ buddhādīsu atiiṭṭhārammaṇesupi upekkhājavanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1245_14: Cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ pana atiiṭṭhāniṭṭhesu pavattamānānampi upekkhāsahagatabhāve kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā kathitameva.
tika-abh07t0:1246_3: Khīṇāsavānaṃ cittavipallāsābhāvena kiriyajavanānipi yathārammaṇameva pavattantīti vuttaṃ “somanassasahagatakiriyajavanāvasāne”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1246_4: Keci pana ācariyā “paṭṭhāne ‘kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī’ti kusalākusalānamevānantaraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1246_5: tadārammaṇaṃ vuttanti natthi kiriyajavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇuppādo”ti vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:1246_8: Parittārammaṇe voṭṭhabbanānantarampi tassa pavattiṃ maññeyyunti kiriyajavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1246_10: Labbhamānassapi hi kenaci adhippāyena katthaci avacanaṃ dissati,
tika-abh07t0:1246_11: yathā taṃ dhammasaṅgahe labbhamānampi hadayavatthu desanābhedaparihāratthaṃ na vuttanti.
tika-abh07t0:1247_6: Tathā hi “sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena
tika-abh07t0:1247_7: paccayo”tyādinā sukhadukkhavedanāya sampayuttā dhammā attano attano samānavedanāsampayuttānaṃ adukkhamasukhavedanāya
tika-abh07t0:1247_8: sampayuttakānañca anantarapaccayabhāvena dvīsu dvīsu vāresu vuttā,
tika-abh07t0:1247_10: itaravedanādvayasampayuttānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayabhāvena tīsu vāresūti evaṃ vedanāttike satteva anantarapaccayavārā vuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1247_13: sukhadukkhavedanāsampayuttānampi aññamaññaṃ anantarapaccayavasena dve vāre vaḍḍhetvā nava vārā vattabbā siyuṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1247_15: Tasmā na tesaṃ tadanantaraṃ uppatti atthi.
tika-abh07t0:1252_2: Yebhuyyena hi akusalajavanesu paricitassa kadāci kusalajavanesu javitesu,
tika-abh07t0:1252_3: kusalajavanesu vā paricitassa kadāci akusalajavanesu javitesu akusalānantaraṃ pavattaparicayena tihetukajavanatopi paraṃ ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1252_4: tathā kusalānantaraṃ pavattaparicayena akusalajavanato paraṃ tihetukatadārammaṇampi,
tika-abh07t0:1252_5: paṭisandhinibbattakakammato pana aññakammena tadārammaṇappavattiyaṃ vattabbameva natthi.
tika-abh07t0:1252_6: Tathā ca vuttaṃ paṭṭhāne “ahetuke khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,
tika-abh07t0:1252_7: kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati,
tika-abh07t0:1252_8: kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1253_2: ‘Somanassapaṭisandhikassā’ti imināva bhavaṅgapātābhāvo dīpitova hoti domanassānantaraṃ somanassābhāvatoti
tika-abh07t0:1253_3: taṃ avatvā tadārammaṇābhāvameva parikappento āha “yadi tadārammaṇasambhavo natthī”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1253_4: Somanassapaṭisandhikassa titthiyādino buddhādiatiiṭṭhārammaṇe pi paṭihatacittassa domanassajavane javite
tika-abh07t0:1253_5: vuttanayena somanassatadārammaṇassa atiiṭṭhārammaṇe ca upekkhāsahagatatadārammaṇassa anuppajjanato,
tika-abh07t0:1253_6: kenaci vā asappāyena parihīnalokiyajjhānaṃ ārabbha “paṇītadhammo me naṭṭho”ti vippaṭisāraṃ janentassa
tika-abh07t0:1253_7: domanassajavane sati akāmāvacarārammaṇe tadārammaṇābhāvato yadi tadārammaṇassa uppattisambhavo natthīti
tika-abh07t0:1254_3: Yathā taṃ nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa phalacittantyadhippāyo. Yathāhu –
tika-abh07t0:1257_0: Kena pana kiccena idaṃ cittaṃ pavattatīti?
tika-abh07t0:1257_1: Tadārammaṇakiccena tāva na pavattati javanārammaṇassa aggahaṇato,
tika-abh07t0:1257_4: pārisesato pana bhavassa aṅgabhāvato bhavaṅgakiccenāti yuttaṃ siyā.
tika-abh07t0:1257_9: Na hi idamekaṃ ṭhānaṃ vajjetvā paṭisandhibhavaṅgānaṃ visadisatā atthi.
tika-abh07t0:1257_10: Tamanantaritvāti taṃ attano anantaraṃ abyavahitaṃ katvā,
tika-abh07t0:1258_2: icchantīti ettha kāmāvacarajavanāvasāneyeva tadārammaṇaṃ icchanti kāmataṇhānidānakammanibbattattā.
tika-abh07t0:1258_3: Na hi taṃ kāmataṇhāhetukena kammunā janitaṃ ataṃsabhāvassa rūpārūpāvacaralokuttarajavanassa anantaraṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh07t0:1258_7: Yathā hi gehato bahi nikkhamitukāmo bālako janakaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1258_10: evaṃ bhavaṅgavisayato aññattha pavattamānaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ janakaṃ kāmāvacarakusalākusalaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1258_18: taṃsadisaṃ vā anugacchantopi araññādiaparicitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantaṃ ananubandhitvā pamukhaṅgaṇādimhi paricitaṭṭhāneyeva anubandhati,
tika-abh07t0:1258_20: Apica kāmataṇhāyattakammajanitattāpi etaṃ kāmataṇhārammaṇesu parittadhammesveva pavattatīti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh07t0:1268_1: Mandappavattiyanti maraṇāsannakāle vatthudubbalatāya mandībhūtavegattā mandaṃ hutvā pavattiyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1269_3: pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya jhānadhamme visuṃ visuṃ āvajjentassa āvajjanavasitāya matthakappattiyā
tika-abh07t0:1269_6: “Bhagavato”ti ca idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ aññesampi dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ evarūpe accāyikakāle aparipuṇṇajavanānaṃ pavattanato.
tika-abh07t0:1269_7: Tathā ca vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayañca matthakappattā vasitā bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyakāle aññesaṃ vā evarūpe kāle”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1269_8: “Cattāri pañca vā”ti ca panetaṃ tikkhindriyamudindriyavasena gahetabbanti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1271_2: Yathārahanti pañcamaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā uppannamaggānurūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1271_3: Sattajavanaparamattā hi ekāvajjanavīthiyā catutthaṃ uppannamaggato paraṃ tīti phalacittāni,
tika-abh07t0:1271_4: pañcamaṃ uppannamaggato paraṃ dve vā honti.
tika-abh07t0:1272_4: na sotāpannasakadāminoti vuttaṃ “anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaphalaṃ vā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1272_5: Vibhattivipallāso cettha daṭṭhabbo “anāgāmiphale vā arahattaphale vā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1274_3: Avasesāni abhiññāmaggavajjitāni mahaggatalokuttarajavanāni bahūnipi labbhanti samāpattivīthiyaṃ ahorattampi pavattanato. Api-
tika-abh07t0:1277_9: Appanājavanābhāvatoyeva arahattaṃ natthīti kiriyajavanāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:1278_1: “Sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti pāṭhato ahetukānampi nānākammena dvihetukatadārammaṇaṃ sambhavati,
tika-abh07t0:1278_3: Mūlasandhiyā pana jaḷabhāvato ubhinnampi natthi tihetukatadārammaṇanti āha “tathā ñāṇasampayuttavipākāni cā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1278_4: Ācariyajotipālattherena pana “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅga”nti avisesena vuttattā ahetukānampi tihetukatadārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1278_5: vatvā idha ñāṇasampayuttavipākābhāvavacanassa parihāsavasena “so eva pucchitabbo,
tika-abh07t0:1278_7: taṃ pana parihāsavasena vuttampi ācariyaṃ pucchitvāva vijānanatthaṃ vuttavacanaṃ viya ṭhitaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1278_8: Tathā hi ācariyenevettha kāraṇaṃ paramatthavinicchaye vuttaṃ –
tika-abh07t0:1280_2: tesaṃ matānurodhena ca idhāpi ñāṇasampayuttavipākapaṭikkhepo ahetukeyeva sandhāyāti vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:1280_3: Tattha pana pamāṇapāṭhābhāvato ācariyena ubhinnampi sādhāraṇavasena ñāṇasampayuttavipākābhāve kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1280_4: vatvā samakameva cittaparicchedassa dassitattā tesaṃ vacanaṃ vīmaṃsitvā sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1280_6: taṃ pana atthato anuññātadvihetukavipākānaṃ tattheva sambhavadassanaparaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1282_2: sekkhānanti sikkhāya aparipūrakāritāya sikkhanasīlatāya “sekkhā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1282_3: puggalānaṃ paṭhamamaggeneva sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ pahīnattā taṃsahagatajavanāni ceva ca-
tika-abh07t0:1282_4: saddena ākaḍḍhitāni khīṇāsavāveṇikāni kiriyajavanāni ca na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:1284_2: samuppajjantīti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikabhāvena puggalantaresu asambhavato,
tika-abh07t0:1284_4: uparūparipuggalānañca asamugghāṭitakammakilesanirodhena puthujjanehi viya sotāpannānaṃ sotāpannādīhi
tika-abh07t0:1284_5: puggalantarabhāvūpagamanena paṭippassaddhattā ca aṭṭhapi lokuttarajavanāni yathāsakaṃ maggaphalaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1285_1: Idāni tesaṃ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ yathāpaṭikkhittajavanāni vajjetvā pārisesato labbhamānajavanāni sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “asekkhāna”ntyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1285_5: catucattālīsa vīthicittāni sambhavā yathālābhaṃ kāmabhave ṭhitānaṃ vasena uddise.
tika-abh07t0:1286_10: āpāyikānaṃ tāneva dvihetukavipākavajjitāni sattatiṃsa vīthicittānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1291_1: Tyādinā ghānaviññāṇādīnampi paṭikkhepo hessatīti rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ paṭighajavanatadārammaṇāneva paṭikkhittāni.
tika-abh07t0:1293_0: Keci pana “rūpabhave aniṭṭhārammaṇābhāvato idhāgatānaṃyeva brahmānaṃ akusalavipākasambhavoti tāni parihāpetvā
tika-abh07t0:1293_1: pañcaparittavipākehi saddhiṃ rūpabhave saṭṭhiyeva vīthicittānī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:1293_2: Idha pana tattha ṭhatvāpi imaṃ lokaṃ passantānaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇassa asambhavo na sakkā vattunti tehi saddhiṃyeva tattha catusaṭṭhi vuttāni.
tika-abh07t0:1293_3: Evañca katvā vuttaṃ dhammānusāraṇiyaṃ “yadā brahmāno kāmāvacaraṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ ālambanti,
tika-abh07t0:1296_3: Yāvatāyukanti paṭisandhito paraṃ bhavanikantivasena pavattamanodvārikacittavīthito paṭṭhāya cuticittāvasānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1296_4: tato pubbe pavattabhavaṅgāvasānaṃ vā abbocchinnā asati nirodhasamāpattiyanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh07t0:1300_1: Ettāvatā vīthisaṅgahaṃ dassetvā idāni vīthimuttasaṅgahaṃ dassetumārabhanto āha “vīthicittavaseneva”ntyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1300_2: Evaṃ yathāvuttanayena vīthicittavasena pavattiyaṃ paṭisandhito aparabhāge cutipariyosānaṃ pavattisaṅgaho nāma saṅgaho udīrito,
tika-abh07t0:1300_4: tadāsannatāya taṃgahaṇeneva gahitacutikāle ca pavattisaṅgaho vuccatīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1302_2: soyeva bhūmi bhavanti ettha sattāti apāyabhūmi.
tika-abh07t0:1302_3: Anekavidhasampattiadhiṭṭhānatāya sobhanā gantabbato upapajjitabbato gatīti sugati,
tika-abh07t0:1303_4: Yavanti tāya sattā amissitāpi samānajātitāya missitā viya hontīti yoni.
tika-abh07t0:1303_8: Ettha pana tiracchānayonipettivisayaggahaṇena khandhānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ tesaṃ tādisassa paricchinnokāsassa abhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:1303_9: Yattha vā te araññapabbatapādādike nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanti,
tika-abh07t0:1303_11: Na suranti issariyakīḷādīhi na dibbantīti asurā, petāsurā.
tika-abh07t0:1303_12: Itare pana na surā surappaṭipakkhāti asurā,
tika-abh07t0:1303_13: idha ca petāsurānameva gahaṇaṃ itaresaṃ tāvatiṃsesu gahaṇassa icchitattā.
tika-abh07t0:1305_1: Satisūrabhāvabrahmacariyayogyatādiguṇehi ukkaṭṭhamanatāya mano ussannaṃ etesanti manussā.
tika-abh07t0:1305_4: Tehi pana samānarūpāditāya saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi itaramahādīpavāsinopi “manussā”ti vuccanti.
tika-abh07t0:1305_5: Lokiyā pana “manuno ādikhattiyassa apaccaṃ puttāti manussā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:1306_1: catunnaṃ vā mahārājānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānabhūte cātumahārāje bhavāti cātumahārājikā.
tika-abh07t0:1306_2: Māghena māṇavena saddhiṃ tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino ettha nibbattāti taṃsahacaritaṭṭhānaṃ tettiṃsaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1306_5: Yasmā pana “sahassaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ sahassaṃ tāvatiṃsāna”nti vacanato sesacakkavāḷesupi chakāmāvacaradevalokā atthi,
tika-abh07t0:1306_6: tasmā nāmamattameva etaṃ tassa devalokassāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1306_8: Attano sirisampattiyā tusaṃ pītiṃ itā gatāti tusitā.
tika-abh07t0:1306_10: Paranimmitesu bhogesu attano vasaṃ vattentīti paranimmitavasavattino.
tika-abh07t0:1307_1: Mahābrahmānaṃ paricārikattā tesaṃ parisati bhavāti brahmapārisajjā.
tika-abh07t0:1307_3: Tehi tehi jhānādīhi guṇavisesehi brūhitā parivuddhāti brahmāno,
tika-abh07t0:1307_4: vaṇṇavantatāya ceva dīghāyukatādīhi ca brahmapārisajjādīhi mahantā brahmānoti mahābrahmāno.
tika-abh07t0:1308_3: Valāhakato vijju viya ito cito ca ābhā sarati nissarati etesaṃ sappītikajjhānanibbattakkhandhasantānattāti ābhassarā.
tika-abh07t0:1308_4: Daṇḍadīpikāya vā acci viya etesaṃ sarīrato ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī viya sarati nissaratīti ābhassarā.
tika-abh07t0:1310_3: taṃmukhena vuttāvasesā arūpakkhandhā ca etesanti asaññā.
tika-abh07t0:1310_7: Anunayapaṭighābhāvato vā suddho āvāso etesanti suddhāvāsā,
tika-abh07t0:1311_1: Imesu pana paṭhamatalavāsino appakena kālena attano ṭhānaṃ na vijahantīti avihā.
tika-abh07t0:1311_5: Pañcamatalavāsino pana ukkaṭṭhasampattikattā natthi etesaṃ kaniṭṭhabhāvoti akaniṭṭhā.
tika-abh07t0:1313_2: sotāpannā ca sakadāgāmino cāpi puggalā suddhāvāsesu sabbathā na labbhantīti sambandho.
tika-abh07t0:1313_3: Puthujjanādīnañca paṭikkhepena anāgāmiarahantānameva tattha lābho vutto hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1314_0: 14. Sesaṭṭhānesūti suddhāvāsaapāyaasaññivajjitesu sesaṭṭhānesu ariyā, anariyāpi ca labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:1318_4: itarenapi vā kammena anuppādetabbacakkhuko satto jaccandho nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1318_7: tena duhetukatihetukānaṃ mātukucchiyaṃ cakkhussa avipajjanaṃ siddha”nti vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:1318_9: Apare pana “ekacce ahetukapaṭisandhikā avikalindriyā hutvā thokaṃ vicāraṇapakatikā honti,
tika-abh07t0:1325_4: Tesupi hi nibbattā keci sattāhādikālaṃ tiṭṭhanti,
tika-abh07t0:1325_6: tathā manussānampi kadāci tesampi asaṅkhyeyyāyukattā kadāci dasavassāyukattā.
tika-abh07t0:1325_10: dutiyaṃ vassasataṃ na pāpuṇātī”ti idaṃ pana ajjatanakālike sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1326_1: Dibbāni pañcavassasatānīti manussānaṃ paññāsa vassāni ekadinaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1326_2: tadanurūpato māsasaṃvacchare paricchinditvā dibbappamāṇāni pañcavassasatāni āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1330_2: dibbāni ca pañcavassasatāni diguṇaṃ katvā dibbavassasahassāni tāvatiṃsānaṃ sambhavatīti evaṃ divasasaṃvaccharadiguṇavasena catugguṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1330_5: Tato catugguṇaṃ yāmānanti tāvatiṃsānamāyuppamāṇato vuttanayena catugguṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1330_8: Tato catugguṇaṃ tusitānanti dibbāni cattāri vassasahassāni,
tika-abh07t0:1330_11: manussagaṇanāya dve vassakoṭisatāni cattālīsavassasatasahassādhikā tiṃsa vassakoṭiyo ca.
tika-abh07t0:1330_12: Tato catugguṇaṃ paranimmitavasavattīnanti dibbāni soḷasa vassasahassāni.
tika-abh07t0:1331_3: tathā saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassāni vasavattīsu āyuppamāṇanti sambandho.
tika-abh07t0:1332_3: cavanakāle ca tathārūpameva bhavaṅgacutivasena pavattitvā nirujjhatīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1333_3: Na hi brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ mahākappavasena āyuparicchedo sambhavati ekakappepi tesaṃ avināsābhāvena paripuṇṇakappe asambhavato.
tika-abh07t0:1333_4: Tathā hesa loko sattavāresu agginā vinassati,
tika-abh07t0:1333_7: aṭṭhame vāre udakenāti evaṃ aṭṭhasu aṭṭhakesu paripuṇṇesu pacchime vāre vātena vinassati.
tika-abh07t0:1335_0: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvaro siyā.
tika-abh07t0:1338_0: Tasmā tiṇṇampi paṭhamajjhānatalānaṃ ekakappepi avināsābhāvato sakalakappe tesaṃ sambhavo natthīti asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena
tika-abh07t0:1338_2: Dutiyajjhānāditalato paṭṭhāya pana paripuṇṇassa mahākappassa vasena,
tika-abh07t0:1338_4: Asaṅkhyeyyakappoti ca yojanāyāmavitthārato setasāsaparāsito vassasatavassasataccayena ekekabījassa haraṇena
tika-abh07t0:1338_6: So pana sattharogadubbhikkhānaṃ aññatarasaṃvaṭṭena bahūsu vināsamupagatesu avasiṭṭhasattasantānappavattakusalakammānubhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1338_7: dasavassato paṭṭhāya anukkamena asaṅkhyeyyāyukappamāṇesu sattesu puna asaddhammasamādānavasena kamena
tika-abh07t0:1338_8: parihāyitvā dasavassāyukesu jātesu rogādīnaṃ aññatarasaṃvaṭṭena sattānaṃ vināsappattiyāva “ayameko antarakappo”ti
tika-abh07t0:1338_9: evaṃ paricchinnassa antarakappassa vasena catusaṭṭhiantarakappappamāṇo hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1344_0: Tattha paṭisandhipavattīsu vipākakaṭattārūpānaṃ nibbattakā kusalākusalacetanā janakaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1344_1: Sayaṃ vipākaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkontampi kammantarassa cirataravipākanibbattane paccayabhūtaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1344_3: upabrūhanapaccayuppattiyā ca janakasāmatthiyānurūpaṃ ciratarappavattipaccayabhūtaṃ kusalākusalakammaṃ upatthambhakaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1344_4: Kammantarajanitavipākassa byādhidhātusamatādinimittavibādhanena ciratarappavattivinibandhakaṃ yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ upapīḷakaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1344_5: Dubbalassa pana kammassa janakasāmatthiyaṃ upahacca vicchedakapaccayuppādanena tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā
tika-abh07t0:1345_1: janakaṃ kammantarassa vipākaṃ anupacchinditvāva vipākaṃ janeti,
tika-abh07t0:1345_2: upaghātakaṃ upacchedanapubbakanti idaṃ tāva aṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1345_3: Apare pana ācariyā “upapīḷakakammaṃ bahvābādhatādipaccayopasaṃhārena kammantarassa vipākaṃ antarantarā vibādhati.
tika-abh07t0:1345_4: Upaghātakaṃ pana taṃ sabbaso upacchinditvā aññassa okāsaṃ deti,
tika-abh07t0:1345_6: Evañhi janakato imassa viseso supākaṭo”ti vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:1346_7: Kaṭattākammanti garukādibhāvaṃ asampattaṃ katamattatoyeva kammanti vattabbakammaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1347_0: Tattha kusalaṃ vā hotu akusalaṃ vā,
tika-abh07t0:1347_3: tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati satipi āsannādikamme parittaṃ udakaṃ ottharitvā gacchanto mahogho viya.
tika-abh07t0:1347_5: Tasmiṃ asati dūrāsannesu yaṃ āsannaṃ maraṇakāle anussaritaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1347_8: Tasmimpi asati āciṇṇānāciṇṇesu ca yaṃ āciṇṇaṃ susīlyaṃ vā,
tika-abh07t0:1347_11: Kaṭattākammaṃ pana laddhāsevanaṃ purimānaṃ abhāvena paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhatīti garukaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ vipaccati.
tika-abh07t0:1347_17: Abhidhammāvatārādīsu pana āsannato āciṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ vipaccantaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1347_18: Yathā pana gogaṇaparipuṇṇassa vajassa dvāre vivaṭe aparabhāge dammagavabalavagavesu santesupi yo vajadvārassa āsanno hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1347_21: evaṃ garukato aññesu kusalākusalesu santesupi maraṇakālassa āsannattā āsannameva paṭhamaṃ vipākaṃ detīti idha taṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1348_4: Apare apare diṭṭhadhammato aññasmiṃ yattha katthaci attabhāve veditabbaṃ kammaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1349_1: paccayavisesena paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvappattā tādisassa pubbābhisaṅkhārassa vasena sātisayā
tika-abh07t0:1349_2: hutvā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve phaladāyinī paṭhamajavanacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1349_3: Sā hi vuttappakārena balavajanasantāne guṇavisesayuttesu upakārānupakāravasappavattiyā,
tika-abh07t0:1349_4: āsevanālābhena appavipākatāya ca itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1349_5: okāsalābhāpekkhañca kammaṃ na hotīti idheva pupphamattaṃ viya pavattivipākamattaṃ ahetukaphalaṃ deti.
tika-abh07t0:1349_6: Atthasādhikā pana sattamajavanacetanā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanābhūtā vuttanayena paṭiladdhavisesā anantarattabhāve vipākadāyinī upapajjavedanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1349_7: Sā ca paṭisandhiṃ datvāva pavattivipākaṃ deti.
tika-abh07t0:1349_8: Paṭisandhiyā pana adinnāya pavattivipākaṃ detīti natthi.
tika-abh07t0:1349_10: Paṭisandhiyā pana dinnāya jātisatepi pavattivipākaṃ detīti ācariyā.
tika-abh07t0:1349_11: Yathāvuttakaāraṇavirahato diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādibhāvaṃ asampattā ādipariyosānacetanānaṃ majjhe pavattā
tika-abh07t0:1349_12: pañca cetanā vipākadānasabhāvassa anupacchinnattā yadā kadāci okāsalābhe sati paṭisandhipavattīsu vipākaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1349_15: tatiyampi ca saṃsārappavattiyā vocchinnāya ahosikammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1350_2: yadā kadācīti evaṃ purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ yathāparicchinnakālavasena,
tika-abh07t0:1352_2: taṃniddesamukhena ca tesaṃ pāṇātipātādivasena dasavidhādibhedañca dassetuṃ “tattha akusala”ntyādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1353_1: Pāṇassa saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā atīva pātanaṃ pāṇātipāto.
tika-abh07t0:1353_3: Methunavītikkamasaṅkhātesu kāmesu micchā caraṇaṃ kāmesu micchācāro.
tika-abh07t0:1354_2: Tasmiṃ pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
tika-abh07t0:1354_5: Surāpānampi ettheva saṅgayhatīti vadanti rasasaṅkhātesu kāmesu micchācārabhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:1355_0: Kiñcāpi hi taṃtaṃkammasahagatacittuppādeneva sā viññatti janīyati.
tika-abh07t0:1355_1: Tathāpi tassā tathā pavattamānāya taṃsamuṭṭhāpakakammassa kāyakammādivohāro hotīti sā tasseva pavattimukhabhāvena vattuṃ labbhati.
tika-abh07t0:1355_2: “Kāyadvāre vuttito”ti ettakeyeva vutte “yadi evaṃ kammadvāravavatthānaṃ na siyā.
tika-abh07t0:1355_5: Pāṇātipātādikaṃ pana vācāya āṇāpentassa kāyakammaṃ vacīdvārepi pavattatīti dvārena kammavavatthānaṃ na siyā,
tika-abh07t0:1355_6: tathā musāvādādiṃ kāyavikārena karontassa vacīkammaṃ kāyadvārepi pavattatīti kammena dvāravavatthānampi
tika-abh07t0:1355_7: na siyā”ti ayaṃ codanā paccupaṭṭheyyāti bāhullavuttiyā vavatthānaṃ dassetuṃ “bāhullavuttito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1355_10: tasmā kāyadvāreyeva bahulaṃ pavattanato kāyakammabhāvo siddho vanacarakādīnaṃ vanacarakādibhāvo viya.
tika-abh07t0:1355_13: tasmā kāyakammassa yebhuyyena ettheva pavattanato kāyakammadvārabhāvo siddho brāhmaṇagāmādīnaṃ brāhmaṇagāmādibhāvo
tika-abh07t0:1355_14: viyāti natthi kammadvāravavatthāne koci vibandhoti ayametthādhippāyo.
tika-abh07t0:1356_8: hitañca phalati visarati vināsetīti samphaṃ, attano,
tika-abh07t0:1357_0: Tattha abhūtaṃ vatthuṃ bhūtato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathā viññāpanappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
tika-abh07t0:1357_7: Na hi cittasaṇhatāya sati pharusavācā nāma hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1357_9: so pana parehi tasmiṃ anatthe gahiteyeva kammapatho.
tika-abh07t0:1358_1: Parasampattiṃ abhimukhaṃ jhāyati lobhavasena cintetīti abhijjhā.
tika-abh07t0:1359_0: Tattha “aho vata idaṃ mama siyā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanaṃ abhijjhā,
tika-abh07t0:1359_1: sā parabhaṇḍassa attano nāmaneneva kammapatho hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1359_2: “Aho vatāyaṃ satto vinasseyyā”ti evaṃ manopadoso byāpādo.
tika-abh07t0:1359_5: Imesaṃ pana aṅgādivavatthānavasena papañco tattha tattha āgatanayena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t0:1360_4: Hasamānāpi hi rājāno dosacitteneva pāṇavadhaṃ āṇāpenti,
tika-abh07t0:1360_6: Micchādassanassa abhinivisitabbavatthūsu lobhapubbaṅgamameva abhinivisanato āha “micchādiṭṭhi ca lobhamūlenā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1360_7: Sesāni cattāripi dvīhi mūlehi sambhavantīti yo tāva abhimataṃ vatthuṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1360_14: attasantakameva brāhmaṇā paribhuñjantī”tyādīni vatvā sakasaññāya evaṃ yaṃ kiñci harantānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1361_1: Chasu ārammaṇesu tividhakammavasena uppajjamānampetaṃ tividhaniyamena uppajjatīti āha “tathā dānasīlabhāvanāvasenā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1361_6: Chaḷārammaṇesu pana tividhakammadvāresu ca nesaṃ pavattiyojanā aṭṭhakathādīsu āgatanayena gahetabbā.
tika-abh07t0:1362_10: Bhāveti kusale dhamme āsevati vaḍḍheti etāyāti bhāvanā.
tika-abh07t0:1362_11: Apacāyati pūjāvasena sāmīciṃ karoti etenāti apacāyanaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1362_13: Attano santāne nibbattā patti dīyati etenāti pattidānaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1363_0: Tattha sānusayasantānavato paresaṃ pūjānuggahakāmatāya attano vijjamānavatthupariccajanavasappavattacetanā dānaṃ nāma,
tika-abh07t0:1363_2: dinnassa somanassacittena anussaraṇavasena ca pavattā pubbapacchābhāgacetanā ettheva samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:1363_10: catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paripūrentassa ca pavattacetanā sīlaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1363_12: khandhādīsu ca bhūmīsu parikammasammasanavasappavattā appanaṃ appattā gotrabhupariyosānacetanā bhāvanā nāma,
tika-abh07t0:1364_1: guṇehi ca jeṭṭhānaṃ cīvarādīsu paccāsārahitena asaṃkiliṭṭhajjhāsayena paccuṭṭhānaāsanābhinīhārādividhinā bahumānakaraṇacetanā apacāyanaṃ nāma. Tesameva,
tika-abh07t0:1364_3: Attano santāne nibbattassa puññassa parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ paccāsīsanacetanā pattidānaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1364_5: adinnassapi vā puññassa maccheramalavinissaṭena cittena abbhānumodanacetanā pattānumodanā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1364_6: Evamimaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tattha vuttanayena paṭipajjanto “lokiyalokuttaraguṇavisesassa bhāgī bhavissāmi,
tika-abh07t0:1364_7: bahussuto vā hutvā paresaṃ dhammadesanādīhi anuggaṇhissāmī”ti evaṃ attano,
tika-abh07t0:1364_8: paresaṃ vā hitapharaṇavasappavattena asaṃkiliṭṭhajjhāsayena hitūpadesasavanacetanā dhammassavanaṃ nāma,
tika-abh07t0:1364_10: Lābhasakkārādinirapekkhatāya yoniso manasi karoto hitūpadesacetanā dhammadesanā nāma,
tika-abh07t0:1365_0: Yadi evaṃ ñāṇavippayuttacittuppādassa diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyabhāvo na labbhatīti?
tika-abh07t0:1365_1: No na labbhati purimapacchimacetanānampi taṃtaṃpuññakiriyāsveva saṅgaṇhanato.
tika-abh07t0:1365_2: Kiñcāpi hi ujukaraṇavelāyaṃ ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1365_3: purimapacchābhāge pana ñāṇavippayuttampi sambhavatīti tassapi diṭṭhijukammabhāvo upapajjatīti alamatippapañcena.
tika-abh07t0:1366_0: Imesu pana dasasu pattidānānumodanā dāne saṅgahaṃ gacchanti taṃsabhāvattā.
tika-abh07t0:1366_2: Tasmā samānappaṭipakkhatāya ekalakkhaṇattā te dānamayapuññakiriyavatthumhi saṅgayhanti.
tika-abh07t0:1366_4: Desanāsavanadiṭṭhijukā pana kusaladhammāsevanabhāvato bhāvanāmaye saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1366_6: suṇanto ca desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjha paṭivijjha deseti,
tika-abh07t0:1366_8: tāni ca desanāsavanāni paṭivedhamevāharantīti desanāsavanābhāvanāmaye saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:1366_9: Dhammadānasabhāvato desanā dānamaye saṅgahaṃ gacchatītipi sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1366_12: Dānādīsu hi yaṃ kiñci “atthi dinna”ntyādinayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā visodhitaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1366_13: evañca katvā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “diṭṭhijukammaṃ sabbesaṃ niyamalakkhaṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1366_14: Evaṃ dānasīlabhāvanāvasena tīsu itaresaṃ saṅgaṇhanato saṅkhepato tividhameva puññakiriyavatthu hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1367_4: Jhānaṅgabhedenāti paṭipadādibhedato anekavidhattepi aṅgātikkamavasena nibbattajjhānaṅgabhedato pañcavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1368_4: tadālambaṃ viññāṇanti catubbidhanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ bhedena.
tika-abh07t0:1369_3: Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ adhimokkhavirahena sabbadubbalampi vicikicchāsahagataṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati,
tika-abh07t0:1369_7: dubbalaṃ nākaḍḍhatīti hi ayaṃ vicāraṇā paṭisandhidānasabhāvesuyeva.
tika-abh07t0:1370_0: Kathaṃ panetaṃ viññātabbaṃ uddhaccasahagatassa paṭisandhidānasabhāvo natthīti?
tika-abh07t0:1370_6: Tattha diṭṭhisahagatavicikicchāsahagatacittuppādā dassanena pahātabbā nāma paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanavasena
tika-abh07t0:1370_8: Uddhaccasahagatacittuppādo bhāvanāya pahātabbo nāma aggamaggena pahātabbattā.
tika-abh07t0:1370_9: Uparimaggattayañhi paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhanibbāne bhāvanāvasena pavattanato “bhāvanā”ti vuccati.
tika-abh07t0:1370_11: siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbā tesaṃ apāyanibbattakāvatthāya paṭhamamaggena,
tika-abh07t0:1370_13: Tattha siyā dassanena pahātabbampi dassanena pahātabbasāmaññena idha “dassanena pahātabba”nti voharanti.
tika-abh07t0:1371_1: tadā akusalapaṭisandhiyā sugatiyaṃ asambhavato apāyesveva dadeyya.
tika-abh07t0:1371_3: Itarathā apāyagamanīyassa appahīnattā sekkhānaṃ apāyuppatti āpajjati,
tika-abh07t0:1371_4: na ca panetaṃ yuttaṃ “catūhapāyehi ca vippamutto,
tika-abh07t0:1371_6: Sati ca panetassa dassanena pahātabbabhāve “siyā dassanena pahātabbā”ti imassa vibhaṅge vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh07t0:1371_8: Atha siyā “apāyagāminiyo rāgo doso moho tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā”ti evaṃ dassanena pahātabbesu vuttattā uddhaccasahagatacetanāya
tika-abh07t0:1371_9: tattha saṅgaho sakkā vattunti. Taṃ na,
tika-abh07t0:1371_14: tasmā dassanena pahātabbesu avacanaṃ imassa paṭisandhidānābhāvaṃ sādheti.
tika-abh07t0:1372_0: “Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe…
tika-abh07t0:1372_2: yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti…pe…
tika-abh07t0:1373_0: Evaṃ uddhaccasahagatacittuppādaṃ uddharitvā tassa vipākopi uddhaṭoti kathamassa paṭisandhidānābhāvo sampaṭicchitabboti?
tika-abh07t0:1374_0: “Sahajātā dassanena pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh07t0:1374_1: nānākkhaṇikā dassanena pahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1375_0: Dassanena pahātabbacetanāya eva sahajātanānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvaṃ uddharitvā “sahajātā bhāvanāya
tika-abh07t0:1375_1: pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti bhāvanāya pahātabbacetanāya sahajātakammapaccayabhāvova uddhaṭo,
tika-abh07t0:1375_3: na ca nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayaṃ vinā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanaṃ atthi,
tika-abh07t0:1375_5: Yaṃ paneke vadanti “uddhaccacetanā ubhayavipākampi na deti paṭṭhāne nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvassa anuddhaṭattā”ti,
tika-abh07t0:1375_6: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge uddhaccasahagatānampi pavattivipākassa uddhaṭattā,
tika-abh07t0:1375_7: paṭṭhāne ca paṭisandhivipākabhāvameva sandhāya nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvassa anuddhaṭattā.
tika-abh07t0:1375_8: Yadi hi pavattivipākaṃ sandhāya nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo vucceyya,
tika-abh07t0:1375_9: tadā paṭisandhivipākampissa maññeyyunti labbhamānassapi pavattivipākassa vasena nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo na vutto,
tika-abh07t0:1375_10: tasmā na sakkā tassa pavattivipākaṃ nivāretuṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1375_12: Ācariyabuddhamittādayo pana atthi uddhaccasahagataṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbampi.
tika-abh07t0:1375_16: phaladānañca puthujjanasantānappavattasseva na itarassāti evaṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ dvidhā vibhajitvā ekassa ubhayavipākadānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1375_20: yañca sabbathāpi vipākābhāvavādīnaṃ matapaṭikkhepanaṃ idha avuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1375_22: visesato ca abhidhammatthavikāsiniyā nāma abhidhammāvatārasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1376_9: yaṃ akusalassa kammassa iṭṭho kanto vipāko saṃvijjatī”ti,
tika-abh07t0:1376_11: Aññabhūmikassa ca kammassa aññabhūmikavipākābhāvato kāmavirāgabhāvanāya kāmataṇhāvisayaviññāṇuppādanāyogato
tika-abh07t0:1376_12: ekantasadisavipākattā ca mahaggatānuttarakusalānaṃ rūpāvacarakammena ahetukavipākuppattiyā abhāvato rūpalokepi
tika-abh07t0:1376_13: yathārahaṃ rūpādivisayāni tāni abhinipphādetīti vuttaṃ “sabbatthāpi kāmaloke”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1377_1: Evaṃ pana vipaccantaṃ kammaṃ soḷasakadvādasakaaṭṭhakavasena tidhā vipaccatīti dassetuṃ “tatthāpi”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1377_5: Yañhi kammaṃ attano pavattikāle purimapacchābhāgappavattehi kusalakammehi parivāritaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1378_1: Na hi ekena kammena anekāsu jātīsu paṭisandhi hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1378_3: Yathāha “tiracchānagate dānaṃ datvā sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1378_6: tasmā taṃsampayuttaṃ kammaṃ jaccandhādivipattipaccayaṃ na hotīti tihetukaṃ atidubbalampi samānaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhimeva ākaḍḍhati,
tika-abh07t0:1378_9: yathā taṃ alobhasampayogābhāvato alobhaphaluppādane asamatthaṃ akusalakammanti taṃ atiukkaṭṭhampi samānaṃ duhetukameva paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati,
tika-abh07t0:1379_1: yathā paṭisambhidāmagge “gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe tiṇṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1379_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe tiṇṇañca hetūnaṃ vasena aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā ñāṇasampayuttūpapatti,
tika-abh07t0:1379_4: tathā “gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti javanakkhaṇe dvinnaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1379_6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvinnañca hetūnaṃ vasena channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā ñāṇavippayuttūpapatti vuttā,
tika-abh07t0:1379_7: evaṃ “gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti tihetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhiyā
tika-abh07t0:1379_9: Nayidamevaṃ duhetukomakakammena ahetukapaṭisandhiyā viya tihetukomakakammena sāmatthiyānurūpato duhetukapaṭisandhiyāva dātabbattā,
tika-abh07t0:1379_10: kammasarikkhakavipākadassatthaṃ pana mahātherena sāvaseso pāṭho kato.
tika-abh07t0:1379_11: Itarathā “catunnaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā”ti vacanābhāvato duhetukakammena ahetukūpapattiyāpiabhāvo āpajjati,
tika-abh07t0:1379_12: tasmā yathā sugatiyaṃ jaccandhabadhirādivipattiyā ahetukūpapattiṃ vajjetvā gatisampattiyā sahetukūpapattidassanatthaṃ duhetukūpapatti eva uddhaṭā,
tika-abh07t0:1379_14: evaṃ kammasarikkhakavipākadassanatthaṃ tihetukakammena tihetukūpapatti eva uddhaṭā,
tika-abh07t0:1380_1: Evaṃ ekāya cetanāya soḷasa vipākāni ettheva dvādasakamaggo ahetukaṭṭhakampīti pavattassa tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravādassa
tika-abh07t0:1380_2: vasena vipākappavattiṃ dassetvā idāni ekāya cetanāya dvādasa vipākāni ettheva dasakamaggo ahetukaṭṭhakampīti
tika-abh07t0:1380_3: āgatassa moravāpīvāsīmahādhammarakkhitattheravādassapi vasena dassetuṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhāravipākānī”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1380_4: Yathā mukhe calite ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ calati,
tika-abh07t0:1380_6: na sasaṅkhāroti evaṃ āgamanatova saṅkhārabhedoti ayametthādhippāyo.
tika-abh07t0:1380_7: Yasmā pana vipākassa saṅkhārabhedo paccayavasena icchito,
tika-abh07t0:1381_7: duhetukomakassa vasena duhetukadvayavajjitāni ca aṭṭha vipākāni yathāvuttassa “tihetukamukkaṭṭha”ntyādinā
tika-abh07t0:1381_8: vuttanayassa anusārena anussaraṇena yathāsambhavaṃ tassa tassa sambhavānurūpato uddise.
tika-abh07t0:1382_1: Parito attaṃ khaṇḍitaṃ viya appānubhāvanti parittaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1382_4: Tattha “paṭiladdhamattaṃ anāsevitaṃ paritta”nti avisesatova aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1382_6: Ativiya subhāvitaṃ pana sabbaso paripuṇṇavasībhāvaṃ paṇīta”nti.
tika-abh07t0:1382_7: Ācariyena panettha parittampi īsakaṃ laddhāsevanamevādhippetanti dissati.
tika-abh07t0:1384_0: Aladdhā tādisaṃ hetuṃ, abhiññā na vipaccatī”ti. ;
tika-abh07t0:1385_0: Samānabhūmikatova āsevanalābhena balavabhāvato mahaggatadhammānaṃ vipākadānaṃ vatvā tadabhāvato abhiññāya avipaccanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1386_1: Pañcamajjhānaṃ bhāvetvāti abhiññābhāvaṃ asampattaṃ pañcamajjhānaṃ tividhampi bhāvetvā.
tika-abh07t0:1386_2: Abhiññābhāvappattassa pana avipākabhāvo “aladdhā tādisa”ntyādinā ācariyena sādhito.
tika-abh07t0:1386_5: tattha tattha vitthārato ca abhidhammatthavikāsiniyaṃ vuttanayena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1386_8: “dhī cittaṃ dhibbataṃ citta”ntyādinā vā nayena arūpappavattiyā ādīnavadassanena tadabhāve ca paṇītabhāvasanniṭṭhānena
tika-abh07t0:1386_9: vāyokasiṇe kesañci matena paricchinnākāsakasiṇe vā bhāvanābalena tena paṭilabhitabbabhāve arūpassa anibbattisabhāvāpādanavasena
tika-abh07t0:1386_10: arūpavirāgabhāvanaṃ bhāvetvā aññasattesu uppajjanti kammakiriyavādino titthiyā evātyadhippāyo.
tika-abh07t0:1386_11: Te pana yena iriyāpathena idha maranti.
tika-abh07t0:1387_1: Anāgāmino pana suddhāvāsesu uppajjantīti anāgāminoyeva ariyā puthujjanādikāle,
tika-abh07t0:1387_2: pacchāpi vā pañcamajjhānaṃ tividhampi bhāvetvā saddhādiindriyavemattatānukkamena pañcasu suddhāvāsesu uppajjanti.
tika-abh07t0:1388_1: Yathākkamaṃ bhāvetvā yathākkamaṃ āruppesu uppajjantīti yojanā yathākkamanti ca paṭhamāruppādianukkamena.
tika-abh07t0:1388_2: Sabbampi cetaṃ tassa tasseva jhānassa āveṇikabhūmivasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1388_3: Nikantiyā pana sati puthujjanādayo yathāladdhajjhānassa bhūmibhūtesu suddhāvāsavajjitesu yattha katthaci nibbattanti,
tika-abh07t0:1388_7: Anāgāmino pana kāmarāgassa sabbaso pahīnattā kāmabhavesu nikantiṃ na uppādentīti kāmalokavajjite yathāladdhajjhānabhūmibhūte
tika-abh07t0:1388_9: Suddhāvāsesu hi anāgāminoyeva nibbattantīti niyamo atthi.
tika-abh07t0:1388_10: Te pana aññattha na nibbattantīti niyamo natthi.
tika-abh07t0:1391_0: Sukkhavipassakāpi panete maraṇakāle ekanteneva samāpattiṃ nibbattenti samādhimhi paripūrakārībhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1391_1: “Itthiyopi pana ariyā vā anariyā vā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhiniyo brahmapārisajjesuyeva nibbattantī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1391_2: Apicettha vehapphalaakaniṭṭhacatutthāruppabhavānaṃ seṭṭhabhavabhāvato tattha nibbattā ariyā aññattha nuppajjanti,
tika-abh07t0:1391_3: tathā avasesesu uparūpari brahmalokesu nibbattā heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimesu.
tika-abh07t0:1397_1: “Āyukkhayenā”tyādīsu satipi kammānubhāve taṃtaṃgatīsu yathāparicchinnassa āyuno parikkhayena maraṇaṃ āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1397_2: Satipi tattha tattha paricchinnāyusese gatikālādipaccayasāmaggiyañca taṃtaṃbhavasādhakassa kammuno pariniṭṭhitavipākattā maraṇaṃ kammakkhayamaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1397_4: Satipi tasmiṃ duvime purimabhavasiddhassa kassaci upacchedakakammuno balena satthaharaṇādīhi upakkamehi upacchijjamānasantānānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1397_5: guṇamahantesu vā katena kenaci upakkamena āyūhitaupacchedakakammunā paṭibāhitasāmatthiyassa kammassa
tika-abh07t0:1397_6: taṃtaṃattabhāvappavattane asamatthabhāvato dusimārakalāburājādīnaṃ viya taṅkhaṇeyeva ṭhānācāvanavasena
tika-abh07t0:1397_8: Idaṃ pana nerayikānaṃ uttarakuruvāsīnaṃ kesañci devānañca na hoti. Tenāhu –
tika-abh07t0:1400_3: katthaci pana anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa yathopaṭṭhitaṃ nāmarūpadhammādikameva cutipariyosānānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati,
tika-abh07t0:1401_1: Channaṃ dvārānanti vakkhamānanayena yathāsambhavaṃ channaṃ upapattidvārānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1401_13: yaṃ dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ upapajjeyya nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1401_14: Tatthoṇataṃ vāti tasmiṃ upapajjitabbabhave oṇataṃ viya,
tika-abh07t0:1401_16: “Bāhullenā”ti ettha adhippāyo “yebhuyyena bhavantare”ti ettha vuttanayena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t0:1401_17: Atha vā “yathāraha”nti imināva so sakkā saṅgahetunti “bāhullenā”ti iminā sahasā occhijjamānajīvitānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1401_18: saṇikaṃ marantānaṃ viya na abhikkhaṇamevāti dīpitanti viññāyati.
tika-abh07t0:1401_19: Abhinavakaraṇavasenāti taṅkhaṇe kariyamānaṃ viya attānaṃ abhinavakaraṇavasena.
tika-abh07t0:1403_7: Itarathā akusalakammasahajātānaṃ bhavataṇhāsahajātānaṃ vā cutiāsannajavanasahajātānañca saṅgaho na siyā.
tika-abh07t0:1403_10: Taṇhānusayova mūlaṃ padhānaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaṃ imassāti taṇhānusayamūlako.
tika-abh07t0:1408_0: Sampayuttehi pariggayhamānanti attanā sampayuttehi phassādīhi dhammehi sampayuttapaccayādinā parivāretvā gayhamānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1408_1: sahajātānamadhiṭṭhānabhāvena pubbaṅgamabhūtanti attanā sahajātānaṃ patiṭṭhānabhāvena padhānabhūtaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1408_4: pacchimabhavantarassa ca aññamaññaṃ ekābaddhaṃ viya paṭisandahanavasena uppajjamānameva patiṭṭhāti,
tika-abh07t0:1408_6: Na hi purimabhavapariyāpanno koci dhammo bhavantaraṃ saṅkamati,
tika-abh07t0:1408_7: nāpi purimabhavapariyāpannahetūhi vinā uppajjati paṭighosapadīpamuddā viyāti alamatippapañcena.
tika-abh07t0:1409_4: Paṭisandhibhavaṅgānampi paccuppannārammaṇatā labbhatīti manodvāre tāva paṭisandhiyā catunnaṃ bhavaṅgānañca,
tika-abh07t0:1409_6: Tathā hi kassaci manodvāre āpāthamāgataṃ paccuppannaṃ gatinimittaṃ ārabbha uppannāya tadārammaṇapariyosānāya
tika-abh07t0:1409_7: cittavīthiyā anantaraṃ cuticitte uppanne tadanantaraṃ pañcacittakkhaṇāyuke ārammaṇe pavattāya paṭisandhiyā
tika-abh07t0:1409_9: pañcadvāre ca ñātakādīhi upaṭṭhāpitesu deyyadhammesu vaṇṇādike ārabbha yathārahaṃ pavattāya cittavīthiyā
tika-abh07t0:1409_10: cuticittassa ca anantaraṃ ekacittakkhaṇāyuke ārammaṇe pavattāya paṭisandhiyā paccuppannārammaṇe pavatti
tika-abh07t0:1409_12: vitthāro pana visuddhimagge vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā saṅkhārapaccayāviññāṇapadavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t0:1411_2: mūlaṭīkādīsu ca “kammabalena upaṭṭhāpitaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ supinaṃ passantassa viya dibbacakkhussa viya ca
tika-abh07t0:1411_3: manodvāreyeva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchatī”ti niyametvā vuttattā tesaṃ vacanaṃ na sampaṭicchanti ācariyā.
tika-abh07t0:1411_5: kammanimittaṃ pana paṭisandhijanakakammasseva nimittabhūtaṃ adhippetanti kathaṃ tassa cutiāsannajavanehi gahitassa paccuppannabhāvo sambhavati.
tika-abh07t0:1411_7: tadeva paṭisandhijanakaṃ bhaveyya upacitabhāvābhāvato anassāditattā ca.
tika-abh07t0:1411_8: “Katattā upacitattā”ti hi vacanato punappunaṃ laddhāsevanameva kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati.
tika-abh07t0:1411_9: Paṭisambhidāmagge ca nikantikkhaṇe dvinnaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayāpi sahetukapaṭisandhiyā vuttattākatūpacitampi
tika-abh07t0:1411_11: tadā ca paṭisandhiyā samānavīthiyaṃ viya pavattamānāni cutiāsannajavanāni kathaṃ punappunaṃ laddhāsevanāni siyuṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1411_13: Apica paccuppannaṃ kammanimittaṃ cutiāsannappavattānaṃ pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1411_14: “Pañcadvārikakammañca paṭisandhinimittakaṃ na hoti paridubbalabhāvato”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti saccametaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1411_15: Ñātakādīhi upaṭṭhāpitesu pana pupphādīsu sannihitesveva maraṇasambhavato tattha vaṇṇādikaṃ ārabbha cutiāsannavīthito
tika-abh07t0:1411_16: purimabhāgappavattānaṃ paṭisandhijananasamatthānaṃ manodvārikajavanānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtena saha samānattā
tika-abh07t0:1411_17: tadekasantatipatitaṃ cutiāsannajavanaggahitampi paccuppannaṃ vaṇṇādikaṃ kammanimittabhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1411_18: Evañca katvā vuttaṃ ānandācariyena “pañcadvāre ca āpāthamāgacchantaṃ paccuppannaṃ kammanimittaṃ āsannakatakammārammaṇasantatiyaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1413_1: Āruppacutiyā paraṃ heṭṭhimāruppavajjitā āruppapaṭisandhiyo honti uparūpariarūpīnaṃ heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimakammassa anāyūhanato,
tika-abh07t0:1413_2: upacārajjhānassa pana balavabhāvato tassa vipākabhūtā kāmatihetukā paṭisandhiyo honti.
tika-abh07t0:1413_3: Rūpāvacaracutiyā paraṃ ahetukarahitā upacārajjhānānubhāveneva duhetukatihetukapaṭisandhiyo siyuṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1413_4: kāmatihetumhā cutito paraṃ sabbā eva kāmarūpārūpabhavapariyāpannā yathārahaṃ ahetukādipaṭisandhiyo siyuṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1413_5: Itaro duhetukāhetukacutito paraṃ kāmesveva bhavesu tihetukādipaṭisandhiyo siyuṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1415_2: Tadeva cittanti taṃsadisatāya tabbohārappavattattā tadeva cittaṃ yathā “tāniyeva osadhānī”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1415_3: Asati vīthicittuppādeti antarantarā vīthicittānaṃ uppāde asati,
tika-abh07t0:1415_4: cuticittaṃ hutvā nirujjhati tadeva cittanti sambandho.
tika-abh07t0:1417_1: Yathā iha bhavepaṭisandhi ceva bhavaṅgañca vīthiyo ca cuti ca,
tika-abh07t0:1417_2: tathā puna bhavantare paṭisandhibhavaṅganti evamādikā ayaṃ cittasantati parivattatīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1417_3: Keci pana imasmiṃ paricchede vīthimuttasaṅgahasseva dassitattā paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutīnameva idha gahaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1417_5: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ pavattisaṅgahadassanāvasāne tattha saṅgahitānaṃ sabbesameva nigamanassa adhippetattā.
tika-abh07t0:1417_6: Evañhi sati “paṭisaṅkhāya panetamaddhuva”nti ettha sabbesameva eta-
tika-abh07t0:1417_8: Etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ vaṭṭapavattaṃ addhuvaṃ aniccaṃ palokadhammaṃ paṭisaṅkhāya paccavekkhitvā budhā paṇḍitā
tika-abh07t0:1417_9: cirāya cirakālaṃ subbatā hutvā accutaṃ dhuvaṃ acavanadhammaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigantvā maggaphalañāṇena
tika-abh07t0:1417_10: sacchikatvā tatoyeva suṭṭhu samucchinnasinehabandhanā samaṃ nirupadhisesanibbānadhātuṃ essanti pāpuṇissanti.
tika-abh07t0:1421_1: Evaṃ tāva cittacetasikavasena duvidhaṃ abhidhammatthaṃ dassetvā idāni rūpaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1421_4: pavattipaṭisandhivasena dvīhi paricchedehi vuttappavattivanto ca cittacetasikā dhammā ettāvatā pañcahi paricchedehi vibhattā hi yasmā,
tika-abh07t0:1424_1: Upādinnānupādinnasantānesu sasambhāradhātuvasena mahantā hutvā bhūtā pātubhūtāti mahābhūtā.
tika-abh07t0:1424_6: Tehi samānā sayaṃ anīlādisabhāvāneva nīlādiupādāyarūpadassanāditoti mahābhūtā.
tika-abh07t0:1424_7: Manāpavaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīhi vā sattānaṃ vañcikā yakkhiniādayo viya manāpaitthipurisarūpadassanādinā sattānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1427_0: Atha vā mahantapātubhāvato mahantāni bhavanti etesu upādārūpāni,
tika-abh07t0:1427_3: Yadi evaṃ “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tato mahābhūtā”tyādivacanato ekekamahābhūtā sesamahābhūtānaṃ nissayā hontīti tesampi upādāyarūpatāpasaṅgoti?
tika-abh07t0:1427_11: Apica catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpanti upādāyarūpalakkhaṇanti natthi tayo upādāya pavattānaṃ upādāyarūpatāti.
tika-abh07t0:1428_2: tarupabbatādīnaṃ pakatipathavī viya sahajātarūpānaṃ patiṭṭhānabhāvena pakkhāyati,
tika-abh07t0:1428_4: pathavī eva dhātu salakkhaṇadhāraṇādito nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena sarīraselāvayavadhātusadisattā cāti pathavīdhātu.
tika-abh07t0:1428_8: niseti vā tikkhabhāvena sesabhūtattayaṃ usmāpetīti tejo.
tika-abh07t0:1429_4: Tattha cakkhu tāva majjhe kaṇhamaṇḍalassa ūkāsirappamāṇe abhimukhe ṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattipadese
tika-abh07t0:1429_5: telamiva picupaṭalāni sattakkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā dhāraṇanahāpanamaṇḍanabījanakiccāhi catūhi dhātīhi viya
tika-abh07t0:1429_7: upatthambhiyamānaṃ āyunā paripāliyamānaṃ vaṇṇādīhi parivāritaṃ yathāyogaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1429_10: Evaṃ sotādayopi yathākkamaṃ sotabilabbhantare aṅgulivedhanākāraṃ upacitatanutambalomaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1429_13: itaraṃ pana ṭhapetvā kammajatejassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ kesaggalomagganakhaggasukkhacammāni ca avasesaṃ sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā pavattati.
tika-abh07t0:1429_14: Evaṃ santepi itarehi tassa saṅkaro na hoti bhinnanissayalakkhaṇattā.
tika-abh07t0:1429_15: Ekanissayānipi hi rūparasādīni lakkhaṇabhedato asaṃkiṇṇāti kiṃ pana bhinnanissayā pasādā.
tika-abh07t0:1430_1: Āpodhātuyā sukhumabhāvena phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā vuttaṃ “āpodhātu vivajjitaṃ bhūtattayasaṅkhāta”nti.
tika-abh07t0:1430_4: Mande hi uṇhatte sītabuddhi sītatāsaṅkhātassa kassaci guṇassa abhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:1430_5: Tayidaṃ sītabuddhiyā anavaṭṭhitabhāvato viññāyati pārāpāre viya.
