tika-abh07t0:1541_6: na evaṃ ghānajivhā aññamaññaṃ vinā pavattanti dvinnampi rūpabhave anuppajjanatoti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ kāmabhave
tika-abh07t0:1541_7: appavattivasena tesaṃ sahacāritā vuttāti na na sakkā vattunti.
tika-abh07t0:1542_6: paripiṇḍitāni ca tāni jātiuṇṇāya ekassa aṃsuno pasannatilatele pakkhipitvā uddhaṭassa paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumattāni acchāni vippasannāni.
tika-abh07t0:1543_2: Paṭisandhicittasahajātā hi utu ṭhānappattā tassa ṭhitikkhaṇe suddhaṭṭhakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-abh07t0:1543_3: tadā uppannā bhaṅgakkhaṇetyādinā anukkamena utu rūpaṃ janeti.
tika-abh07t0:1543_4: Ojāpharaṇamupādāyāti gabbhaseyyakassa mātu ajjhohaṭāhārato saṃsedajopapātikānañca mukhagatasemhādito
tika-abh07t0:1545_0: “Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
tika-abh07t0:1547_1: Tatoparaṃ cittajāhārajarūpañca vocchijjatīti ajīvakasantāne tesaṃ uppattiyā abhāvato yathānibbattaṃ cittajaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1547_2: āhārajañca tato paraṃ kiñci kālaṃ pavattitvā nirujjhati.
tika-abh07t0:1547_3: Apare pana ācariyā “cittajarūpaṃ cuticittato puretarameva vocchijjatī”ti vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh07t0:1548_2: Bhāvadvayaṃ pana bahalakāmarāgūpanissayattā brahmānañca tadabhāvato tattha na pavattati.
tika-abh07t0:1548_3: Āhārajakalāpāni ca na labbhanti ajjhohaṭāhārābhāvena sarīragatassapi āhārassa rūpasamuṭṭhāpanābhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:1548_5: āhārañca upanissayaṃ labhitvā utuāhārā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti.
tika-abh07t0:1549_3: maraṇakāle pana brahmānaṃ sarīranikkhepābhāvato sabbesampi tisamuṭṭhānāni,
tika-abh07t0:1550_2: Keci pana “lahutādittayampi tesu natthi dandhattakarādidhātukkhobhābhāvato”ti vadanti,
tika-abh07t0:1550_4: Na hi vūpasametabbāpekkhā tabbirodhidhammappavatti tathā sati sahetukakiriyacittesu lahutādīnaṃ abhāvappasaṅgato.
tika-abh07t0:1553_1: Ettāvatā cittacetasikarūpāni vibhāgato niddisitvā idāni nibbānaṃ niddisanto āha “nibbānaṃ panā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1553_2: “Catumaggañāṇena sacchikātabba”nti iminā nibbānassa taṃtaṃariyapuggalānaṃ paccakkhasiddhataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh07t0:1553_5: paññattārammaṇaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchedapaṭippassambhane asamatthaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1553_7: Tasmā atthi saṅkhatasammutidhammaviparīto kilesānaṃ samucchedapaṭippassaddhikarānaṃ maggaphalānaṃ ārammaṇabhūto nibbānaṃ nāma eko dhammoti siddhaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1553_8: Paccakkhānumānasiddhatāsandassanena ca abhāvamattaṃ nibbānanti vippaṭipannānaṃ vādaṃ nisedhetīti alamatippapañcena.
tika-abh07t0:1553_9: Khandhādibhede tebhūmakadhamme heṭṭhupariyavasena vinanato saṃsibbanato vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhantattā visayātikkamavasena atītattā.
tika-abh07t0:1554_7: Kāraṇapariyāyenāti saupādisesādivasena paññāpane kāraṇabhūtassa upādisesa bhāvābhāvassa lesena.
tika-abh07t0:1556_5: sahadhammena vattabbassa uttarassa vā abhāvato anuttaraṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1556_6: Vānato taṇhāto muttattā sabbaso apagatattā vānamuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1556_8: “Iti citta”ntyādi chahi paricchedehi vibhattānaṃ cittādīnaṃ nigamanaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1561_1: Salakkhaṇā cintanādisalakkhaṇā cittacetasikanipphannarūpanibbānavasena dvāsattatipabhedā vatthudhammā sabhāvadhammā vuttā,
tika-abh07t0:1561_2: idāni tesaṃ yathāyogaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ ekekasamuccayavasena yogānurūpato akusalasaṅgahādibhedaṃ samuccayaṃ rāsiṃ pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1562_3: saccābhisambodhisaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa pakkhe bhavānaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ satipaṭṭhānādibhedānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1564_2: vaṇato vā vissandamānayūsā viya cakkhādito visayesu vissandanato āsavā.
tika-abh07t0:1564_3: Atha vā bhavato ābhavaggaṃ dhammato āgotrabhuṃ savanti pavattantīti āsavā.
tika-abh07t0:1564_6: Tattha “āpāṭaliputtaṃ vuṭṭho devo”tyādīsu viya kiriyaṃ bahi katvā pavatto mariyādo.
tika-abh07t0:1564_7: “Ābhavaggaṃ saddo abbhuggato”tyādīsu viya kiriyaṃ byāpetvā pavatto abhividhi.
tika-abh07t0:1564_12: āgotrabhuñca savantesu mānādīsu attattaniyaggahaṇavasena abhibyāpanato madakaraṇaṭṭhena āsavasadisatāya ca eteyeva āsavabhāvena niruḷhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1564_22: paṭiccasamuppādesu cāti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇaṃ avijjāsavo.
tika-abh07t0:1565_2: ohananato vā heṭṭhā katvā hananato osīdāpanato “ogho”ti vuccati jalappavāho,
tika-abh07t0:1565_3: ete ca satte ottharitvā hanantā vaṭṭasmiṃ satte osīdāpentā viya hontīti oghasadisatāya oghā,
tika-abh07t0:1567_2: paccuppannakāyena vā anāgatakāyaṃ ganthenti duppamuñcaṃ veṭhentīti kāyaganthā.
tika-abh07t0:1567_4: tadubhayena ca suddhīti evaṃ parato asabhāvato āmasanaṃ parāmāso.
tika-abh07t0:1568_1: Maṇḍūkaṃ pannago viya bhusaṃ daḷhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ādiyantīti upādānāni.
tika-abh07t0:1568_4: “Iminā me sīlavatādinā saṃsārasuddhī”ti evaṃ sīlavatādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1568_6: khandhehi byatirittābyatirittavasena vīsati parikappitassa attano vādo attavādo.
tika-abh07t0:1569_1: Jhānādivasena uppajjanakakusalacittaṃ nisedhenti tathā tassa uppajjituṃ na dentīti nīvaraṇāni,
tika-abh07t0:1569_3: Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu adhimattarāgasaṅkhāto kāmoyeva chandanaṭṭhena chando cāti kāmacchando.
tika-abh07t0:1569_11: Kasmā panete bhinnadhammā dve dve ekanīvaraṇabhāvena vuttāti?
tika-abh07t0:1574_1: Appahīnaṭṭhena anu anu santāne sentīti anusayā,
tika-abh07t0:1574_3: Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati upajjanārahā santāne anu anu sayitā viya hontīti tadavatthā “anusayā”ti vuccanti.
tika-abh07t0:1574_6: Na hi kālabhedena dhammānaṃ sabhāvabhedo atthi,
tika-abh07t0:1574_8: nanu sabbepi kilesā appahīnā anusayā bhaveyyunti?
tika-abh07t0:1574_10: atha kho appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagatā kilesā anusayāti.
tika-abh07t0:1574_11: Thāmagamanañca anaññasādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnameva āveṇiko sabhāvoti alaṃ vivādena.
tika-abh07t0:1576_0: 12. Cittaṃ kilissati upatappati, bādhīyati vā etehīti kilesā.
tika-abh07t0:1578_1: Āsavā ca oghā ca yogā ca ganthā ca vatthuto dhammato vuttanayena tayo.
tika-abh07t0:1578_3: Nīvaraṇā aṭṭha siyuṃ thinamiddhauddhaccakukkuccānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇato.
tika-abh07t0:1578_4: Anusayā chaḷeva honti kāmarāgabhavarāgānusayānaṃ taṇhāsabhāvena ekato gahitattā.
tika-abh07t0:1578_5: Nava saṃyojanā matā ubhayattha vuttānaṃ taṇhāsabhāvānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1578_9: Iti evaṃ pāpānaṃ akusalānaṃ saṅgaho navadhā vutto.
tika-abh07t0:1587_1: Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā cintanasaṅkhātena upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena yathārahaṃ paccanīkadhammajhāpanaṭṭhena ca
tika-abh07t0:1587_2: jhānāni ca tāni aṅgāni ca samuditānaṃ avayavabhāvena aṅgīyanti ñāyantīti jhānaṅgāni.
tika-abh07t0:1587_3: Avayavavinimuttassa ca samudāyassa abhāvepi senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya visuṃ visuṃ aṅgabhāvena vuccanti ekato hutvā jhānabhāvena.
tika-abh07t0:1588_14: Sammā sāmañca ādhīyati etena cittanti sammāsamādhi,
tika-abh07t0:1589_8: ājānane aññabhāvibhāve ca ājānanādivasappavattehi sahajātehi attānaṃ anuvattāpentā dhammā issaraṭṭhena indriyāni nāmāti āha “cakkhundriya”ntyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1589_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aparepi indaliṅgaṭṭhādayo indriyaṭṭhā vuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1589_12: catusaccadhammameva vā ñassāmī”ti evamajjhāsayena paṭipannassa indriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1589_13: Ājānāti paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānāti indriyañcāti aññindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1589_14: Aññātāvino cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitassa arahato indriyaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1590_0: Ettha ca sattapaññattiyā visesanissayattā ajjhattikāyatanāni ādito vuttāni,
tika-abh07t0:1590_1: manindriyaṃ pana ajjhattikāyatanabhāvasāmaññena ettheva vattabbampi arūpindriyehi saha ekato dassanatthaṃ jīvitindriyānantaraṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1590_2: sāyaṃ paññatti imesaṃ vasena “itthī puriso”ti vibhāgaṃ gacchatīti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ bhāvadvayaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1590_3: tayime upādinnadhammā imassa vasena tiṭṭhantīti dassanatthaṃ tato paraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1590_4: sattasaññito dhammapuñjo pabandhavasena pavattamāno imāhi vedanāhi saṃkilissatīti dassanatthaṃ tato vedanāpañcakaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1590_5: tāhi pana visuddhikāmānaṃ vodānasambhāradassanatthaṃ tato saddhādipañcakaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1590_7: niṭṭhitakiccā ca hontīti dassanatthaṃ ante tīṇi vuttāni.
tika-abh07t0:1590_8: Ettāvatā adhippetatthasiddhīti aññesaṃ aggahaṇanti idametesaṃ anukkamena desanāya kāraṇanti alamatippapañcena.
tika-abh07t0:1591_2: sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca saddhādīni satta balāni,
tika-abh07t0:1592_2: “Chandavato kiṃnāma na sijjhatī”tyādikaṃ hi pubbābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamāne citte chandādayo
tika-abh07t0:1592_3: dhurabhūtā sayaṃ sampayuttadhamme sādhayamānā hutvā pavattanti,
tika-abh07t0:1592_7: Santesupi indriyantaresu kevalaṃ dassanādīsu cakkhuviññāṇādīhi anuvattāpanamattaṃ indriyatāti ayaṃ adhipatiindriyānaṃ viseso.
tika-abh07t0:1593_7: Ajjhattikasantatiyā pana visesapaccayattā imeyeva cattāro “āhārā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1594_0: Kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānañhi sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkārāhāro visesapaccayo kammādijanitassapi tassa
tika-abh07t0:1594_4: Phassopi sukhādivatthubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusantoyeva sukhādivedanāpavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1594_5: Manosañcetanā kusalākusalakammavasena āyūhamānāyeva bhavamūlanipphādanato sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1594_6: Viññāṇaṃ vijānantameva nāmarūpappavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā paccayo hotīti evameteyeva ajjhattasantānassa visesapaccayattā “āhārā”ti vuttā,
tika-abh07t0:1595_1: Pañcaviññāṇānaṃ vitakkavirahena ārammaṇesu abhinipātamattattā tesu vijjamānānipi upekkhāsukhadukkhāni
tika-abh07t0:1595_4: Dvipañcaviññāṇamanodhātuttikasantīraṇattikavasena soḷasacittesu vīriyābhāvato tattha vijjamānopi samādhi balabhāvaṃ na gacchati.
tika-abh07t0:1595_6: Tathā aṭṭhārasāhetukesu hetuvirahato maggaṅgāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:1595_7: “Hetupacchimakaṃ maggaṅga”nti hi vuttanti imamatthaṃ manasi nidhāyāha “dvipañcaviññāṇesū”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1597_3: Na hi te chandādīni purakkhatvā pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:1597_4: Vīmaṃsādhipatino dvihetukajavanesu asambhavato cittābhisaṅkhārūpanissayassa ca sambhavānurūpato labbhamānataṃ sandhāyāha “yathāsambhava”nti.
tika-abh07t0:1597_7: teneva hi bhagavatā “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”tyādinā hetupaccayaniddese
tika-abh07t0:1598_2: jhānaṅgāni pañca somanassadomanassupekkhānaṃ vedanāvasena ekato gahitattā,
tika-abh07t0:1598_3: maggaṅgā nava micchāsaṅkappavāyāmasamādhīnaṃ vitakkavīriyacittekaggatāsabhāvena sammāsaṅkappādīhi ekato gahitattā.
tika-abh07t0:1598_5: tiṇṇaṃ lokuttarindriyānaṃ paññindriyassa ca ñāṇasāmaññena ekato gahitattā,
tika-abh07t0:1598_9: āhārā tathā cattāro vuttāti kusalādīhi tīhi samākiṇṇo tatoyeva missakasaṅgaho evaṃnāmako saṅgaho sattadhā vutto.
tika-abh07t0:1605_11: Tathā sarāgamahaggatādivasena sampayogabhūmibhedena bhinnasseva cittassa anupassanā cittānupassanā.
tika-abh07t0:1606_2: So ca kiccabhedena catubbidhoti āha “cattāro sammappadhānā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1608_3: Yāya vā so satiādikāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhati saccāni paṭivijjhati,
tika-abh07t0:1608_8: tassā vā bodhiyā aṅgabhūtā kāraṇabhūtāti bojjhaṅgā,
tika-abh07t0:1609_1: “Sattadhā tattha saṅgaho”ti vatvāna puna taṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkappapassaddhi cā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1609_7: Eso uttamānaṃ bodhipakkhiyabhāvena visiṭṭhānaṃ sattatiṃsa dhammānaṃ pavaro uttamo vibhāgo.
tika-abh07t0:1610_1: Lokuttare aṭṭhavidhepi sabbe sattatiṃsa dhammā honti,
tika-abh07t0:1610_4: catutthapañcamajjhānike pītiyā ca asambhavato na honti vā,
tika-abh07t0:1610_5: lokiyepi citte sīlavisuddhādi chabbisuddhipavattiyaṃ yathāyogaṃ taṃtaṃkiccassa anurūpavasena keci katthaci visuṃ visuṃ honti,
tika-abh07t0:1613_1: Atītānāgatapaccuppannādibhedabhinnā te te sabhāgadhammā ekajjhaṃ rāsaṭṭhena khandhā.
tika-abh07t0:1613_4: te panete khandhā bhājanabhojanabyañjanabhattakārakabhuñjakavikappavasena pañceva vuttāti āha “rūpakkhandho”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1614_2: te pana upādānavisayabhāvena gahitā rūpādayo pañcevāti vuttaṃ “rūpupādānakkhandho”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1615_1: Āyatanti ettha taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā tena tena kiccena ghaṭṭenti vāyamanti,
tika-abh07t0:1615_2: āyabhūte vā te dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārenti,
tika-abh07t0:1615_12: ārammaṇabhūtāni ca bāhirāyatanāni chāti dvādasavidhānīti āha “cakkhāyatana”ntyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1616_0: Ettha ajjhattikāyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighārammaṇattā cakkhāyatanaṃ vibhūtanti taṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1616_3: itaresu sīghataraṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthattā ghānāyatanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1616_4: Purato ṭhapitamattassa hi bhojanādikassa gandho vātānusārena ghāne paṭihaññati,
tika-abh07t0:1616_8: yathāvuttānaṃ pana anukkamena tesaṃ tesaṃ ārammaṇāni rūpāyatanādīni vuttāni.
tika-abh07t0:1617_2: Atha vā yathāsambhavaṃ anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti,
tika-abh07t0:1617_3: bhārahārehi viya ca bhāro sattehi dhīyanti dhāriyanti,
tika-abh07t0:1617_8: haritālamanosilādiselāvayavadhātuyo viya ca ñeyyāvayavabhūtā cāti dhātuyo. Yathāhu –
tika-abh07t0:1619_0: Etāya dhīyate ettha, iti vā dhātusammatā;
tika-abh07t0:1621_0: Tā pana manāyatanaṃ sattaviññāṇadhātuvasena sattadhā bhinditvā avasesehi ekādasāyatanehi saha aṭṭhārasadhātū vuttāti āha “cakkhudhātū”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1622_4: cattāro phalaṭṭheti aṭṭhaariyapuggale sādhenti asati saccappaṭivedhe tesaṃ ariyabhāvānupagamanato,
tika-abh07t0:1622_5: sati ca tasmiṃ ekantena tabbhāvūpagamanato ca.
tika-abh07t0:1622_6: Dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggānameva pana yathākkamaṃ bādhakattaṃ pabhavattaṃ nissaraṇattaṃ niyyānikattaṃ, nāññesaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1627_1: ariyassa vā sammāsambuddhassa saccāni tena desitattāti ariyasaccāni.
tika-abh07t0:1627_2: Tāni pana saṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkiliṭṭhaphalahetuvasena catubbidhānīti āha “cattāri ariyasaccānī”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1627_5: Kammādipaccayasanniṭṭhāne dukkhuppattinimittatāya samudayo samudeti etasmā dukkhanti katvā,
tika-abh07t0:1628_3: nibbānassa ca vasena ekūnasattati dhammā āyatanesu dhammāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1629_1: Sesā cetasikāti vedanāsaññāhi sesā paññāsa cetasikā.
tika-abh07t0:1629_5: asubhe subhādisaññāvipallāsavasena ca tassā tadākārappavattīti tadupakaraṇabhūtā saññā,
tika-abh07t0:1629_6: tasmā saṃsārassa padhānahetutāya etā vinibhujjitvā desitāti.
tika-abh07t0:1632_3: Atītādibhedabhinnānañhi rāsaṭṭhena khandhavohāroti nibbānaṃ bhedābhāvato khandhasaṅgahato nissaṭaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1633_2: channaṃ ārammaṇānañca bhedena āyatanāni dvādasa bhavanti,
tika-abh07t0:1633_3: channaṃ dvārānaṃ channaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ tadubhayaṃ nissāya uppannānaṃ tattakānameva viññāṇānaṃ pariyāyena kamena dhātuyo aṭṭhārasa bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:1634_9: Kasmā pana aññesupi dukkhahetūsu santesu taṇhāyeva samudayoti vuttāti?
tika-abh07t0:1634_12: hi kammasahāyabhāvūpagamanena ca dukkhavicittatākāraṇattā taṇhā dukkhassa visesakāraṇanti.
tika-abh07t0:1634_13: Maggo dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadānāmena vutto maggo lokuttaro matoti maggoti puna maggaggahaṇaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1635_1: Maggayuttā aṭṭhaṅgikavinimuttā sesā maggasampayuttā phassādayo phalañceva sasampayuttanti ete catūhi saccehi vinissaṭā viniggatā nippariyāyato,
tika-abh07t0:1635_2: pariyāyato pana aññātāvindriyaniddesepi “maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpanna”nti vuttattā phaladhammesu sammādiṭṭhādīnaṃ maggasacce,
tika-abh07t0:1635_3: itaresañca maggaphalasampayuttānaṃ saṅkhāradukkhasāmaññena dukkhasacce saṅgaho sakkā kātuṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1635_4: Evañhi sati saccadesanāyapi sabbasaṅgāhikatā upapannā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1635_5: Kasmā panete khandhādayo bahū dhammā vuttāti?
tika-abh07t0:1635_11: Tesu nāmasammuḷhānaṃ khandhaggahaṇaṃ nāmassa tattha catudhā vibhattattā,
tika-abh07t0:1635_12: rūpasammuḷhānaṃ āyatanaggahaṇaṃ rūpassa tattha aḍḍhekādasadhā vibhattattā,
tika-abh07t0:1635_13: ubhayamuḷhānaṃ dhātuggahaṇaṃ ubhayesampi tattha vitthārato vibhattattā,
tika-abh07t0:1635_16: Taṃ panetaṃ tividhampi pavattinivattitadubhayahetuvasena diṭṭhameva upakārāvahaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1640_1: Idāni yathāvuttanāmarūpadhammānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādapaṭṭhānanayavasena paccaye dassetuṃ “yesa”ntyādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1640_2: Yesaṃ paccayehi saṅkhatattā saṅkhatānaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ ye paccayadhammā yathā yenākārena paccayā ṭhitiyā,
tika-abh07t0:1640_6: tassa ca paccayākārassa pabhedaṃ iha imasmiṃ samuccayasaṅgahānantare ṭhāne yathārahaṃ taṃtaṃpaccayuppannadhamme
tika-abh07t0:1640_7: sati taṃtaṃpaccayānaṃ taṃtaṃpaccayabhāvākārānurūpaṃ idāni pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1641_1: Tattha paccayasāmaggiṃ paṭicca samaṃ gantvā phalānaṃ uppādo etasmāti paṭiccasamuppādo,
tika-abh07t0:1642_2: Tassa paccayadhammassa bhāvena bhavanasīlassa bhāvo tabbhāvabhāvībhāvo,
tika-abh07t0:1642_14: āhacca visesetvā pavattā paccayasaṅkhātā ṭhiti āhaccapaccayaṭṭhiti.
tika-abh07t0:1642_15: Paṭiccasamuppādanayo hi tabbhāvabhāvībhāvākāramattaṃ upādāya pavattattā hetādipaccayaniyamavisesaṃ anapekkhitvā avisesatova pavattati,
tika-abh07t0:1642_16: ayaṃ pana hetāditaṃtaṃpaccayānaṃ tassa tassa dhammantarassa taṃtaṃpaccayabhāvasāmatthiyākāravisesaṃ upādāya
tika-abh07t0:1642_18: Keci pana “āhacca kaṇṭhatāluādīsu paharitvā vuttā ṭhiti āhaccapaccayaṭṭhitī”ti vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh07t0:1642_19: Taṃ pana savanamatteneva tesaṃ avahasitabbavacanataṃ pakāseti.
tika-abh07t0:1642_21: añño vā koci nayo kaṇṭhatāluādīsu anāhacca desetuṃ sakkāti.
tika-abh07t0:1642_22: Vomissetvāti paṭṭhānanayampi paṭiccasamuppādeyeva pakkhipitvā tabbhāvabhāvībhāvena hetādipaccayavasena
tika-abh07t0:1642_23: ca missetvā ācariyā saṅgahakārādayo papañcenti vitthārenti,
tika-abh07t0:1644_4: veditabbaṃ vā catusaccādikaṃ na viditaṃ karoti,
tika-abh07t0:1644_7: catūsu ariyasaccesu pubbantādīsu catūsu aññāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1644_14: catasso āruppacetanā āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti evametā ekūnatiṃsa cetanā saṅkhārā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1644_21: Nāmarūpapaccayāti ettha nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca nāmarūpanti sarūpekaseso veditabbo.
tika-abh07t0:1644_23: kesañci matena rūpādīni cha bāhirāyatanānipi vā āyatanaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1645_1: Chaḷārammaṇādivasena pana aṭṭhasatappabhedā honti kāmupādānādivasena cattāri upādānāni.
tika-abh07t0:1645_2: Ettha ca dubbalā taṇhā taṇhā nāma,
tika-abh07t0:1645_4: Asampattavisayapatthanā vā taṇhā tamasi corānaṃ hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya,
tika-abh07t0:1645_5: sampattavisayaggahaṇaṃ upādānaṃ corānaṃ hatthappattassa gahaṇaṃ viya.
tika-abh07t0:1645_11: Tattha paṭhamo bhavati etasmā phalanti bhavo,
tika-abh07t0:1645_17: So hi jātiyā paccayo hoti, na itaro.
tika-abh07t0:1645_19: na ca tadeva tassa kāraṇaṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1645_20: Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ taṃtaṃgatiādīsu attabhāvapaṭilābho jāti.
tika-abh07t0:1645_27: Ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa adhimattacetodukkhappabhāvito bhuso āyāso upāyāso.
tika-abh07t0:1646_0: Ettha ca satipi vatthārammaṇādike paccayantare avijjādiekekapaccayaggahaṇaṃ padhānabhāvato,
tika-abh07t0:1646_2: Ettha ca avijjānusayiteyeva santāne saṅkhārānaṃ vipākadhammabhāvena pavattanato avijjāpaccayāsaṅkhārāsambhavanti,
tika-abh07t0:1646_7: saḷāyatanañca nāmarūpanissayameva chabbidhaphassassa dvārabhāvena yathārahaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh07t0:1646_10: Na hi dvārābhāve tassuppatti siyāti saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso.
tika-abh07t0:1646_13: Vedanīyesu ca dhammesu assādānupassino vedanāhetukā taṇhā samuṭṭhātīti vedanāpaccayā taṇhā.
tika-abh07t0:1646_14: Taṇhāsinehapipāsitāyeva ca upādāniyesu dhammesu upādāya daḷhabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
tika-abh07t0:1646_15: Taṇhāya hi rūpādīni assādetvā assādetvā kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjantīti taṇhā kāmupādānassa paccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1646_16: Tathā rūpādibhedegadhito “natthi dinna”ntyādinā micchādassanaṃ saṃsārato muccitukāmo asuddhimagge suddhimaggaparāmāsaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1646_19: Yathārahaṃ sampayogānusayavasena upādānapatiṭṭhitāyeva sattā kammāyūhanāya saṃvattantīti upādānaṃ bhavassa paccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1646_21: Bījato aṅkuro viya tattha tattha samupalabbhatīti bhavo jātiyā paccayo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1646_23: Na hi ajātānaṃ jarāmaraṇasambhavo hotīti jāti jarāmaraṇānaṃ paccayoti evametesaṃ tabbhāvabhāvībhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t0:1647_0: Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti yathāvuttena paccayaparamparavidhinā,
tika-abh07t0:1647_1: na pana issaranimmānādīhi etassa vaṭṭasaṅkhātassa kevalassa sukhādīhi asammissassa,
tika-abh07t0:1647_2: sakalassa vā dukkhakkhandhassa dukkharāsissa na sukhasubhādīnaṃ samudayo nibbatti hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1648_0: 5. Atati satataṃ gacchati pavattatīti addhā, kālo.
tika-abh07t0:1649_2: addhāggahaṇena ca avijjādīnaṃ dhammānameva gahaṇaṃ tabbinimuttassa kassaci kālassa anupalabbhanato.
tika-abh07t0:1649_3: Niruddhānuppādā eva hi dhammā atītānāgatakālavasena uppādādikkhaṇattayapariyāpannā ca paccuppannakālavasena voharīyanti.
tika-abh07t0:1649_4: Jātijarāmaraṇaṃ anāgato addhā paccuppannahetuto anāgate nibbattanato.
tika-abh07t0:1649_5: Majjhe paccuppanno addhā atītahetuto idha nibbattanakaphalasabhāvattā,
tika-abh07t0:1649_6: anāgataphalassa idha hetusabhāvattā ca majjhe viññāṇādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni paccuppanno addhā.
tika-abh07t0:1651_1: Taṇhupādānabhavāpi gahitā hontīti kilesabhāvasāmaññato avijjāggahaṇena taṇhupādānāni,
tika-abh07t0:1651_3: Tathā taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena ca avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāti sambandho.
tika-abh07t0:1651_4: Etthāpi vuttanayena tesaṃ gahaṇena tesaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh07t0:1651_5: viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanānaṃ jātijarābhaṅgāva jātijarāmaraṇanti ca vuttāti āha “jātijarāmaraṇaggahaṇenā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1652_1: Atīte hetavo pañcāti sarūpato vuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1652_2: saṅgahavasena gahitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ taṇhupādānabhavānañca vasena paccuppannaphalassa paccayā atītabhave nibbattā hetavo pañca,
tika-abh07t0:1652_3: idāni phalapañcakanti atītahetupaccayā idha paccuppanne nibbattaṃ viññāṇādiphalapañcakaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1652_4: Idāni hetavo pañcāti sarūpato vuttānaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1652_5: saṅgahato laddhānaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ dvinnañca vasena āyatiṃ phalassa paccayā idāni hetavo pañca.
tika-abh07t0:1652_6: Āyatiṃ phalapañcakanti jātijarāmaraṇaggahaṇena vuttaṃ paccuppannahetupaccayā anāgate nibbattanakaviññāṇādiphalapañcakanti
tika-abh07t0:1652_7: evaṃ vīsati atītādīsu tattha tattha ākiriyantīti ākārā.
tika-abh07t0:1653_1: idāni phalapañcakassa ca antarā eko sandhi,
tika-abh07t0:1653_5: āyatiṃ phalassa ca antarā ekoti evaṃ tisandhi.
tika-abh07t0:1653_10: Ettha hi hetutophalassa avicchedappavattibhāvato hetuphalasambandhabhūto paṭhamo sandhi,
tika-abh07t0:1653_12: dutiyo pana phalato hetuno avicchedappavattibhāvato phalahetusambandhabhūto.
tika-abh07t0:1653_13: Phalabhūtopi hi dhammo aññassa hetusabhāvassa dhammassa paccayoti.
tika-abh07t0:1653_18: etarahi hetu āyatiṃ vipākoti cattāro saṅkhepāti catusaṅkhepā.
tika-abh07t0:1654_1: Kammabhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadesoti ettha āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayacetanā bhavo nāma,
tika-abh07t0:1654_2: purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayacetanā saṅkhārāti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:1654_3: Avasesā cāti viññāṇādipañcakajātijarāmaraṇavasena sattavidhā paccuppannaphalavasena vuttadhammā.
tika-abh07t0:1654_4: Upapattibhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadesoti pana anāgatapariyāpannā veditabbā. Bhava-
tika-abh07t0:1655_0: 12. Pubbantassa avijjā mūlaṃ. Aparantassa taṇhā mūlanti āha avijjātaṇhāvasena dve mūlānī”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1656_1: Tesameva avijjātaṇhāsaṅkhātānaṃ vaṭṭamūlānaṃ nirodhena anuppādadhammatāpattiyā saccappaṭivedhato siddhāya appavattiyā vaṭṭaṃ nirujjhati.
tika-abh07t0:1656_2: Abhiṇhaso abhikkhaṇaṃ jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātāya mucchāya pīḷitānaṃ sattānaṃ sokādisamappitānaṃ kāmāsavādiāsavānaṃ samuppādato puna avijjā ca pavattati.
tika-abh07t0:1656_6: Iccevaṃ vuttanayena ābaddhaṃ avicchinnaṃ anādikaṃ ādirahitaṃ tibhūmakapariyāpannattā tebhūmakaṃ kilesakammavipākavasena
tika-abh07t0:1656_7: tivaṭṭabhūtaṃ paṭiccasamuppādoti paṭṭhapesi paññapesi mahāmuni sammāsambuddho.
tika-abh07t0:1659_1: Evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādanayaṃ vibhāgato dassetvā idāni paṭṭhānanayaṃ dassetuṃ “hetupaccayo”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1659_5: Hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantena mūlena viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ phalaṃ gacchati
tika-abh07t0:1659_7: Hetu ca so paccayo cāti hetupaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1659_11: upakāraṭṭhena paccayoti saṅkhepato mūlaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo hetupaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1659_13: paṭisandhiyaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ ubhayattha sampayuttānaṃ nāmadhammānañca rukkhassa mūlāni
tika-abh07t0:1660_0: Ālambīyati dubbalena viya daṇḍādikaṃ cittacetasikehi gayhatīti ārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1660_1: Cittacetasikā hi yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha pavattanti,
tika-abh07t0:1660_2: te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1661_0: Na vijjati paccayuppannena saha antaraṃ etassa paccayassāti anantarapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1661_2: Attano attano anantaraṃ anurūpacittuppādajananasamattho purimapurimaniruddho dhammo “anantarapaccayo”,
tika-abh07t0:1661_6: Na hi tesaṃ atthato bhedo upalabbhati.
tika-abh07t0:1661_9: taṃ “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā samanantarapaccayena paccayo”tyādīhi virujjhati.
tika-abh07t0:1661_10: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ hi sattāhādikālaṃ niruddhaṃ phalasamāpattiyā samanantarapaccayo,
tika-abh07t0:1661_11: tasmā abhinivesaṃ akatvā byañjanamattatovettha nānākaraṇaṃ paccetabbaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1661_13: Pubbadhammanirodhassa hi pacchājātadhammuppādanassa ca antarābhāvena uppādanasamatthatāya nirodho anantarapaccayatā,
tika-abh07t0:1661_16: idaṃ samantato”ti attanā ekattaṃ upanetvā viya suṭṭhu anantarabhāvena uppādetuṃ samatthaṃ hutvā nirodho
tika-abh07t0:1661_18: Nirodhapaccayassapi hi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa asaññuppattiyā purimassa ca cuticittassa kālantarepi
tika-abh07t0:1661_19: uppajjantānaṃ phalapaṭisandhīnaṃ antarā samānajātiyena arūpadhammena byavadhānābhāvato bhinnajātikānañca
tika-abh07t0:1661_20: rūpadhammānaṃ byavadhānakaraṇe asamatthatāya nirantaruppādane ekattaṃ upanetvā viya uppādane ca samatthatā
tika-abh07t0:1661_22: tasmā dhammato avisesepi tathā tathā bujjhanakānaṃ veneyyānaṃ vasena upasaggatthavisesamattatova bhedo paccetabboti.
tika-abh07t0:1662_0: Attano anuppattiyā sahuppannānampi anuppattito pakāsassa padīpo viya sahuppannānaṃ sahuppādabhāvena paccayo sahajātapaccayo,
tika-abh07t0:1663_0: Aññamaññaṃ upatthambhayamānaṃ tidaṇḍaṃ viya attano upakārakadhammānaṃ upatthambhakabhāvena paccayo aññamaññapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1663_3: Tathā hi sahajātapaccayabhāvīyeva koci aññamaññapaccayo na hoti cittajarūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayabhāvino
tika-abh07t0:1663_4: nāmassa upādārūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayabhāvīnaṃ mahābhūtānañca aññamaññapaccayabhāvassa anuddhaṭattā.
tika-abh07t0:1663_5: Yadi hi sahajātabhāveneva attano upakārakānaṃ upakārakatā aññamaññapaccayatā siyā,
tika-abh07t0:1664_0: Cittakammassa paṭo viya sahajātanāmarūpānaṃ nissayabhūtā catukkhandhā,
tika-abh07t0:1664_1: tarupabbatādīnaṃ pathavī viya ādhāraṇatoyeva sahajātarūpasattaviññāṇadhātūnaṃ yathākkamaṃ nissayā bhūtarūpaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1664_2: vatthu cāti ime nissayapaccayo nāma nissīyati nissitakehīti katvā,
tika-abh07t0:1665_1: cha ārammaṇāni cāti ime paccayuppannato paṭhamaṃ uppajjitvā pavattamānabhāvena upakārako purejātapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1665_2: Pacchājātapaccaye asati santānaṭṭhitihetubhāvaṃ āgacchantassa kāyassa upatthambhanabhāvena upakārakā
tika-abh07t0:1665_4: So gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsā cetanā viya daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t0:1666_0: Purimapurimaparicitagantho viya uttarauttaraganthassa kusalādibhāvena attasadisassa paguṇabalavabhāvavisiṭṭhaattasamānajātiyatāgāhaṇaṃ āsevanaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1666_2: Bhinnajātikā hi bhinnajātikehi āsevanapaguṇena paguṇabalavabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ kusalādibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attano gatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-abh07t0:1666_4: te pana anantarātītāni lokiyakusalākusalāni ceva anāvajjanakiriyajavanāni cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1667_0: Attano nirussāhasantabhāvena sahajātanāmarūpānaṃ nirussāhasantabhāvāya upakārakā vipākacittacetasikā vipākapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1667_1: Te hi payogena asādhetabbatāya kammassa kaṭattā nipphajjamānamattato nirussāhasantabhāvā honti,
tika-abh07t0:1668_0: Rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakattena upakārakā cattāro āhārā āhārapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1668_1: Satipi hi janakabhāve upatthambhakattameva āhārassa padhānakiccaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1668_2: Janayantopi āhāro avicchedavasena upatthambhento va janetīti upatthambhakabhāvo va āhārabhāvo.
tika-abh07t0:1668_3: Tesu tesu kiccesu paccayuppannadhammehi attānaṃ anuvattāpanasaṅkhātādhipatiyaṭṭhena paccayo indriyapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1669_2: duggahito pāpato vā niyyānaṭṭhena upakārakā sammādiṭṭhādayo maggapaccayo.

tika-abh07t0:1671_2: Satipi hi janakatte ṭhitiyaṃyeva sātisayo atthipaccayānaṃ byāpāroti upatthambhakatāva tesaṃ gahitā.

tika-abh07t0:1705_0: Ettha ca sotaviññāṇavīthiyā anantarabhāviniṃ manodvārikavīthimpi sotaviññāṇavīthiggahaṇeneva saṅgahetvā “sotaviññāṇavīthiyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1705_1: Ghaṭādisaddañhi suṇantassa ekamekaṃ saddaṃ ārabbha paccuppannātītārammaṇavasena dve dve javanavārā,
tika-abh07t0:1705_2: buddhiyā gahitanāmapaṇṇattibhūtaṃ akkharāvalimārabbha ekoti evaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā anantarāya atītasaddārammaṇāya
tika-abh07t0:1710_1: Ito paccayaniddesato paraṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ samanaṭṭhena samathasaṅkhātānaṃ,

tika-abh07t0:1710_4: kammaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ bhāvanāvīthiñca yathākkamaṃ samathavipassanānukkamena pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1716_0: Ettha hi rāgacaritā dosacaritā mohacaritā rāgadosacaritā rāgamohacaritā dosamohacaritā rāgadosamohacaritāti evaṃ rāgādike tike sattakamekaṃ.

tika-abh07t0:1725_8: tādisā guṇā mayi santī”ti evaṃ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano saddhādiguṇānussaraṇaṃ devatānussati.

tika-abh07t0:1734_7: saddhādīnaṃ vā anupakārikā kasiṇādibhāvanā nāma natthi.
tika-abh07t0:1737_5: Buddhānussatiādīsu dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu appanāvasena samādhissa patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā appanābhāvaṃ appatvā samādhi upacārabhāvena patiṭṭhāti.

tika-abh07t0:1741_3: laddhasukhasampattito mā vigacchantū”ti mettādivasappavattabyāpārattayaṃ pahāya kammassakatādassanena

tika-abh07t0:1746_1: Pathavīmaṇḍalādīsu nimittaṃ uggaṇhantassāti ādimhi tāva catupārisuddhisīlaṃ visodhetvā dasavidhaṃ palibodhaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1746_2: upacchinditvā piyagarubhāvanīyādiguṇasamannāgataṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1746_3: gahetvā aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ ananurūpavihāraṃ pahāya pañcaṅgasamannāgate anurūpavihāre viharantassa kesanakhaharaṇādikhuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1746_4: katvā kasiṇamaṇḍalādīni purato katvā ānāpānakoṭṭhāsādīsu cittaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīditvā “pathavī pathavī”tyādinā
tika-abh07t0:1746_8: Duvidhampi hi bhāvanāvidhānaṃ idha ācariyena atisaṅkhepato vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1746_9: tadatthadassanatthañca vitthāranaye āhariyamāne atippapañco siyāti mayampi taṃ na vitthāressāma.
tika-abh07t0:1746_10: Yadā pana taṃ nimittaṃ cittena samuggahitanti evaṃ pavattānupubbabhāvanāvasena yadā taṃ parikammanimittaṃ cittena sammā uggahitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1746_12: aññattha gantvā vā manasi karontassa kasiṇamaṇḍalasadisameva hutvā manodvārikajavanānaṃ āpāthaṃ āgataṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1750_1: Pañcasu jhānaṅgesu ekekārammaṇe uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ catupañcajavanakatipayabhavaṅgato paraṃ agantvā
tika-abh07t0:1750_3: Samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ katipayabhavaṅgato paraṃ agantvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ samāpajjituṃ samatthatā samāpajjanavasitā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1750_4: Setu viya sīghasotāya nadiyā oghaṃ bhavaṅgavegaṃ upacchinditvā yathāparicchinnakālaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ
tika-abh07t0:1750_6: Yathā paricchinnakālaṃ anatikkamitvā jhānato vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1750_7: Atha vā yathāparicchinnakālato uddhaṃ gantuṃ adatvā ṭhapanasamatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1750_8: Yathāparicchinnakālato anto avuṭṭhahitvā yathākālavaseneva vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasitā nāmāti alamatippapañcena.
tika-abh07t0:1750_11: Vitakkādioḷārikaṅgaṃ pahānāyāti dutiyajjhānādīhi vitakkādioḷārikaṅgānaṃ jhānakkhaṇe anuppādāya.
tika-abh07t0:1750_13: Tassa pana upacārabhāvanā nipphannā nāma hoti vitakkādīsu nikantivikkhambhanato paṭṭhāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1751_5: anantaṃ ākāsa”nti ākāsaṃ ārabbha parikammaṃ karontassa,
tika-abh07t0:1751_9: viññāṇaṃ viññāṇa”nti manasi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ācariyā.
tika-abh07t0:1753_1: Avasesesu cāti kasiṇādīhi saha appanāvahakammaṭṭhānato avasesesu buddhānussatiādīsu aṭṭhasu,
tika-abh07t0:1753_7: Upacāro ca sampajjatīti nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhento upacārasamādhi ca uppajjati.
tika-abh07t0:1754_1: Abhiññāvasena pavattamānanti abhivisesato jānanaṭṭhena abhiññāsaṅkhātaṃ iddhividhādipañcalokiyābhiññāvasena pavattamānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1754_2: abhiññāpādakapañcamajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvāti kasiṇānulomādīhi cuddasahākārehi cittaṃ paridametvā abhinīhārakkhamaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1754_3: katvā upekkhekaggatāyogato anurūpattā ca rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānameva abhiññānaṃ pādakaṃ patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1754_6: Adhiṭṭheyyādikamāvajjetvāti iddhividhañāṇassa parikammakāle adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ vikubbanīyaṃ satādikaṃ komārarūpādikaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1754_8: cetopariyañāṇassa parikammakāle parassa hadayaṅgatavaṇṇadassanena sarāgādibhedaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1754_9: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa parikammasamaye purimabhavesu cuticittādibhedaṃ pubbe nivutthakkhandhaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1754_10: dibbacakkhussa parikammasamaye obhāsapharitaṭṭhānagataṃ rūpaṃ vā āvajjetvā.
tika-abh07t0:1755_3: Ettha hi iddhividhañāṇassa tāva pādakajjhānaṃ, kāyo,
tika-abh07t0:1755_11: anāgate sattadivasesu ca pavattaṃ parittādīsu yaṃ kiñci tikālikaṃ cittameva ārammaṇaṃ hotīti mahāaṭṭhakathācariyā.
tika-abh07t0:1756_2: nanu ca āvajjanāya gahitameva iddhicittassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t0:1756_3: āvajjanāya ca paccuppannacittamārammaṇaṃ katvā nirujjhamānāya taṃsamakālameva parassa cittampi nirujjhatīti
tika-abh07t0:1756_5: maggaphalavīthito aññattha āvajjanajavanānaṃ kathañca nānārammaṇatā na adhippetāti?
tika-abh07t0:1756_7: Ānandācariyo pana bhaṇati “pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paccuppannādivibhāgaṃ akatvā kevalaṃ ‘imassa cittaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1756_8: jānāmi’cceva parikammaṃ katvā punapi pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya aviseseneva cittaṃ āvajjetvā tiṇṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1756_9: catunnaṃ vā parikammānaṃ anantaraṃ cetopariyañāṇena parassa cittaṃ paṭivijjhati rūpaṃ viya dibbacakkhunā.
tika-abh07t0:1756_10: Pacchā kāmāvacaracittena sarāgādivavatthānampi karoti nīlādivavatthānaṃ viya.
tika-abh07t0:1756_12: aniṭṭhe ca ṭhāne nānārammaṇatādoso natthi abhinnākārappavattito”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1756_16: dibbacakkhussa pana rūpameva paccuppannanti ayametesaṃ ārammaṇavibhāgo.
tika-abh07t0:1757_4: dibbavihārasannissitatāya ca dibbañca taṃ sotañcāti dibbasotaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1757_6: Attano santāne nivutthavasena ceva gocaranivāsavasena ca pubbe atītabhavesu khandhādīnaṃ anussaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussati.
tika-abh07t0:1757_7: Vuttanayena dibbañca taṃ cakkhu cāti dibbacakkhu.
tika-abh07t0:1757_10: Na hi tesaṃ visuṃ parikammaṃ atthi.
tika-abh07t0:1757_11: Tattha anāgataṃsañāṇassa tāva anāgate sattadivasato paraṃ pavattanakaṃ cittacetasikaṃ dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya pavattanakañca yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1765_0: 45. Tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ anu anu passanā aniccānupassanādikā.
tika-abh07t0:1766_3: Udayaṃ muccitvā vaye pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ bhaṅgañāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1766_4: Saṅkhārānaṃ bhayato anupassanāvasena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1766_5: diṭṭhabhayānaṃ ādīnavato pekkhaṇavasena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ ādīnavañāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1766_7: Nibbinditvā saṅkhārehi muccitukamyatāvasena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1766_8: Muccanassa upāyasampaṭipādanatthaṃ puna saṅkhārānaṃ pariggahavasappavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1766_9: Paṭisaṅkhātadhammesu bhayanandīvivajjanavasena ajjhupekkhitvā pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1766_11: upari ca sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ anukūlaṃ ñāṇaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1768_5: Manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ rūpādīsu saṃvaraṇavasena pavattaṃ sīlaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1768_7: Paccaye sannissitaṃ tesaṃ idamatthikatāya paccavekkhaṇasīlaṃ paccayasannissitasīlaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1770_4: phalañca paccupaṭṭhāna”nti evaṃ vuttānaṃ lakkhaṇādīnaṃ “phusanalakkhaṇo phasso,
tika-abh07t0:1770_7: ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpa”ntyādinā saṅkhepato ca pariggaho paccattalakkhaṇādivasena paricchijja gahaṇaṃ dukkhasaccavavatthānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1770_8: diṭṭhivisuddhi nāma “nāmarūpato attā natthī”ti dassanato diṭṭhi ca attadiṭṭhimalavisodhanato visuddhi
tika-abh07t0:1771_1: Paccayapariggahoti nāmañca rūpañca paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva avijjātaṇhāupādānakammahetuvasena nibbattati.
tika-abh07t0:1771_8: āvajjanañca uppajjatīti evaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇavasena tīsu addhāsu nāmarūpappavattiyā paccakkhādisiddhassa
tika-abh07t0:1771_9: kammādipaccayassa pariggaṇhanaṃ samudayasaccassa vavatthānaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma “ahosiṃ nu kho
tika-abh07t0:1771_11: “sattharikaṅkhatī”tyādikāya aṭṭhavidhāya ca kaṅkhāya vitaraṇato atikkamanato kaṅkhāvitaraṇā,
tika-abh07t0:1772_2: paccayavavatthānavasena ca pariggahitesu lokuttaravajjesu tibhūmipariyāpannesu nāmarūpesu atītādibhedabhinnesu
tika-abh07t0:1772_4: ārabbha kalāpavasena piṇḍavasena saṅkhipitvā yaṃ atīte jātaṃ rūpaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1772_11: Tasmā “aniccaṃ attādivasena na iccaṃ anupagantabbaṃ khayaṭṭhena khayagamanato,
tika-abh07t0:1772_13: anattā asārakaṭṭhena attasārādiabhāvenā”ti ca “cakkhuṃ aniccaṃ…pe… mano. Rūpaṃ…pe… dhammā.
tika-abh07t0:1773_0: Sammasanañāṇe pana uppanne puna tesveva saṅkhāresu “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo,
tika-abh07t0:1773_3: taṇhākammaāhāranirodhā rūpanirodho”ti evaṃ rūpakkhandhe vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhesupi āhāraṃ apanetvā
tika-abh07t0:1773_8: vipariṇāmalakkhaṇamattassa ca dassanena khaṇavasena cāti ekekasmiṃ khandhe paccayavasena catudhā,
tika-abh07t0:1773_10: pañcadhā vayanti dasadasaudayabbayadassanavasena samapaññāsākārehi udayabbayañāṇena udayabbayaṃ samanupassantassa
tika-abh07t0:1773_11: āraddhavipassakassa yogino vipassanācittasamuṭṭhāno sarīrato niccharaṇakaālokasaṅkhāto obhāso,
tika-abh07t0:1773_21: obhāsādīsu uppannesu “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo”tyādinā nayena tattha ālayaṃ kurumānā
tika-abh07t0:1773_22: sukhumataṇhā rūpanikanticāti obhāsādīsu dasasu vipassanupakkilesesu uppannesu “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpā
tika-abh07t0:1773_24: phalappattosmī”ti aggahetvā “ime obhāsādayo taṇhādiṭṭhimānavatthutāya na maggo,
tika-abh07t0:1773_26: tabbinimuttaṃ pana vīthipaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggo”ti evaṃ maggāmaggalakkhaṇassa vavatthānaṃ nicchayanaṃ maggāmaggassa jānanato,
tika-abh07t0:1773_28: amagge maggasaññāya visodhanato ca maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1774_2: Nava vipassanāñāṇānīti khandhānaṃ udayañca vayañca jānanakaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1774_4: bhaṅgavasena upaṭṭhitānaṃ sīhādīnaṃ viya bhāyitabbākārānupekkhakaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1774_7: jālādito macchādikā viya tehi tebhūmakadhammehi muccitukāmatāvasena pavattaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1774_8: muccanupāyasampādanatthaṃ diṭṭhādīnavesupi samuddasakuṇī viya punappunaṃ sammasanavasappattaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1774_9: cattabhariyo puriso viya diṭṭhādīnavesu tesu saṅkhāresu upekkhanākārappavattaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1774_11: uddhaṃ maggakkhaṇe adhigantabbānaṃ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammānañca anulomato maggavīthiyaṃ gotrabhuto
tika-abh07t0:1774_12: pubbe pavattaṃ saccānulomikañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ navamaṃ anulomañāṇanti imāni nava ñāṇāni ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā
tika-abh07t0:1775_4: Idāni appanā uppajjissatīti “idāni appanāsaṅkhāto lokuttaramaggo uppajjissatī”ti vattabbakkhaṇe.
tika-abh07t0:1775_5: Yaṃ kiñcīti saṅkhārupekkhāya gahitesu tīsu ekaṃ yaṃ kiñci.
tika-abh07t0:1776_5: saṅkhāranimittato ca vuṭṭhahanato vuṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ gacchatīti vuṭṭhānagāminī.
tika-abh07t0:1778_4: Maggasaccaṃ bhāvanāvasenāti maggasaccasaṅkhātassa sampayuttamaggasaṅkhātassa catutthasaccassa sahajātādipaccayo hutvā vaḍḍhanavasena.
tika-abh07t0:1779_1: Dve tīṇi phalacittāni pavattitvāti magguppattiyā anurūpato dve vā tīṇi vā phalacittāni apanītaggimhi
tika-abh07t0:1779_2: ṭhāne uṇhattanibbāpanatthāya ghaṭehi abhisiñcamānamudakaṃ viya samucchinnakilesepi santāne darathapaṭippassambhakāni
tika-abh07t0:1779_6: yāni sandhāya “vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1780_1: Idāni paccavekkhaṇāya bhūmiṃ dassetuṃ “maggaṃ phalañcā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1780_2: Tattha “imināva vatāhaṃ maggena āgato”ti maggaṃ paccavekkhati.
tika-abh07t0:1780_3: Tato “ayaṃ nāma me ānisaṃso laddho”ti tassa phalaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1780_4: tato “ayaṃ nāma me dhammo ārammaṇato sacchikato”ti nibbānañca paṇḍito paccavekkhati.
tika-abh07t0:1780_5: Tato “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīne kilese,
tika-abh07t0:1780_6: “ime nāma avasiṭṭhā”ti avasiṭṭhakilese paccavekkhati vā, na vā.
tika-abh07t0:1780_10: Tathā hi mahānāmo sakko “ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīno”ti appahīne kilese pucchi.
tika-abh07t0:1780_11: Arahato pana avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ natthi sabbakilesānaṃ pahīnattā,
tika-abh07t0:1780_12: tasmā tiṇṇaṃ sekkhānaṃ pannarasa arahato cattārīti ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1781_1: diṭṭhivisuddhiādīnaṃ vasena sarīrabhūtānaṃ catunnanti etāsaṃ channaṃ visuddhīnaṃ kamena.
tika-abh07t0:1785_2: Saṅkhāresu “yo attābhiniveso kammassa kārako phalassa ca vedako eso me attā”ti evaṃ abhiniveso daḷhaggāho,
tika-abh07t0:1785_3: taṃ muñcantī “anattā”ti pavattā anupassanāva attasuññatākārānupassanato suññatānupassanā nāma vimokkhamukhaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1785_4: paṭipakkhato vimuttivasena vimokkhasaṅkhātassa lokuttaraṃ maggaphalassa dvāraṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1786_1: Saṅkhāresu “anicca”nti pavattā anupassanā anicce “nicca”nti pavattaṃ saññācittadiṭṭhivipallāsasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1786_2: vipallāsanimittaṃ muñcantī pajahantī vipallāsanimittarahitākārānupassanato animittānupassanā nāma vimokkhamukhaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1787_2: etaṃ sukha”ntyādinā nayena pavattaṃ kāmabhavataṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāpaṇidhiṃ taṇhāpatthanaṃ muñcantī dukkhākāradassanena
tika-abh07t0:1788_1: Tasmāti yasmā etāsaṃ tissannaṃ etāni tīṇi nāmāni,
tika-abh07t0:1788_3: Maggo suññato nāma vimokkho hoti āgamanavasena laddhanāmattā.
tika-abh07t0:1790_2: Yathāsakaṃ phalamuppajjamānampīti yathāladdhamaggassa phalabhūtaṃ attano attano phalaṃ uppajjamānampi
tika-abh07t0:1790_3: maggāgamanavasena alabhitvā vipassanāgamanavaseneva tīṇi nāmāni labhati phalasamāpattikāle tadā maggappavattābhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1790_7: taṇhāpaṇidhirahitattā ca suññataanimittaappaṇihitanāmavantaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattattā tassa vasena.
tika-abh07t0:1793_1: Sattakkhattuṃ sattasu vāresu kāmasugatiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ paramaṃ etassāti sattakkhattuparamo na pana aṭṭhamādikāmabhavagāmītyadhippāyo.
tika-abh07t0:1793_2: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “na te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamamādiyantī”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1793_3: Rūpārūpasugatibhavaṃ pana sattavārato parampi gacchatīti ācariyā.
tika-abh07t0:1795_0: 70. Khīṇā cattāro āsavā etassāti khīṇāsavo. Dakkhiṇārahesu aggattā aggadakkhiṇeyyo.
tika-abh07t0:1799_6: Yāva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ gantvāti evaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ yuganaddhabhāvāpādanavasena yāva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1799_8: Adhiṭṭheyyādikanti kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ ṭhapetvā visuṃ visuṃ ṭhapitacīvarādiparikkhāragehādīnaṃ aggiādinā avināsanādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1799_10: sattāhabbhantare āyusaṅkhārappavattiolokananti catubbidhaṃ adhiṭṭhānādikaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā.
tika-abh07t0:1807_0: (Ka) cārittena kulācārena sobhite visālakule udayo nibbatti yassa, tena,
tika-abh07t0:1807_1: kammādivisayāya saddhāya abhivuddho parisuddho ca dānasīlādiguṇānaṃ udayo yassa, tena,
tika-abh07t0:1807_4: paṇidhāya patthetvā yaṃ pakaraṇaṃ patthitaṃ abhiyācitaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1808_0: (Kha) tena pakaraṇappasutena vipulena puññena paññāvadātena ariyamaggapaññāparisuddhena sīlādiguṇena sobhitā.
